title: Sheet Pan BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'apple cider', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'BBQ sauce', 'chopped fresh chives', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped', 'ranch dressing', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh herbs']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'apple cider': '3/4', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1', 'BBQ sauce': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'ranch dressing': '1/4', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'fresh herbs': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F.', '2. Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Gently press the dough until it covers most of the sheet pan. Cover and let sit while you prep the pizza.', '3. In a large skillet set over medium-high heat combine the olive oil, onions, and a pinch of salt. Cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add half the apple cider and continue cooking another 5 minutes, until the cider has mostly evaporated. Add the remaining cider and cook another 5 minutes or until the onions are golden and caramelized. Remove from the heat.', '4. In a bowl, combine the chicken, 1/3 cup BBQ sauce, chives, and cilantro/parsley.', "5. To assemble. Grab the dough and spread on the ranch, you may not need it all. Add a drizzle of BBQ sauce if you'd like, then layer on the onions, chicken, and cheeses. Sprinkle with cilantro. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh herbs, additional BBQ sauce, and/or ranch. ENJOY!"]

title: Crockpot Crispy Buffalo Chicken Tacos with Jalapeño Ranch
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'black pepper', 'hard shell tacos (see notes for homemade option)', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving', 'chipotle peppers, chopped', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'mayo', 'buttermilk', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'kosher salt', 'chopped fresh chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'hot sauce': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'hard shell tacos (see notes for homemade option)': '12', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chipotle peppers, chopped': '2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'mayo': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4 – 1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2'}

title: Broccoli Cheddar Chicken and Noodle Casserole
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'milk', 'short cut pasta', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'grated Parmesan cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '3/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, to taste': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2', 'milk': '1 1/2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'grated Parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and carrot and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Add the butter, thyme, paprika, garlic powder, and cayenne, and cook until golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes.', '3. Add the broth and milk. Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat. Add the pasta and broccoli and season with salt and pepper. Scatter the remaining cheese over top of the casserole.', '4. Bake 20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and beginning to brown. Serve warm with additional thyme and fresh basil.']

title: Creamy Tuscan Chicken with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['thin cut chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'prosciutto, torn', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'red pepper flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'peeled and chopped raw potatoes', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'dijon mustard', 'lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'thin cut chicken breasts': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'peeled and chopped raw potatoes': '1', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '3/4', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'lemon juice': '3', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped': '1', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning. Place the flour in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Add the prosciutto and cook until crispy all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '3. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet.', '4. Add the shallots and garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes, Italian seasoning, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook 2 minutes. Pour in the broth. Add the potatoes and chicken. Partially cover and cook over medium heat until the potatoes are fork tender, 10-15 minutes.', '5. Remove the lid. Pour in the cream. Add the dijon, lemon juice, parmesan, and Tuscan kale. Cook until the kale is wilted, 5 minutes.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce with crispy prosciutto and fresh basil.']

title: Roasted Garlic Caprese Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'heirloom tomatoes, sliced', 'garlic, left in skin and smashed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'basil pesto', 'sourdough bread', 'fig preserves', 'shredded mozzarella', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh basil leaves', 'salted butter, at room temperature']

title: Spicy Ginger Sesame Crusted Salmon Bowl

title: Cheesy Pesto Avocado Bacon Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: ['eggs', 'everything bagel spice', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'salted butter', 'baby spinach', 'large tortillas', 'avocado, diced', 'basil pesto', 'cooked bacon, crumbled', 'leftover french fries or roasted potatoes']
ingredients with measurement: {'eggs': '8', 'everything bagel spice': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '3/4', 'shredded fontina cheese': '3/4', 'salted butter': '3', 'baby spinach': '2', 'large tortillas': '4', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'cooked bacon, crumbled': '6', 'leftover french fries or roasted potatoes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, everything spice, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '3. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Pour in the eggs and cook, undisturbed, until beginning to set on the bottom, 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle on the cheddar. Using a spatula, lift up the edges of the eggs and let the uncooked eggs run underneath. Scatter the spinach over top, and cook another minute. Remove from the heat.', '4. Place one tortilla at a time in the microwave for 20 seconds. Spread on a layer of pesto, then add the eggs, potatoes, cheese, avocado, and bacon. Fold the tortilla over the ingredients. Fold sides and ends of tortillas over filling and roll forward. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Wrap the burritos in foil.', '5. Wrap the burritos in foil and place in the oven for 10-15 minutes, until the cheese melts. Unwrap the foil, eat, and enjoy!']

title: Coconut Chicken Meatball Curry with Rice Noodles
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'green onions, chopped', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'orange bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'grated fresh ginger', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'peanut butter', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'yellow corn', 'rice noodles', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lime', 'fresh cilantro and basil']

instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, green onions, Worcestershire sauce, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mix until just combined. title: Caramelized Shallot and Bacon Goat Cheese Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, halved or quartered', 'fresh thyme sprigs', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'chili flakes', 'pizza dough, at room temp', 'fig preserves', 'tomato, grated on a box grater', 'garlic, grated', 'crumbled goat cheese', 'cooked bacon', 'fresh basil leaves', 'shredded mozzarella cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallots, halved or quartered': '6', 'fresh thyme sprigs': '4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'pizza dough, at room temp': '1/2', 'fig preserves': '1-2', 'tomato, grated on a box grater': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'crumbled goat cheese': '3', 'cooked bacon': '4', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/3', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1 1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. In a skillet, combine the olive oil, shallots, and thyme, cook over medium heat until the oil is hot. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook 10-20 minutes, until the shallots are very soft and caramelized. Stir and cook another 5 minutes. Add the chili flakes. Remove from the heat.', "3. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to a baking sheet. Mix the grated tomato with the garlic, salt, and pepper. title: 30 Minute Saucy Ginger Sesame Noodles with Caramelized Mushrooms
ingredients: ['low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'balsamic vinegar', 'rice vinegar', 'creamy peanut butter or tahini', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'Chinese style egg noodles or rice noodles', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'fresh baby spinach, roughly chopped', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'shallots, chopped', 'black pepper', 'raw sesame seeds', 'green onions chopped, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'honey': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'creamy peanut butter or tahini': '3', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'Chinese style egg noodles or rice noodles': '8', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'fresh baby spinach, roughly chopped': '2', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions chopped, for serving': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. Combine 1/2 cup soy sauce, honey, balsamic vinegar, rice vinegar, peanut butter/tahini, molasses, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 clove garlic, and 1/3 cup water in a bowl.', '2. Cook the noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain. To the pot used to cook the noodles, add the broth and 1/2 of the soy sauce mixture. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stir in the spinach. Keep warm.', '3. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add the shallots, 1 tablespoon ginger, and 2 cloves garlic. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Add 2 tablespoons soy sauce and a large pinch of pepper. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms are caramelized. Add the sesame seeds, cook 2 minutes. Spoon the mushrooms out of the skillet and onto a plate.', '4. To the skillet, add the remaining soy sauce mixture and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Add the noodles, toss to combine, and cook until the sauce just coats the noodles, 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '5. Ladle the broth into bowls. Add the noodles and toss combine. title: Skillet Chicken and Broccoli Pot Pie with Garlic Butter Phyllo Crust
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh sage, + 8 whole sage leaves', 'all-purpose flour', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced in half', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'celery,  chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, grated', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'sheets frozen phyllo dough thawed']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '8', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh sage, + 8 whole sage leaves': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced in half': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'celery,  chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets': '1 1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '2-4', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'sheets frozen phyllo dough thawed': '12-18'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 F.', '2. Melt together the olive oil and 4 tablespoons butter In a large oven safe skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot, 1 tablespoon thyme, and 1 tablespoon sage. Cook until the shallot is fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the flour and cook until a paste forms and turns golden, 1-2 minutes. Gradually whisk in the wine and broth. Add the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil.', '3. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes. Stir in the carrots, broccoli, celery, and cayenne, and cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes more.', '4. Remove the skillet from the heat, then shred the chicken using 2 forks.', '5. In a small bowl, combine 4 tablespoons melted butter, 1 tablespoon thyme, the garlic, and rosemary.', '6. Place 2 pieces of phyllo on a clean counter, one on top of the other. Brush the melted garlic butter over the phyllo. Top with 2 more sheets of phyllo (one on top of the other), placing it slightly off-center. Butter the phyllo. Top with 2 more sheets of phyllo (one on top of the other), again, placing it slightly off-center to create a circle. Now, repeat this layer with the remaining sheets of phyllo.\xa0Carefully place the phyllo over the skillet. Make 2-3 slits in the top of the dough with a sharp knife. Lay the sage leaves on top of the crust.', '7. Bake until the phyllo is golden brown, 25-30 minutes. Let cool 10 minutes, then serve!']

title: Browned Sage Butter Chicken Piccata with Mushroom Pasta.

ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh sage leaves': '12', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'fresh lemon juice': '1/3', 'capers': '2', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'Pappardelle egg pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1/3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh grated manchego cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour mix, pressing gently to adhere.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmers, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. title: Roasted Butternut Squash Prosciutto Pizza with Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['pizza dough, at room temperature', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash or pumpkin', 'honey', 'chopped fresh sage', 'cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cubed butternut squash or pumpkin': '4', 'honey': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'cinnamon': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'apple cider': '3/4', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 position. Preheat the oven to 425° F. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. Place the ball of pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Lightly drizzle olive oil on top of the dough ball. Cover with plastic wrap and let rest.', '3. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, honey, sage, cinnamon, cayenne, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Roast for 15-20 minutes, until the squash is just tender and remove from oven. Increase the heat to 500° F.', '4. Meanwhile, caramelize the onions. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onions and cook 3 minutes, until softened. Add half the apple cider, season with salt and pepper and continue cooking another 5 minutes, until the cider has mostly evaporated. Add the remaining cider and cook another 5 minutes or until the onions are golden and caramelized. Add a pinch of crushed red pepper, cook another minute.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '5. To assemble. Remove the plastic wrap. Gently press the dough until it covers the entire sheet pan. Drizzle the dough lightly with olive oil. Top with the onions, you may not need them all. Add the cheese, then the prosciutto. Arrange the butternut squash on top.', '6. Slide into the preheated 500° F oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza additional crushed red pepper flakes. ENJOY!']

title: Pumpkin Cheese Stuffed Pasta Shell Bolognese Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'lean ground chicken or beef', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'fennel seed', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'marinara sauce', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'jumbo shells', 'can pumpkin pureé', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'ground nutmeg', 'provolone cheese, cubed']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'lean ground chicken or beef': '3/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'fennel seed': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'jumbo shells': '1', 'can pumpkin pureé': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '2-3', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'provolone cheese, cubed': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish or a dish of similar size.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 3-5 minutes.\xa0Add the meat, garlic, oregano, fennel, paprika, red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until browned all over, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the marinara and wine. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the pumpkin, fontina, blue cheese (if using), sage, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '5. To assemble, spoon 3/4 of the Bolognese sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Spoon the remaining Bolognese sauce over top of the shells. Add the provolone.', '6. Transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake 20-25 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Serve topped with fresh oregano.']

title: One Pot Broccoli Cheddar and Dumplings.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'sweet onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'fresh or frozen broccoli florets', 'bay leaves', 'whole milk', 'nutmeg', 'cayenne pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking powder', 'buttermilk', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'sweet onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '3', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '6-7', 'fresh or frozen broccoli florets': '3', 'bay leaves': '2', 'whole milk': '1/2', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'all-purpose flour': '1 1/2', 'baking powder': '2', 'buttermilk': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil and butter together in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 3-5 minutes.\xa0Add the carrots and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes.', '3. Pour in the broth. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, nutmeg, and cayenne, and bring to a boil over high heat. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or until the broccoli is tender.', '4. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the buttermilk, parmesan cheese, and sage, mixing until just combined.', '5. Remove the bay leaves from the soup. Transfer 3/4 of the soup to a blender and blend until the broccoli is finely chopped. Return the soup to the pot and bring the soup to a boil over medium-high heat. Drop a heaping tablespoon of the dough into the soup, adding about 6 dumplings to the soup at a time. Cover, and cook for about 8-10\xa0minutes, until the dumplings are cooked through and puffy.', '6. Carefully move the dumplings aside, or if easier, remove dumpling from the soup, and stir in the milk and cheddar cheese, cooking until melted. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '7. Ladle the soup and dumplings into bowls and serve topped with pepper. Enjoy!']

title: Herbed Ricotta Stuffed Chicken In Cider Pan Sauce with Mashed Cauliflower
ingredients: ['whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'chopped fresh thyme, plus more for serving', 'chopped fresh sage', 'ground nutmeg', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'skin-on, chicken breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'small shallots, halved', 'garlic cloves, smashed', 'cremini mushrooms, halved, if large', 'salted butter', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'apple cider', 'cauliflower, cut into florets', 'garlic, smashed', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1/2', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh thyme, plus more for serving': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'skin-on, chicken breasts': '4-6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small shallots, halved': '3', 'garlic cloves, smashed': '4', 'cremini mushrooms, halved, if large': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'apple cider': '1/2', 'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2-3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Grease an oven-safe skillet with olive oil.', '2. \xa0In a bowl, combine the ricotta, gouda, 1 tablespoon thyme, 1 tablespoon sage, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '3. Loosen the skin of the chicken breast with your fingertips. Stuff about 2 tablespoons of ricotta underneath the skin of each breast. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked.', '4. Remove from the oven and place the chicken and mushrooms on a plate.', '5. title: Butternut Squash Pasta Carbonara with Rosemary Bacon
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic, smashed', 'thick-cut bacon', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey', 'dry linguine pasta', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'salted butter, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'thick-cut bacon': '8', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2-1', 'honey': '2', 'dry linguine pasta': '1', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. On a plate, rub the bacon with rosemary and cayenne, drizzle with honey. Lay the bacon over top.', '2. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10 minutes, flip the bacon and bake another 5-8 minutes, until the bacon is crisp, watch closely. Remove the bacon. If squash needs more time, return to the oven for another 10 minutes, or until the squash is tender.', '3. Transfer the squash and garlic to a food processor. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Roughly chop the bacon, reserve for topping.', '4. Meanwhile, whisk together the eggs and parmesan.', '5. Boil the pasta until al dente. Immediately\xa0add the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Add the butternut squash puree, and the butter, tossing to combine. Thin the sauce with the reserved pasta water until it reaches your desired consistency.', '6. Divide the pasta between plates. Top with bacon. Twirl the pasta up...EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Cauliflower and Cheese with Spicy Breadcrumbs
ingredients: ['cauliflower, cut into florets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'prosciutto', 'finely torn ciabatta or sourdough bread', 'fresh oregano leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'chipotle chili powder', 'onion powder', 'whole milk', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'fresh thyme leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'prosciutto': '3', 'finely torn ciabatta or sourdough bread': '1', 'fresh oregano leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '1/2-1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'whole milk': '1 1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss the cauliflower, 2 tablespoons olive oil, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Push the cauliflower to one side of the pan. On the other side, toss the bread, with 2 tablespoons olive oil, oregano, and a pinch of salt. Lay the prosciutto around the bread.', '2. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp. Remove from the oven, then remove the bread and prosciutto. Return the cauliflower to the oven and bake another 5-10 minutes, until just tender.', '3. Crumble the bread/prosciutto into fine crumbs using your fingers or pulse in a food processor. Toss with red pepper flakes. Set aside.', '4. Meanwhile, make the cheese sauce. Melt the butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Whisk in the flour, chipotle chili powder, and onion powder. Cook 1 minute. Slowly add the milk, whisking until combined. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a low boil. Stir in the cheeses. Add the cauliflower and toss. Cook another 3-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the thyme.', '5. Serve the cauliflower topped with breadcrumbs. Eat and enjoy the deliciousness 🙂']

title: Black Pepper Rub Chicken Fingers with Greek Yogurt Ranch.
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'buttermilk', 'hot sauce', 'finely crushed corn flakes', 'finely crushed Cheez-It or Goldfish crackers', 'fajita seasoning', 'black pepper', 'salted butter, melted', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing', 'plain greek yogurt', 'buttermilk', 'fresh chopped chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '2', 'buttermilk': '2', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'finely crushed corn flakes': '2', 'finely crushed Cheez-It or Goldfish crackers': '1/2', 'fajita seasoning': '1', 'black pepper': '1-2', 'salted butter, melted': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/2', 'fresh chopped chives': '2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, buttermilk, and 2 tablespoons hot sauce. Toss well to coat.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '3. Add the corn flakes crumbs, cheese cracker crumbs (if using), 1 tablespoon fajita seasoning, and a large pinch of pepper to a medium-size bowl. Stir to combine.', '4. Remove each piece of chicken from the buttermilk, and dredge through the crumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat until all the chicken has been used. Make sure not to crowd your pan, if necessary use two baking sheets. Lightly brush/drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the black pepper sauce. Stir together the melted butter, 1/2 cup hot sauce, 2 teaspoons fajita seasoning, and a pinch black pepper (to your taste).', '6. To make the ranch, combine all ingredients in a bowl or glass jar. Taste, adding salt and pepper as needed.', '7. Drizzle the chicken with the black pepper sauce. Serve alongside the ranch for dipping. ENJOY.']

title: Ricotta Gnocchi with Herby Mushrooms and Sage Browned Butter
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, smashed', 'finely torn sourdough bread', 'grated Asiago cheese', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'egg', 'all-purpose flour', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced', 'garlic, smashed', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '1', 'finely torn sourdough bread': '1', 'grated Asiago cheese': '1/3', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '16', 'egg': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '3/4-1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced': '4', 'salted butter': '6', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped sage': '8'}
instructions: ['1. To make the breadcrumbs. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss the olive oil, bread, garlic, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes or until toasted. Crumble the bread into fine crumbs or pulse in the food processor. Toss with the Asiago cheese. Set aside.', '2. To make the gnocchi. In a bowl, mix together the ricotta and egg. Add 3/4 cup flour, the parmesan, and 1 teaspoon salt. Stir until just combined. If the dough feels wet, add a tablespoon of flour at a time until the dough can be formed into a ball. The dough should be sticky.', "3. Generously flour the counter and scrape the dough out onto it. Cut the dough into four pieces. Working with one piece of dough at a time, roll the dough into a rope about 1-inch thick and cut into bite size pieces. Repeat this process, placing the gnocchi on a floured baking sheet. At this point, the gnocchi can be kept covered in the fridge for up to 1 day. Simply boil just before you're ready to eat. Or boil right away.", '4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the gnocchi until they float to the top and are cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. Drain.', '5. Meanwhile, heat\xa0the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden. Reduce the heat to medium. Add the butter, garlic, thyme, and sage. Cook, stirring occasionally until the butter is browning and the sage is crisp, about 4-5 minutes.', '6. Drop the gnocchi into the butter sauce, gently tossing to combine. Remove from the heat.', '7. Divide the gnocchi among bowls.\xa0Top with breadcrumbs. EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Crockpot BBQ Beer Chicken Taquitos with Street Corn Salsa
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breast or thighs', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce', 'of your favorite beer, or use chicken broth', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'olive oil', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream', 'avocado oil mayo', 'garlic, grated', 'juice from 2 limes', 'grilled or steamed corn', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'chipotle chile powder', 'crumbled cotija or feta cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breast or thighs': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '2-3', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'of your favorite BBQ sauce': '2', 'of your favorite beer, or use chicken broth': '1/2', 'corn tortillas': '16-20', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1', 'olive oil': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'avocado oil mayo': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'grilled or steamed corn': '2', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'chipotle chile powder': '1', 'crumbled cotija or feta cheese': '1/4-1/2'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker, combine the chicken,\xa0onion, chipotle peppers, paprika, 1 1/2 cups BBQ sauce, the beer, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cover and cook on LOW for 6 hours or on HIGH for 3-4 hours. Once the chicken is done cooking, shred with two forks. Stir in the remaining BBQ sauce, if desired.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 2 tablespoons of the chicken down the middle of the tortilla. Add a sprinkle of cheese, then roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the salsa. Combine the yogurt, mayo, garlic, juice of 1 lime, and a pinch of salt in a small bowl. In a separate bowl, combine the corn, cilantro, chives, chili powder, and cotija. Add a couple spoonfuls of the garlic crema, toss to combine.', '5. Serve the taquitos drizzle with the remaining crema and top with corn.']

title: Zucchini Parmesan Chicken Meatballs with Lemon Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'zucchini, grated', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon, sliced and seeds removed', 'drained capers', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fresh basil', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'spaghetti or bucatini pasta', 'salted butter, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'zucchini, grated': '1', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'lemon, sliced and seeds removed': '1', 'drained capers': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2-1', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten': '3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '3/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'spaghetti or bucatini pasta': '3/4', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Grease a baking sheet with oil. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.', '2. Add the chicken, grated zucchini, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, the parmesan, and a pinch each of salt and pepper to a bowl. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with olive oil and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (this will make 20-22 meatballs). Place on the prepared baking sheet. Arrange the lemon slices around the meatballs. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10 minutes.', '3. Remove from oven, slide the meatballs to one side of the pan, add the remaining 1 cup breadcrumbs, and the capers. Toss the crumbs and capers with 2 tablespoon olive oil and the red pepper flakes. Return to the oven and cook another 5 minutes, watching closely, until the meatballs are cooked through and the crumbs golden.', '4. Remove the breadcrumbs from the pan. Season with salt. Remove the lemon from the pan. Finely chop the lemon slices and mix with 1/2 cup fresh basil, reserving the mix for tossing with the pasta.', '5. Meanwhile, make the carbonara. Whisk together the eggs, parmesan, garlic, and basil, in a large serving bowl.', '6. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before draining, scoop out 1 cup pasta water, then drain. Immediately\xa0add the hot pasta to\xa0the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Thin the sauce with the reserved pasta water, until it reaches your desired consistency.\xa0Add the butter and about a 1/4 of the reserved lemon basil mix, gently toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper.', '7. Divide the pasta between plates. Top with meatballs, breadcrumbs, and additional lemon/basil, to taste. Twirl the pasta up...EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Creamy Spinach and Artichoke Salmon
ingredients: ['salmon filets, skin on or off', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'paprika', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'small shallots, sliced or smashed', 'garlic, smashed', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'canned full-fat coconut milk', 'cream cheese, cubed', 'grated parmesan or manchego cheese', 'fresh baby spinach', 'marinated artichokes', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon', 'flaky sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets, skin on or off': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'paprika': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'small shallots, sliced or smashed': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '3', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'canned full-fat coconut milk': '1 1/4', 'cream cheese, cubed': '2', 'grated parmesan or manchego cheese': '1/2', 'fresh baby spinach': '4', 'marinated artichokes': '1', 'juice from 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'flaky sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Rub the salmon with paprika, salt, and pepper.', '2. Optional: Sear the salmon before baking. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the salmon and cook for 2-3 minutes, until the salmon is seared on 1 side. Remove from the skillet. If using skin-on salmon, sear the skin side.', '3. To the same (oven-safe) skillet, add the butter, shallots, and garlic. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, 2 minutes. Add the sage and continue cooking another 2-3 minutes, until the butter is browned and the garlic golden and caramelized. Add the crushed red pepper flakes, coconut milk, and cream cheese. Season the sauce with salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly until smooth and creamy. Add the parmesan, spinach, and artichokes, and cook until the spinach is wilted, 3-5 minutes. Stir in the lemon juice. Remove from the heat. If desired, remove the smashed garlic.', '4. Slide the salmon into the sauce.\xa0Transfer to the oven and bake 10-15 minutes or until salmon is cooked through.', '5. To serve, plate each piece of salmon, then spoon the sauce over top. Serve with flaky sea salt.']

title: One Pot Creamy French Onion Pasta Bake.
ingredients: ['butter', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'honey', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'of your favorite short cut pasta', 'cayenne pepper', 'heavy cream, whole milk, or canned coconut milk', 'crumbled gorgonzola cheese', 'shredded gruyere cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'butter': '4', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'honey': '2', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'of your favorite short cut pasta': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'heavy cream, whole milk, or canned coconut milk': '1 1/4', 'crumbled gorgonzola cheese': '1/3', 'shredded gruyere cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', "2. Melt the butter, onions, and honey together in a large pot over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 5 minutes. At this point, you want to slowly add 1/2 cup of the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 8-10 minutes until you've used the 1/2 cup of wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '2. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the remaining 1/2 cup wine, the broth, Worcestershire sauce, bay leaves, and the pasta. Bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the pasta is al dente and the broth has been absorbed, about 8-10 minutes.\xa0Stir in the cayenne, cream, gorgonzola, if using, and 1/2 cup gruyere cheese. Remove from the heat.', '3. If needed, transfer the pasta to a baking dish. Top with the remaining gruyere cheese.', '4. Transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake 20 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with fresh thyme. Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken and Orzo.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or small thighs', 'dried oregano', 'paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'butter', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dry orzo pasta', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'heavy cream', 'Dijon mustard', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh baby spinach', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, oil drained', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'fresh rosemary, for serving (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or small thighs': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'butter': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'heavy cream': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, oil drained': '1/2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh rosemary, for serving (optional)': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet set over medium-high heat. Rub the chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil, the oregano, paprika, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. When the oil is shimmering, add the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3.\xa0To the same skillet, add the butter and shallot, cooking until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add the garlic and orzo, cooking until lightly golden, 2-3 minutes. Add the wine and de-glaze the pan. Add 1 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, cook 3-5 minutes, then add the cream, mustard, parmesan, spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes, stirring until the spinach has wilted. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate back into the skillet.\xa0Transfer to the oven and cook, uncovered for 10-15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Serve the chicken topped with lemon juice and rosemary, if desired.']

ingredients with measurement: {'cumin': '1', 'garlic': '2', 'red chile': '1', 'good pinch of pepper': 'seasoning', '+ 1/4 orange juice': '3/4', 'the juice of 4 limes + 1 lime zested': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'soy sauce': '1', 'cilantro': '1/4', 'boneless chicken breast': '1', 'butter': '2', 'olive oil': '2', 'onion': '1', 'red pepper': '1', 'dry quinoa': '1 1/2', 'cooked black beans': '2', 'salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'bananas sliced + chili powder if desired': '2', 'coconut oil': '2', 'mango': '1', 'of 1 lime': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/4'}
instructions: ['To a blender, add the cumin, 3 cloves garlic, red chile, pinch of pepper, 3/4 cup orange juice, lime juice + lime zest, honey, soy sauce and cilantro. Blend until everything is finely chopped and smooth. Next, add the chicken to a bowl or a ziplock bag and pour half the marinade over the chicken. Toss to coat and allow the chicken to sit for 20 minutes, or even overnight, in the marinade.']

instructions: ['To make the rice, heat a 10-12 inch sided skillet over medium heat. Add the coconut and orzo pasta. Allow the pasta to get slightly golden and toasted, about 2 minutes. Add the rice and toast the rice another 2 minutes. Add the ginger and cook 30 seconds longer or until the ginger is fragrant. Slowly pour in the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a boil. Once boiling, cover and reduce the heat to a simmer. Simmer for 20-25 minutes.']

title: The Thanksgiving Leftovers Croque Madame.
ingredients: ['leftover gravy', 'milk', 'pinch of nutmeg', 'shredded gruyere cheese', 'grated parmesan', 'croissants, halved', 'dijon mustard', 'leftover mashed potatoes', 'leftover turkey', 'leftover cranberry sauce', 'leftover vegetables', 'baked crispy prosciutto', 'fried eggs, for serving', 'crispy sage, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'leftover gravy': '1', 'milk': '1/2', 'pinch of nutmeg': 'seasoning', 'shredded gruyere cheese': '2', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'croissants, halved': '4', 'dijon mustard': '4', 'leftover mashed potatoes': '1', 'leftover turkey': '1', 'leftover cranberry sauce': '1', 'leftover vegetables': '1/2', 'baked crispy prosciutto': '4-68', 'fried eggs, for serving': '4', 'crispy sage, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the gravy and milk to a small pot and bring to a gentle boil. Add a pinch of nutmeg. Remove from the heat and stir in 1 cup Gruyère and the parmesan, stirring until melted.', '2. Preheat the the oven to 425 degrees F.', '3. Place the 4 bottom halves of the croissants on a parchment lined baking sheet. Spread 1 tablespoon mustard over each. Spoon over a layer of mashed potatoes. Drizzle the cheese sauce over the mashed potatoes. Top with turkey, cranberry sauce, any leftover vegetables, and a slice crispy prosciutto. Add the top croissant. Spoon the remaining cheese sauce over the sandwich, then top each with the remaining Gruyère. Bake until cheese sauce is bubbling and evenly browned, about 3–4 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, fry the eggs.', '5. Place an egg on top of each sandwich, and serve hot with a few fried sage leaves. Grab your forks and knives!']

instructions: ['In a large bowl, combine water, yeast and honey. Mix with a spoon, then let sit until foamy, about 10 minutes. Add in 1 cup flour, salt and olive oil stirring with a spoon until the dough comes together but is still sticky. Using your hands, on a floured surface, form the dough into a ball and work the additional 1/2 cup flour into the dough if needed. All of the mixing and kneading can also be done in a stand mixer with the dough hook attachment. Next, rub the same bowl with olive oil, then place the dough inside, turning to coat. Cover with a towel and place in a warm place to rise for about 1 1/2 hours.']

Add the softened butter and use your fingers to crumble it into the oats mixture until everything is moist and the butter is evenly distributed. instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Add the cherry tomatoes, olive oil, 2 tablespoons fresh chopped herbs, garlic and a generous sprinkle of salt and pepper to a baking dish. Toss well, making sure the tomatoes are coated in olive oil, herbs, garlic, salt and pepper. Add the prosciutto. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10-15 minutes or until the tomatoes collapse and the prosciutto is crisp.', '3. Meanwhile, beat together the eggs, parmesan, crushed red peppers, and basil, in large serving bowl.', 'eat together the eggs, parmesan, crushed red peppers, and basil, in large serving bowl.', '4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before you drain the pasta scoop out about 1/2 cup pasta water, drain the pasta well.', '4. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before you drain the pasta scoop out about 1/2 cup pasta water, drain the pasta well.', '5. Immediately\xa0add the hot pasta to the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Thin the sauce with a bit of the reserved pasta water, until it reaches your desired consistency.\xa0Add the tomatoes and all the juices from the tomatoes and gently toss to combine. Season with freshly ground black pepper and salt.', 'add the hot pasta to', 'the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Thin the sauce with a bit of the reserved pasta water, until it reaches your desired consistency.', 'Add the tomatoes and all the juices from the tomatoes and gently toss to combine. Season with freshly ground black pepper and salt.', '6. Divide the pasta among plates and top with freshly torn burrata cheese and fresh herbs. Grab a fork and start twirling!']

title: Tuscan Summer Minestrone with Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto.
ingredients: ['olive oil', 'sweet onion', 'carrots', 'ribs celery', 'red pepper', "zucchini's and or yellow summer squashes", 'ear corn', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chicken or vegetable broth', 'sprig fresh rosemary', 'small bunch tuscan kale', 'DeLallo Orecchiette Pasta', 'parmesan rind', 'cannellini beans', 'salt and pepper', 'fresh parsley', 'fresh basil', 'homemade or store-bought sun-dried tomato pesto']
ingredients with measurement: {'olive oil': '1/4', 'sweet onion': '1', 'carrots': '2', 'ribs celery': '2', 'red pepper': '1', "zucchini's and or yellow summer squashes": '2', 'ear corn': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'chicken or vegetable broth': '6-8', 'sprig fresh rosemary': '1', 'small bunch tuscan kale': '1', 'DeLallo Orecchiette Pasta': '1-2', 'parmesan rind': '1', 'cannellini beans': '2', 'salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh parsley': '2', 'fresh basil': '1/4', 'homemade or store-bought sun-dried tomato pesto': '1/2'}
instructions: ['Add the chicken or veggie broth, the reserved corn cobs and the parmesan rind, bring the soup to a boil. Add the rosemary and kale, reduce the heat to a simmer for about 10 minutes. After 10 minutes bring the soup back to a boil and add the pasta. I added about 2 cups of pasta, but my soup was heavy on the pasta! Boil the pasta until al dente, if needed add more broth to thin the soup. Remove from the heat stir in the cannellini beans, parsley, basil and about 1/2 cup pesto. Taste and season with salt and pepper to your liking. Remove the parmesan rind.']

title: Simple Summertime Basil Chicken Curry with Coconut Ginger-Lime Rice.
ingredients: ['can coconut milk', 'jasmine or basmati rice', 'fresh ginger', 'lime', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless, skinless chicken, diced', 'bell peppers', 'zucchini', 'ears corn', 'fresh ginger', 'garlic', 'thai red curry paste', 'can coconut milk', 'fish sauce', 'fresh basil', 'mango', 'jalapeño', 'fresh naan and goat cheese, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'can coconut milk': '1', 'jasmine or basmati rice': '1', 'fresh ginger': '1', 'lime': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'boneless, skinless chicken, diced': '1', 'bell peppers': '2', 'zucchini': '1', 'ears corn': '2', 'garlic': '2', 'thai red curry paste': '2-3', 'fish sauce': '1', 'fresh basil': '1/2', 'mango': '1', 'jalapeño': '1', 'fresh naan and goat cheese, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ["1. Add the coconut milk to a medium size pot. Bring to a low boil and then add the rice, salt, and ginger. Stir to combine and then place the lid on the pot and turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook ten minutes on low and then turn the heat off completely and let the rice sit on the stove, covered for another 20 minutes (don't take any peeks inside!). After 20 minutes remove the lid and add the lime juice + zest."]

title: Buffalo-Blue Curly Cheese Fry and Crispy Black Bean Burgers.

instructions: ['To make the buffalo cheese sauce heat a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the butter, and once it’s melted and bubbly add the flour. Whisk together to create a roux and cook for 1-2 minutes until mixture gets a bit golden in color. Add milk, stir and turn down heat to low. Continue stirring until milk thickens. Add in the cream cheese, cheddar cheese and continue to stir until mixture is smooth. Stir in hot sauce and seasoned salt and pepper. Taste and add more hot sauce if desired.']

title: Roasted Garlic Sage Pesto Pumpkin Soup with Spicy Fried Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ['large sugar or pie pumpkin', 'olive oil', 'salt and pepper', 'unsalted butter', 'small shallots', 'fresh thyme', 'chicken broth', 'coconut milk', 'water', 'cayenne pepper', 'nutmeg', 'pure maple syrup', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'head garlic', 'fresh parsley', 'fresh sage', 'shelled pistachios', 'olive oil', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'pepper', 'coconut milk', 'flour', 'reserved pumpkin seeds from above', 'chipotle chili powder', 'brown sugar', 'pepper', 'lots of salt to your tasting']
ingredients with measurement: {'large sugar or pie pumpkin': '1', 'olive oil': '1/4', 'salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'unsalted butter': '6', 'small shallots': '2', 'fresh thyme': '1', 'chicken broth': '4', 'coconut milk': '1', 'water': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'pure maple syrup': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'head garlic': '1', 'fresh parsley': '1', 'fresh sage': '1/2', 'shelled pistachios': '1/4', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'pepper': '1/2', 'flour': '1', 'reserved pumpkin seeds from above': 'seasoning', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'brown sugar': '1/4', 'lots of salt to your tasting': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 400° F.', 'Cut your pumpkin in half or into fourths and reserve the pumpkin seeds for later. Place the pumpkin on a baking sheet and rub the pumpkin with 1 tablespoon olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Chop off the top portion of the garlic head to reveal the cloves. Peel any excess paper/skin off from the bulb of garlic. Pour about a teaspoon of olive oil on top of the garlic cloves and cover with foil. Roast both the pumpkin and garlic together on the same baking sheet for 45 minutes, or until the pumpkin is fork tender and the garlic golden brown and soft. Remove from the oven and allow everything to cool five minutes. Squeeze the garlic out of the paper skin into a small bowl and mash well with a fork, set aside.', 'Grab the pumpkin and add it to a food processor (or mash extremely well) and puree with 1 cup of the chicken broth, puree until completely smooth.', 'Heat a large pot over medium heat and add the butter and shallots. Saute the shallots until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the thyme and cook another 30 seconds. Add the pumpkin puree, remaining chicken, coconut milk, water, cayenne, nutmeg, maple syrup, and crushed red pepper. Bring the soup to a low simmer and simmer 15-20 minutes.', 'While the soup cooks make the pesto. Add the roasted garlic, parsley, sage, and pistachios to the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped and then stream in the olive oil. Add the cheese and pulse a few more times until combined. Season with salt and pepper.', 'To fry the pumpkin seeds. Add the reserved pumpkin seeds to a bowl and toss with 1 tablespoon coconut milk and 1 tablespoon flour. In a small bowl combine the chipotle chili powder, pepper, and brown sugar. Place a skillet on the stovetop and set to medium heat, add the olive oil. Once the oil is hot, add the pumpkin seeds into the pan, but be careful! Stir the pumpkin seeds around in the skillet with a spoon or spatula continuously until they expand and start to brown. Once the seeds are browned remove them from the skillet and place them onto a paper towel to drain. Toss with the chili powder and a good pinch of salt. Taste and season accordingly.', 'To assemble the soup, ladle the soup into bowls (or your roasted pumpkins) and top each bowl with a dollop of pesto, a sprinkle of pumpkin seeds, and if desired drizzle with coconut milk. Start slurpin!', 'To make the roasted pumpkin soup bowls. Remove the tops of the pumpkin and scoop out the seeds. Rub the insides of the pumpkins with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 20-30 minutes or just until soft to touch but not falling in.']

instructions: ['Now grab the pizza dough and divide it into 4 balls (or 8 smaller balls for appetizer size). On a large floured work surface, roll out each pizza ball until you get about an 8-inch circle (or about a 6 inch circle for the appetizer size). Spread each circle with a little bit of BBQ sauce and then sprinkle with equal amounts of gouda and cheddar cheese. Top with equal amounts of the shredded BBQ chicken, broccoli, and then sprinkle with cilantro and parmesan. Tuck in the two sides of the dough and then roll up into a log, sealing the edges together by pinching the dough with your fingers. Place on a lightly greased baking sheet, and continue until all 4 (or 8) are complete.']

instructions: ['While the pasta cooks "fry" the zucchini. In a bowl, whisk the egg. In another bowl, whisk together the panko, flour, parmesan, salt and pepper. Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add olive oil. Dip each zucchini slice in the egg mixture to coat, then dredge through the breadcrumbs, pressing gently to adhere. Place in the skillet and cook until golden. This took me about 3 to 4 minutes per side. When finished, remove the slices and let drain on a paper towel.']

ingredients with measurement: {'whole wheat flour': '1/4', 'panko bread crumbs (If you can find whole wheat': '2', 'low-fat buttermilk': '1/2', 'boneless skinless chicken breast': '1 1/2', 'water': '1 2/3', 'low-sodium soy sauce': '1/3', 'jam (I used raspberry': '1/4', 'ketchup': '1/4', 'hoisin sauce': '3', 'cornstarch': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '1', 'sesame oil': '2', 'garlic': '4', 'grated fresh ginger': '1', 'chili paste': '2', 'green onions': 'seasoning', 'toasted sesame seed': 'seasoning', 'white or brown rice': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 475 degrees. Line a baking sheet with a wire rack or if you do not have a wire rack line with parchment, tin foil or a Silpat. Spray with cooking spray or oil with olive oil.', 'Meanwhile, whisk water, soy sauce, jam, ketchup, hoisin, corn-starch, and vinegar together in bowl. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet with sides over medium heat until shimmering. Add garlic, ginger, and chili paste. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Whisk in soy sauce mixture, bring to simmer, and cook until thickened, about 2 minutes. Return the chicken to the sauce and heat until just warmed through.']

title: Pastrami and Caramelized Onion Grilled Cheese.
ingredients: ['unsalted butter', 'small onion', 'sugar', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'dark beer', 'deli-shaved pastrami or deli-sliced corned beef or leftover corned beef', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'whole-grain mustard', 'grated Jarlsberg cheese', 'pumpernickel or dark rye bread']
ingredients with measurement: {'unsalted butter': '1 1/2', 'small onion': '1', 'sugar': '1/2', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper': 'seasoning', 'dark beer': '3/4', 'deli-shaved pastrami or deli-sliced corned beef or leftover corned beef': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'whole-grain mustard': '1', 'grated Jarlsberg cheese': '1 1/2', 'pumpernickel or dark rye bread': '4'}
instructions: ['Melt 1/2 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over low heat. Add the onion and sprinkle with the sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and pepper to taste. Cook on low heat stirring occasionally, until soft and golden, about 20-25 minutes (to speed the process up you can cover the pan). Add the beer and continue cooking, stirring occasionally until the onions are extremely tender and the liquid is slightly syrupy, about 8 more minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in Worcestershire sauce and mustard. Transfer the onions to a small bowl and set aside.']

title: Buffalo Chicken Quinoa Salad with Broccoli
ingredients: ['quinoa', 'hot sauce', 'olive oil', 'seasoned salt', 'boneless skinless chicken breast', 'broccoli florets', 'shredded carrots', 'shredded cabbage', 'blue cheese crumbles', 'avocado, sliced', 'green onions chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'quinoa': '1', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'olive oil': '1/3', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breast': '3/4', 'broccoli florets': '1', 'shredded carrots': '3/4', 'shredded cabbage': '3/4', 'blue cheese crumbles': '1/2', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'green onions chopped': '4'}
instructions: ['Cook the quinoa according to package directions.', 'Meanwhile, make the buffalo sauce dressing. In a medium bowl combine the olive oil, hot sauce, and seasoned salt. Whisk to combine. Set aside.', 'Heat a medium size skillet over medium high heat. Add a tablespoon of olive oil and cook the chicken for about 5 minutes or until cooked through. Add 1/4 cup or so of the buffalo sauce and cook until the chicken absorbs the sauce. Add the broccoli and cook 3-5 minutes or until the broccoli is tender. Remove from the heat.', 'In a large salad bowl, toss together the cooked quinoa, chicken, broccoli, carrots, shredded cabbage, and as much of the dressing as desired. Add the blue cheese and half of the green onions. Toss again and serve warm with extra blue cheese crumbles, the remaining green onions, and avocado.']

title: Cajun Shrimp Tacos with homemade Hard Shell Tacos
ingredients: ['dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'dried basil', 'cayenne', 'creole seasoning', 'cajun seasoning', 'black pepper', 'salt', 'corn tortillas', 'olive oil', 'yellow onion', 'garlic', 'uncooked shrimp', 'small red bell pepper', 'small orange bell pepper', 'can fire-roasted diced tomatoes', 'avocado', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'dried oregano': '1', 'dried thyme': '1', 'dried basil': '1', 'cayenne': '1/2', 'creole seasoning': '1', 'cajun seasoning': '1', 'black pepper': '1', 'salt': '1', 'corn tortillas': '8', 'olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion': '1/2', 'garlic': '2', 'uncooked shrimp': '2', 'small red bell pepper': '1', 'small orange bell pepper': '1', 'can fire-roasted diced tomatoes': '1', 'avocado': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['In a glass measuring cup or small bowl combine the oregano, thyme, basil, cayenne, creole seasoning, cajun seasoning, pepper, and salt. Whisk to combine. Working with four tortillas at a time, microwave them for 1-2 minutes. Quickly rub with olive oil and sprinkle one side with the spice mixture. Just do a sprinkle, about 1/2 teaspoon to 3/4 teaspoon, on each tortilla reserving the rest of the spice mixture for later. Place tortillas on a taco mold if you have one. If not, invert a regular-sized muffin tin. Fold the tortillas gently and prop up between the bottom of 4 muffin cups. Bake at 450ºF for 5-7 minutes or until crisp and lightly browned. Repeat with remaining tortillas.']

title: Poblano Chicken Tortilla Soup
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts', 'spicy taco seasoning', 'salt and black pepper', 'red enchilada sauce', 'salsa verde', 'broth', 'hot sauce (optional)', 'salted butter', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'yogurt, shredded cheddar, avocado, plus lots of limes and green onions for serving', 'tortilla chips, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts': '1', 'spicy taco seasoning': '1', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red enchilada sauce': '3', 'salsa verde': '2', 'broth': '3-4', 'hot sauce (optional)': '1/4', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'yogurt, shredded cheddar, avocado, plus lots of limes and green onions for serving': 'seasoning', 'tortilla chips, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large soup pot, set over medium heat, cook together the olive oil, onion, poblanos, and garlic for 5 minutes, until fragrant. Add the chicken, taco seasoning, and season with salt and pepper. Pour over the enchilada sauce, salsa verde, and 3 cups of broth.\xa0Stir in the hot sauce and butter.', '2. Still set over medium heat, bring to a simmer, cook 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked. Shred the chicken using two forks. Stir in the cilantro and a handful of cheddar cheese.', '3. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with tortilla chips. Finish as desired with a dollop of yogurt, cheese, green onions, avocado, and cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Tzatziki and Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'smoked paprika', 'dried oregano', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'turmeric', 'salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'sweet potatoes, sliced', 'sliced dill pickles, pepperoncini, pickled red onions, and sun-dried tomatoes', 'mixed herbs (dill, basil, parsley, cilantro, etc)', 'sesame seeds', 'Tzakiki sauce', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'tahini', 'garlic', 'lemon juice', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'dried oregano': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'turmeric': '1/2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'sweet potatoes, sliced': '3', 'sliced dill pickles, pepperoncini, pickled red onions, and sun-dried tomatoes': '1-2', 'mixed herbs (dill, basil, parsley, cilantro, etc)': '1', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'tahini': '1/2', 'garlic': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Rub a baking sheet with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, mix the chicken, paprika, oregano, garlic powder, onion powder, turmeric, salt, and pepper. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Add the sweet potatoes to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through. Toss and cook another 5 minutes until the chicken and potatoes are crisp.', '3. Meanwhile, make the tahini sauce. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water, or use pickle juice, in a jar and whisk until smooth. Add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt.', '4. To make the pickled herb salad. In bowl, toss the pickled vegetables and herbs.', "5. Serve the chicken, sweet potatoes, and tahini sauce with the pickled herb salad, feta cheese, and toasted sesame seeds. Generously add spoonfuls of Tzatziki. I love this over rice, but it's also great on its own."]

title: Baked Garlic Parmesan Boneless Wings
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'salt and black pepper', 'flour or gluten-free flour', 'grated parmesan', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'garlic, grated', 'heavy cream', 'grated parmesan', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh parsley, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or gluten-free flour': '2', 'grated parmesan': '3/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'heavy cream': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'fresh parsley, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, toss together the chicken, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Add the flour and parmesan and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken evenly on the baking sheet. Bake 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until it begins to brown, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the\xa0garlic\xa0and then slowly\xa0pour in the cream. Whisk in the parmesan and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer the sauce for 3-5 minutes, whisking until smooth. Keep warm over low heat.', '4. Pour the parmesan sauce over the chicken and toss the chicken up in the sauce.', '5. Serve the chicken and parmesan sauce with fresh parsley. Ideally, add some home-cut fries on the side too. YUM!']

title: Pomodoro Pepperoni Pizza
ingredients: ['fired roasted crushed tomatoes', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'honey', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste', 'salt and black pepper', 'ball of pizza dough', 'sesame seeds', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'fresh basil leaves', 'pepperoni, sliced']
ingredients with measurement: {'fired roasted crushed tomatoes': '1', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salted butter': '4', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'honey': '2', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste': '1', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ball of pizza dough': '1/3- 1/2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1/2', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1/2', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'pepperoni, sliced': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. In a saucepan, combine the tomatoes, hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, honey, and Calabrian chili paste (use this to your taste). Set over medium heat and cook for 10 minutes until thickened. Season with salt and pepper', "3. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's thin (about a 10-12 inch circle/square). Transfer the dough to a parchment-lined baking sheet.", '3. Spread the tomato sauce over the dough. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Add the mozzarella, provolone, and fontina. Arrange the basil and pepperoni over the cheese.', '4. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven. Slice and enjoy! Sprinkle parmesan on top!']

title: Simple Crockpot Coconut Beef Curry
ingredients: ['shallots, halved', 'fresh ginger, sliced', 'garlic, smashed', 'tomato paste', 'fresno or jalapeño, seeded if desired', 'bone-in beef short ribs', 'yellow curry powder', 'paprika', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'cinnamon', 'salt and black pepper', 'crushed tomatoes', 'coconut milk', 'butter or ghee', 'apple cider vinegar', 'honey', 'chopped cilantro and green onion, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'shallots, halved': '6', 'fresh ginger, sliced': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '8', 'tomato paste': '2', 'fresno or jalapeño, seeded if desired': '1', 'bone-in beef short ribs': '5', 'yellow curry powder': '3', 'paprika': '1', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1-2', 'cinnamon': '1/2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed tomatoes': '1', 'coconut milk': '1', 'butter or ghee': '3', 'apple cider vinegar': '1', 'honey': '2', 'chopped cilantro and green onion, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the curry paste. Add the shallots, ginger, garlic, fresno/jalapeño, and tomato paste to a blender. Pulse until a paste forms.', '2. Preheat the oven to 325° F. In a large, oven-safe brasier, season the short ribs with salt and pepper. Add the curry powder, paprika, turmeric, cayenne, and cinnamon. Add the curry paste. Toss the ribs in the seasonings and curry paste to coat. Pour over the crushed tomatoes and coconut milk. Add the butter, vinegar, and honey. Toss to lightly mix.', '3. \xa0Cover and roast for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until the short ribs are tender and falling off the bone.', '5. Lightly shred the ribs and discard the bones. Drain any excess grease away from the sauce. Toss the meat into the creamy curry sauce.', '6. Serve the ribs and sauce over rice. Top with cilantro and green onion.']

title: Easy Baked Spicy Sesame Butter Chicken
ingredients: ['small boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garam masala', 'cumin', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'tomato paste', 'cold, salted butter, sliced', 'sesame seeds', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving', 'salted butter', 'chili flakes', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'small boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garam masala': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste': '1-2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'cold, salted butter, sliced': '2', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'steamed rice and naan, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': '1', 'paprika': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. In a baking dish, toss together the chicken, yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, turmeric, cayenne pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt. Let sit 5 minutes.', '2. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '3. To the chicken, add the onion, then pour over the coconut milk. Add the tomato paste. Stir until creamy and well-mixed. Arrange the butter slices over the chicken. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake 30-40 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Top with cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, melt the butter, chili flakes, and paprika together. Cook until the butter is browning. Remove from the heat.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice with chili butter and naan. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Chipotle Honey Pot Roast Tacos
ingredients: ['yellow onions, sliced', 'chili powder', 'chipotle chile powder', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'garlic powder', 'dried oregano', 'pink Himalayan salt', 'chuck roast', 'fresh orange juice', 'honey', 'salsa verde', 'hard or soft taco shells, warmed', 'cilantro, green onion, avocado, and crumbled cotija cheese, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'yellow onions, sliced': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'chipotle chile powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'pink Himalayan salt': '1', 'chuck roast': '1', 'fresh orange juice': '1', 'honey': '1', 'salsa verde': '1', 'hard or soft taco shells, warmed': '12', 'cilantro, green onion, avocado, and crumbled cotija cheese, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 325° F.', '2. Arrange the onions in the bottom of a large, oven-safe Dutch oven.', '3. Pour over the orange juice, 3/4 cup water, and the honey. Cover and roast for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until very tender.', '4. Crank the heat on the oven up to 425° F. Uncover and cook for 10 minutes, until deeply caramelized on top. Remove the meat from the pot and shred it using two forks.', '5. Mix the salsa verde with 1 cup of the braising sauce – season with salt.', '6. Stuff the beef and onions into the warmed taco shells and top with cilantro, avocado, and cheese. Serve with salsa verde. Enjoy!', 'Crockpot', '1. Arrange the onions in the bottom of the crockpot bowl.', '3. In a bowl, mix the chipotle, chili powder, paprika, cumin, garlic powder, oregano, and season with 1 tablespoon of salt. Place the roast over the onions, then rub all over with the spice mix. Pour over the orange juice, 3/4 cup water, and the honey. Cover and cook on LOW for 5 hours or on HIGH for 3 hours.', '4. Remove the meat from the crockpot and shred it using two forks.', '5. Mix the salsa verde with 1 cup of the braising sauce – season with salt.', '6. Stuff the beef and onions into the warmed taco shells and top with cilantro, avocado, and cheese.
