title: Greek Chicken Bowls with Creamy Tahini Feta Sauce
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Dijon mustard', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian/Greek seasoning (see notes)', 'honey', 'chili flakes, salt, and black pepper', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'chopped kale', 'pitted Greek olives', 'peperoncini', 'sesame seeds or pine nuts', 'rice, for serving', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'tahini', 'garlic, grated', 'lemon juice', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'Italian/Greek seasoning (see notes)': '1', 'honey': '1', 'chili flakes, salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '1 1/2', 'chopped kale': '3', 'pitted Greek olives': '1/2', 'peperoncini': '1/4', 'sesame seeds or pine nuts': '3', 'rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '4-6', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'tahini': '3', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'lemon juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the chicken with 2 tablespoons olive oil, the Dijon, garlic, Greek/Italian seasoning, honey, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Bake 15 minutes, toss and bake another 5-10 minutes – or until cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, combine the kale, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, olives, pepperoncini, sesame seeds, salt, and chili flakes. If desired, add the kale to the sheet pan with chicken during the last 1-2 minutes of cooking to wilt the kale.', '4. To make the feta sauce. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt and chili flakes.', '5. Serve the kale salad and chicken over bowls of rice. Drizzle over the feta sauce and spicy oil. Top with dill.']

title: Easy Spicy Broccoli Cheddar Potato Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili powder', 'salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour', 'bone broth', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'chopped broccoli florets', 'milk', 'salsa verde', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'chopped green, onion for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chili powder': '1/2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour': '1/4', 'bone broth': '4', 'Russet potatoes, peeled and chopped': '2', 'chopped broccoli florets': '3', 'milk': '2', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1-2', 'chopped green, onion for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot set over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened, 5 minutes. Mix in the oregano and chili powder. Season with salt and pepper. Whisk in the flour and cook for about 2 minutes.', '2. Pour over the broth and stir in the potatoes and broccoli. Partially cover and simmer over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, until the potatoes are very soft. Use a potato masher or immersion blender to lightly blend the soup. I like to leave my soup chunky.', '3. Stir in the milk, salsa verde, and cheddar cheese. Cook for 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Season with salt and pepper. If needed, thin with additional broth.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls. Top, as desired, with yogurt/sour cream, cheese, oregano, and green onions. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Sun-dried Tomato Pesto Turkey Sandwich
ingredients: ['tahini', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon juice', 'Dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan', 'Ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'basil pesto', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, sliced', 'sliced pepperoncini', 'thin slices deli-style turkey', 'gouda or havarti cheese', 'provolone cheese', 'avocado, sliced', 'fresh broccoli sprouts/microgreens']
ingredients with measurement: {'tahini': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'lemon juice': '3', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'Ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, sliced': '1/2', 'sliced pepperoncini': '1/2', 'thin slices deli-style turkey': '6-12', 'gouda or havarti cheese': '6', 'provolone cheese': '6', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'fresh broccoli sprouts/microgreens': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a bowl or glass jar. Thin as needed with cold water (using up to 1/3 cup water). Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. To make the sandwich. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Lay the bread, cut side up, on a cutting board. Working with the top piece of ciabatta, pull out some of the insides to create a space for the filling. Spread the Caesar dressing over the bottom piece of bread, then add the basil pesto. Now add the sun-dried tomatoes and sliced pepperoncini. Layer the cheese and turkey on top and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 15 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '3. Remove from the oven. Arrange the sliced avocado over the turkey. Add the sprouts, then drizzle with additional dressing. Add the top half of the ciabatta and gently push down on the sandwich. Bake another 5 minutes until toasted.', '4. Remove from the oven. Slice into six sandwiches. Serve and enjoy!']

instructions: ['1. In a shallow dish, mix the tamari, ginger juice, ginger, garlic, toasted sesame oil, and season with chili flakes. Add the salmon, getting them mostly submerged. Marinate for 15 minutes. For the best flavor, marinate for one hour or up to all day.', '2. Make the salad. Combine all ingredients and season with salt.', '3. When ready, heat a couple tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over high heat. Rub the salmon with brown sugar. Place the salmon skin side face up in the skillet. Then, remove from the heat.', '4. Spoon the salmon over the bowls of rice. Top with the cucumber salad and a dollop of spicy mayo. Enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Miso Ginger Beef and Broccoli

title: Lemony Pesto Chicken Noodle Soup

title: Brown Butter Pesto Lasagna
ingredients: ['dry lasagna noodles', 'salted butter', 'sliced mushrooms', 'salt and black pepper', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried sage', 'dried thyme', 'chili flakes', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'dry white wine or broth', 'shredded provolone', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained', 'basil pesto']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry lasagna noodles': '1', 'salted butter': '1', 'sliced mushrooms': '2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '8', 'dried sage': '2', 'dried thyme': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk': '2', 'dry white wine or broth': '2', 'shredded provolone': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '2', 'frozen spinach, thawed and drained': '2', 'basil pesto': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350° F. Lightly butter a 9×13 inch lasagna pan. Cook the noodles according to package directions.', '2. Melt 2 tablespoon butter in a large skillet set over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden. Add the remaining 6 tablespoons of butter. Allow the butter to brown lightly around the mushrooms for 5 minutes.', '3. Add the garlic, sage, thyme, and chili flakes. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 minute. Add the milk and broth. Bring to a boil and stir for 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in the provolone and 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is fully melted and the sauce is smooth. Set the cheese sauce aside.', '4. In a bowl, combine the spinach and pesto.', '5. Spread 1/4 of the cheese sauce in the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Top with 3-4 lasagna sheets. Spread with 1/2 the spinach/pesto, then another 1/4 of the cheese sauce. Place another 3-4 lasagna noodles on top and then top with the remaining spinach/pesto, 1 cup mozzarella, and another 1/4 of the cheese sauce. Add the remaining lasagna noodles and pour the remaining cheese sauce over top. Top with 1 cup of mozzarella and 1/2 cup of parmesan cheese.', '6. Bake, covered for 30 minutes, then uncovered for 15 minutes more. Let sit 10 minutes before serving.']

title: Skillet White Pesto Chicken and Orzo
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, oil drained', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'Italian seasoning', 'salted butter', 'garlic chopped', 'dry orzo pasta', 'chili flakes', 'chicken broth', 'heavy cream', 'basil pesto', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh thyme']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, oil drained': '1/2', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'garlic chopped': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'chicken broth': '1 1/2', 'heavy cream': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh thyme': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Add the flour to a shallow bowl. Dredge the chicken through the flour and toss to coat.', '3. Set the skillet with oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes per side. Sprinkle the chicken with 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. Remove the chicken from the skillet to a plate.', '4. To the same skillet, add the butter, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, garlic, orzo, and season with chili flakes. Cook until lightly golden, 2 minutes. Add the broth. Bring to a boil, cook for 3-5 minutes, then add the cream, pesto, and sun-dried tomatoes. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate back into the skillet.\xa0Sprinkle over the parmesan. Transfer to the oven and cook, uncovered, for 10 minutes, until the sauce is bubbling around the chicken.', '5. Serve the chicken, orzo, and sauce topped with thyme. YUM.']

title: Skillet Creamy Chicken and Parmesan Gnocchi
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'paprika', 'cayenne', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'thick cut bacon,', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'salted butter', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic,  chopped', 'dry white wine wine', 'chicken bone broth', 'heavy cream', 'roughly chopped kale', 'potato gnocchi', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'thick cut bacon,': '4', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic,  chopped': '6', 'dry white wine wine': '1', 'chicken bone broth': '1/2', 'heavy cream': '1/2-1', 'roughly chopped kale': '2', 'potato gnocchi': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven 400° F. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Add the flour, paprika, cayenne, and 1 tablespoon of thyme to a shallow bowl. Dredge the chicken through the flour mixture and toss to coat.', '2. Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. During the last minute of cooking, add the rosemary. Remove the bacon to a plate.', '3. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon butter, then add the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes per side. Add another tablespoon of butter and allow the butter to brown around the chicken, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, add 1 more tablespoon of butter, the shallots, garlic, a tablespoon of thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the wine, then the broth. Simmer for 5 minutes, pour in the cream. Add the kale and gnocchi. Cook for 5 minutes, until the gnocchi float. Slide the chicken back into the skillet. Sprinkle over the parmesan. Transfer to the oven and cook, uncovered, for 10 minutes, until the sauce is bubbling around the chicken.', '4. Serve the chicken, gnocchi, and sauce topped with bacon. YUM.']

title: Creamy Green Chili Tortilla Soup
ingredients: ['yellow onion', 'poblano, chopped', 'jalapeños, seeded and chopped', 'cumin', 'taco seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'salsa verde', 'diced green chiles', 'chicken broth', 'cream cheese, melted', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'lime zest and juice', 'lots of salted tortilla chips', 'yogurt, avocado, and green onion, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'yellow onion': '1', 'poblano, chopped': '1', 'jalapeños, seeded and chopped': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'taco seasoning': '2-3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'salsa verde': '3', 'diced green chiles': '2', 'chicken broth': '3-4', 'cream cheese, melted': '6', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'lime zest and juice': 'seasoning', 'lots of salted tortilla chips': 'seasoning', 'yogurt, avocado, and green onion, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the poblano, jalapeños, cumin, taco seasoning, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook for 5-10 minutes, until very fragrant. Add the chicken, salsa verde, canned chiles, and 4 cups of broth.\xa0 Season with salt and pepper. Partially cover and simmer over medium-low heat for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '2. Melt the cream cheese in the microwave for 10-15 seconds.', '3. Pull the chicken out and shred using two forks. Stir in the cream cheese until smooth, then stir in the shredded chicken and cheddar cheese. Cook for 5 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro and lime juice.', '4. Ladle the soup into bowls and top with tortilla chips. Then finish as desired with a dollop of yogurt, avocado, green onions, and cilantro. Enjoy!']

title: Charred Tomato Basil Chicken Florentine Pasta
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'sourdough bread, torn', 'prosciutto', 'pistachios', 'fresh chopped herbs, oregano, rosemary, thyme', 'linguine or other long cut pasta', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken breasts, diced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, chopped', 'dry white wine', 'whole milk', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'baby spinach, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'grated mozzarella', 'fresh basil, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'sourdough bread, torn': '4', 'prosciutto': '2', 'pistachios': '1/4', 'fresh chopped herbs, oregano, rosemary, thyme': '1/4', 'linguine or other long cut pasta': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chicken breasts, diced': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'dry white wine': '1/4', 'whole milk': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'baby spinach, chopped': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'grated mozzarella': '1/2', 'fresh basil, torn': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the breadcrumbs. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Arrange the butter, bread, and prosciutto on a baking sheet. Bake 10-15 minutes until the bread is toasted and the prosciutto is cripsy. Add everything to a food processor. Add the pistachios and herbs. Season with salt. Pulse into fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crumble the mix with your hands.', '3. To make the pasta. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 cup of the pasta cooking water. Drain the pasta.', '4. Meanwhile, combine the olive oil, chicken, salt, and pepper in a large skillet. Set over medium heat and cook for 5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.', '5. To the same skillet, add 3 tablespoons of butter and the tomatoes. Cook for 2 minutes, then stir and cook another 2 minutes, until the tomatoes are blistered. Season with salt and pepper. Remove the tomatoes from the skillet.', '6. Add 3 tablespoons butter and the garlic, cook for 1 minute, until the butter is browning. Add the wine, simmer 1 minute, then add the milk, parmesan, and spinach, stirring until melted and creamy. Add the pasta and chicken. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes.', '7. Mix in the mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. Remove from the heat. Divide the pasta among plates and top each plate with breadcrumbs and fresh basil.']

title: Roasted Cherry Tomato Pizza

title: 20 Minute Sticky Ginger Sesame Pineapple Beef

ingredients with measurement: {'large egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour or gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'chicken breast cutlets': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'cayenne pepper, to your taste': '1/2-2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'corn': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '3', 'salted butter': '4', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1', 'plain Greek yogurt or mayo': '1/3', 'fresh lime juice': '2', 'crumbled cotija cheese': '3/4', 'grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Place the egg and flour in separate shallow bowls. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the egg, and then through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on a plate.', '2. Mix the spices. In a bowl, combine the chili powder, paprika, cayenne, and a pinch of salt.', '3. Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.\xa0Add the chicken and cook on both sides until golden, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan.', '4. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the onion to the same skillet. Cook until soft, 5 minutes. Add the corn, garlic, 2 teaspoons of the spice mix, and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the corn is softened, 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low. Mix in the cream cheese until melted and creamy. Stir in the milk and 1/2 cup water. Slide the chicken into the sauce. Cook until warmed through, 5 minutes.', '5. In a separate skillet, melt the butter until golden. Mix in 3 teaspoons of the spice mix, plus a pinch of chili flakes and salt. Cook another minute, then remove from the heat.', '6. Mix the Greek yogurt/mayo and lime juice with a pinch of salt.', '7. Remove the skillet from the stove. Serve the chicken and corn topped with grilled corn. Drizzle over the spicy butter and the Greek yogurt/mayo salt. Sprinkle on the crumbled cotija cheese and cilantro.']

title: 20 Minute Ginger Pineapple Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'ground chicken', 'black pepper and chili flakes', 'salted butter', 'Thai red curry paste', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'cashews or peanuts', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresh chopped Thai basil or basil', 'sweet Thai chili sauce and sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '3', 'ground chicken': '1 1/2', 'black pepper and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'Thai red curry paste': '1-3', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '1 1/2', 'cashews or peanuts': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'honey': '1-2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'fresh chopped Thai basil or basil': '1/4', 'sweet Thai chili sauce and sesame seeds': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the oil, chicken, and black pepper. Cook over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chili paste, butter, garlic, and ginger. Cook 2 minutes, until the butter browns and the chicken gets crispy.', '2. Mix in the peppers, 3/4 cup pineapple, and cashews. Cook another 2-5 minutes. Pour over the tamari and honey. Cook until the sauce coats the chicken, 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. In a bowl, toss 3/4 cup pineapple with the cilantro and basil.', '4. Serve the chicken, peppers, and sweet chili sauce over bowls of rice. Top with the pineapple/cilantro/basil. Add the chopped green onions, and if desired, serve with sweet Thai chili sauce and sesame seeds. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Hawaiian Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, for greasing', 'pizza dough, at room temperature', 'salted butter', 'sriracha', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'garlic, chopped', 'pickled jalapeños', 'sliced pepperoncini', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'brick cheese or whole milk mozzarella, cubed', 'provolone cheese, cubed', 'cheddar cheese, cubed', 'pepperoni, sliced', 'jalapeño, thinly sliced', 'green onion, cilantro, and basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, for greasing': 'seasoning', 'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'sriracha': '1/2', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'sliced pepperoncini': '2', 'fresh pineapple chunks': '1', 'brick cheese or whole milk mozzarella, cubed': '1 1/2', 'provolone cheese, cubed': '1/2', 'cheddar cheese, cubed': '1/2', 'pepperoni, sliced': '8', 'jalapeño, thinly sliced': '1', 'green onion, cilantro, and basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Position an oven rack in the bottom half of the oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F.', '2. Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan (9×13). Gently press the dough until it covers most of the sheet pan. Cover and let sit while you prep the pizza.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a bowl, mix 1 tablespoon melted butter, the sriracha, tamari, and 2 cloves of garlic.', '4. To assemble. Spoon over the sauce. Add the pickled jalapeños, pepperoncini, and pineapple. Top with cheese, then pepperoni. Bake until bubbly and a crispy cheese crust has formed, 10 to 15 minutes. Using a spatula, loosen the edges and slide onto a cutting board.', '5. Melt 2 tablespoons butter with 2 cloves chopped garlic. Let the garlic turn golden and crisp, then add the sliced jalapeños and remove from the heat. Spoon the butter over the pizza.', '6. Slice the pizza into squares and serve with fresh herbs and ranch, if desired.']

title: Hawaiian Chicken Tacos with Jalapeño Pineapple Salsa

title: One Pan Lemon Pepper Yogurt Chicken and Rice
ingredients: ['chicken thighs or breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'lemon zest', 'garlic, chopped', 'black pepper, using more to your taste', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'paprika', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and chili flakes', 'dry basmati rice', 'salted butter', 'roughly chopped broccoli']

title: Chicken Cobb Salad with Avocado Ranch

title: Baked Chipotle Salmon Sushi Cups
ingredients: ['salmon, cut into bite-size chunks', 'mayo', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'nori seaweed wraps', 'cooked rice', 'sushi ginger', 'olive oil or sesame oil', 'green onion, avocado, and sesame seeds, for serving', 'mayo', 'cream cheese', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon, cut into bite-size chunks': '1 1/2', 'mayo': '1/3', 'chopped chipotle in adobo': '1-2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'nori seaweed wraps': '12-24', 'cooked rice': '2', 'sushi ginger': '12', 'olive oil or sesame oil': '1-2', 'green onion, avocado, and sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cream cheese': '1/3', 'honey': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.\xa0Lightly oil a cupcake tin.', '2. In a bowl, toss the salmon with the mayo, chipotle in adobo, and tamari. Season with pepper.', '3. Arrange the nori sheets on a cutting board. Add 3 tablespoons of rice to each, then gently fold and fit into the prepared cupcake molds. If the rice is sticking to your fingers, just wet your hands. Lay 1 to 2 pieces of ginger over the rice, then spoon the salmon chunks evenly over the ginger. Drizzle the tops with olive oil.', '4. Bake for 10-15 minutes, until the salmon is cooked to your liking. During the last minute of cooking, switch the oven broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until crisping. Use a butter knife to lift the cups up, then serve as desired. I do avocado, spicy mayo, green onions, and sesame seeds. Place the tamari on the side for dipping.', '5. To make the mayo, melt the cream cheese in the microwave for 20-25 seconds. Whisk in all remaining ingredients.']

title: One Skillet Tzatziki Chicken and Orzo
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'tomato paste', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic, chopped', 'lemon zest and 2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless chicken thighs or breast', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme', 'dry orzo pasta', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'mixed herbs, such as basil and thyme', 'Tzakiki sauce']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'tomato paste': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'lemon zest and 2 tablespoons lemon juice': '1', 'chili flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless chicken thighs or breast': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1 1/2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'mixed herbs, such as basil and thyme': '1/2', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a bowl, toss together the chicken, 2 tablespoons olive oil, tomato paste, paprika, garlic, lemon zest, chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '3. Add the chicken to a large oven-safe skillet set over high heat. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the butter, then remove the chicken from the skillet. Add the orzo and thyme. Cook until toasted, about 1 minute. Add the sun-dried tomatoes, broth, and lemon juice.\xa0Season with salt and pepper. Stir in the fresh herbs. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate back into the skillet.', '4. title: Baked 4 Cheese Butternut Squash Rigatoni.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'shallot, halved', 'garlic, smashed', 'fresh oregano leaves', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'ricotta cheese', 'rigatoni or other short cut pasta', 'milk or cream', 'Italian seasoning', 'fresh baby spinach', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'shredded fontina or provolone cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'shallot, halved': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '6-10', 'fresh oregano leaves': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ricotta cheese': '1', 'rigatoni or other short cut pasta': '1', 'milk or cream': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped': '1/2', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'shredded fontina or provolone cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, shallot, garlic, oregano, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Bake 20-25 minutes, until the squash is tender.', '3. Pop the garlic cloves out of their skin. Add the butternut squash, shallot, garlic, and ricotta to a food processor. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. In a large, oven-safe skillet with sides, bring 3 1/2 cups water to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Stir in the pureed butternut squash. Add the milk/ cream, Italian seasoning, spinach, and sun-dried tomatoes, stirring to combine. Stir in the gouda and parmesan until melted.', '5. Remove from the heat and top with the fontina cheese. Bake 15-20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and gooey. Eat!']

title: Instant Pot Chicken and Spinach Ramen

title: Crockpot Garlic Butter Chicken Meatballs with Creamy Orzo
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'Italian seasoning', 'dijon mustard', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'onion, quartered', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'salted butter', 'rosemary', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh baby spinach', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1 1/2', 'Italian seasoning': '3', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'onion, quartered': '1', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'rosemary': '1', 'dry orzo pasta': '2', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, Italian seasoning, dijon, and 1/2 cup parmesan to a bowl. Season with salt, and pepper. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs). Add olive oil and place the meatballs in the bowl of your crockpot.', '2. Pour over the wine and 1/2 cup water. Add the onion and garlic. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meatballs and garlic from the slow cooker and place on a baking sheet.', '3. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the orzo, and 1 cup water. Cover and cook 20-30 minutes, or until the orzo is al dente. If the orzo needs more liquid, add additional water. Stir in the spinach, sun-dried tomatoes, cream, and 1/2 cup parmesan.', '4. Arrange the butter and the rosemary around the meatballs and garlic, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop and mix with the butter and rosemary on the sheet pan. Toss the meatballs in the butter.', '5. Serve the meatballs over the orzo.']

title: Slow Cooker Creamy White Bean Noodle Soup with Rosemary Bacon

title: Crispy Chipotle Chicken Cream Cheese Taquitos
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'chili powder', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'beer', 'cream cheese', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese', 'corn tortillas, warmed', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'buttermilk', 'cilantro', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'beer': '1', 'cream cheese': '4', 'shredded pepper jack or cheddar cheese': '1', 'corn tortillas, warmed': '16-20', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'cilantro': '1/2', 'dried chives': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4 – 1/2 cup'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chili powder, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, and salt. Add the beer. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cream cheese.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 2 tablespoons of the chicken down the middle of the tortilla. Top with shredded cheese. Roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the taquitos topped with ranch and any other desired toppings.']

title: Sage Brown Butter Pumpkin Pasta Alfredo
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'fresh sage leaves plus 2 teaspoon chopped sage', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'pumpkin purée', 'apple cider', 'whole milk', 'grated parmesan', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'nutmeg', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'fettuccine or similar cut of pasta']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'fresh sage leaves plus 2 teaspoon chopped sage': '1/4', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'pumpkin purée': '1', 'apple cider': '1/3', 'whole milk': '2', 'grated parmesan': '1', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1/2', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'fettuccine or similar cut of pasta': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Melt together the butter and sage leaves in a large skillet set over medium heat. Cook until the butter is browning and the sage is crisp, 4 minutes. Remove the sage leaves from the butter.', '2. Reduce the heat to low, add the remaining chopped sage, the garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook 1 minute, then stir in the pumpkin and apple cider. Simmer 2-3 minutes, until thickened slightly. Slowly whisk in the milk, whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until thickened slightly. Stir in the parmesan, gouda, and nutmeg. Season with salt and pepper.', '4. Toss in the pasta and cook 3-5 minutes, then remove from the heat. Divide the pasta between plates and top with crispy sage. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Creamy Butternut Squash Butter Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts/thighs, cut into bite-size chunks', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garam masala', 'paprika', 'cumin', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper, use to taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'large yellow onion, chopped', 'cubed butternut squash', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili flakes, use to taste', 'tomato paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts/thighs, cut into bite-size chunks': '1 1/2', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garam masala': '2', 'paprika': '1', 'cumin': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper, use to taste': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'large yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'chili flakes, use to taste': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '1', 'full-fat coconut milk': '1', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. in a bowl, toss together the chicken, yogurt, 2 teaspoons garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 – 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt. Let sit 5-10 minutes.', '2. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until browned, about 2 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons of butter and toss to coat the chicken. Remove the chicken from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the skillet, add the onion and butternut squash, tossing with the butter in the skillet. Cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add 2 tablespoons butter, the garlic, ginger, 1 tablespoon garam masala, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 – 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, paprika, and the chili flakes. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the tomato paste and continue cooking another 3-4 minutes.', '4. Reduce the heat to low.\xa0Add 1 cup water and the coconut milk. Stir to combine, bring the sauce to a simmer, cook 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. If the sauce seems too thick, thin with 1/2 to 1 cup additional coconut milk. Add the chicken and any juices in the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until the sauce thickens slightly, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve the chicken, squash, and sauce over bowls of rice with fresh naan. Enjoy!']

title: Chili Crisp Butternut Squash Dumplings in Ginger Soy Broth
ingredients: ['cubed butternut squash', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'spicy/regular curry powder', 'honey', 'green onions chopped', 'black pepper', 'round dumplings or wonton wrappers', 'sesame seeds', 'salted butter or olive oil', 'medium shallots, sliced', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'garlic, chopped', 'dry white wine', 'low sodium chicken/vegetable broth', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'cinnamon stick', 'chili crisp sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cubed butternut squash': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'spicy/regular curry powder': '1', 'honey': '2', 'green onions chopped': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'round dumplings or wonton wrappers': '24-26', 'sesame seeds': '1/4', 'salted butter or olive oil': '2', 'medium shallots, sliced': '3-4', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dry white wine': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken/vegetable broth': '4', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'cinnamon stick': '1', 'chili crisp sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the butternut squash, olive oil, and curry powder. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until tender.', '2. Add the squash, green onions, honey, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Mash together with a fork.', '3. To assemble, spoon 1 tablespoon of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up and around the filling and pinch in the center to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining wrappers.', '4. Place the sesame seeds in a shallow bowl. Brush the bottoms of the dumplings with water and then dredge them in the sesame seeds.', '5. To make the broth. Melt together the butter and shallots in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the wine, cooking until the wine cooks into the shallots, another 5 to 10 minutes, or until the shallots have caramelized. Add ginger and garlic and cook 1 minute. Add the broth, soy sauce, and cinnamon. Simmer over low heat.', '6. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet set over medium heat. Add the dumplings and cook until the bottoms are golden brown, 2-3 minutes. Carefully pour 1/4 cup of water into the skillet. Immediately cover. Turn the heat to medium-low and let the dumplings steam for 4-5 minutes. Remove the dumplings from the skillet to a plate.', '7. Arrange the dumplings in shallow bowls. Ladle the steaming broth over top. Top with chili crisp sauce and green onions. Enjoy!']

title: Butternut Squash Rigatoni Pasta Pie
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'garlic smashed,', 'shallot, halved', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt + black pepper', 'honey', 'milk', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'salted butter', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'rigatoni pasta', 'prosciutto', 'fresh oregano leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cubed butternut squash': '4', 'garlic smashed,': '4', 'shallot, halved': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt + black pepper': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'milk': '1', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'rigatoni pasta': '1', 'prosciutto': '8', 'fresh oregano leaves': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the butternut squash, garlic, shallots, sage, olive oil, honey, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Bake 15 minutes, toss, then bake another 10-15 minutes, until the squash is tender.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 1/2 cups of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '4. Add the roasted butternut squash, garlic, shallots, milk, gouda cheese, and butter, to a food processor. Pour over 1 cup hot pasta water and puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Thin the sauce with additional pasta water.', '5. Grease a 9-inch spring form pan with olive oil. Arrange the rigatoni in the pan, standing on their ends. Pour the butternut sauce over the pasta, pushing the sauce into the holes, filling them up. I used ALL the sauce. Sprinkle over the mozzarella.', '6. Arrange the prosciutto over the cheese. Top with oregano. Bake 25-30 minutes, until the sauce is bubbly. Let sit 5 minutes before serving, then devour.']

title: Crockpot Creamy Garlic Chicken and Gnocchi:
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dijon mustard', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage', 'garlic, cloves peeled and left whole', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'lemon juice', 'salted butter', 'potato or cauliflower gnocchi', 'shredded brussels sprouts', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'fresh chopped sage': '2', 'garlic, cloves peeled and left whole': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'potato or cauliflower gnocchi': '1', 'shredded brussels sprouts': '1 1/2', 'heavy cream or canned full fat coconut milk': '1/3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'fresh basil for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker,\xa0rub the chicken with the olive oil, mustard, sage, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add the garlic cloves. Pour over the wine and lemon juice. Add the parmesan rind, if using. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker place it on a baking sheet.', '3. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the gnocchi, brussels sprouts, and 1/2 cup water. Cover and cook 15 minutes, or until the gnocchi soft. Stir in the cream and parmesan.', '4. Place the butter on the chicken, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. title: Sheet Pan BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'apple cider', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'BBQ sauce', 'chopped fresh chives', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped', 'ranch dressing', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh herbs']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'apple cider': '3/4', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1', 'BBQ sauce': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'ranch dressing': '1/4', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded gouda or cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan': '1/2', 'fresh herbs': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F.', '2. Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Gently press the dough until it covers most of the sheet pan. Cover and let sit while you prep the pizza.', '3. In a large skillet set over medium-high heat combine the olive oil, onions, and a pinch of salt. Cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add half the apple cider and continue cooking another 5 minutes, until the cider has mostly evaporated. Add the remaining cider and cook another 5 minutes or until the onions are golden and caramelized. Remove from the heat.', '4. In a bowl, combine the chicken, 1/3 cup BBQ sauce, chives, and cilantro/parsley.', "5. To assemble. Grab the dough and spread on the ranch, you may not need it all. Add a drizzle of BBQ sauce if you'd like, then layer on the onions, chicken, and cheeses. Sprinkle with cilantro. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh herbs, additional BBQ sauce, and/or ranch. ENJOY!"]

title: Crockpot Crispy Buffalo Chicken Tacos with Jalapeño Ranch
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'black pepper', 'hard shell tacos (see notes for homemade option)', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving', 'chipotle peppers, chopped', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'mayo', 'buttermilk', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'kosher salt', 'chopped fresh chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'hot sauce': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'hard shell tacos (see notes for homemade option)': '12', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chipotle peppers, chopped': '2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'mayo': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4 – 1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2'}

title: Broccoli Cheddar Chicken and Noodle Casserole
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper, to taste', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'milk', 'short cut pasta', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'grated Parmesan cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '2', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '3/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, to taste': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2', 'milk': '1 1/2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'grated Parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and carrot and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Stir in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Add the butter, thyme, paprika, garlic powder, and cayenne, and cook until golden and toasted, 2-3 minutes.', '3. Add the broth and milk. Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat. Add the pasta and broccoli and season with salt and pepper. Scatter the remaining cheese over top of the casserole.', '4. Bake 20 minutes, until the cheese is melted and beginning to brown. Serve warm with additional thyme and fresh basil.']

title: Creamy Tuscan Chicken with Crispy Prosciutto
ingredients: ['thin cut chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'prosciutto, torn', 'shallots, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'Italian seasoning', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'red pepper flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'peeled and chopped raw potatoes', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'dijon mustard', 'lemon juice', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'thin cut chicken breasts': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose or gluten free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'peeled and chopped raw potatoes': '1', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '3/4', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'lemon juice': '3', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'Tuscan kale, roughly chopped': '1', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with Italian seasoning. Place the flour in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Add the prosciutto and cook until crispy all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '3. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet.', '4. Add the shallots and garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes, Italian seasoning, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook 2 minutes. Pour in the broth. Add the potatoes and chicken. Partially cover and cook over medium heat until the potatoes are fork tender, 10-15 minutes.', '5. Remove the lid. Pour in the cream. Add the dijon, lemon juice, parmesan, and Tuscan kale. Cook until the kale is wilted, 5 minutes.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce with crispy prosciutto and fresh basil.']

title: Roasted Garlic Caprese Grilled Cheese

title: Spicy Ginger Sesame Crusted Salmon Bowl

title: Cheesy Pesto Avocado Bacon Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: ['eggs', 'everything bagel spice', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'salted butter', 'baby spinach', 'large tortillas', 'avocado, diced', 'basil pesto', 'cooked bacon, crumbled', 'leftover french fries or roasted potatoes']

instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, everything spice, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '3. Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat. title: Coconut Chicken Meatball Curry with Rice Noodles
ingredients: ['ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'green onions, chopped', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'sesame oil or extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'orange bell pepper, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'grated fresh ginger', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full fat coconut milk', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'peanut butter', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'yellow corn', 'rice noodles', 'juice and zest from 1/2 a lime', 'fresh cilantro and basil']

title: Caramelized Shallot and Bacon Goat Cheese Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, halved or quartered', 'fresh thyme sprigs', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'chili flakes', 'pizza dough, at room temp', 'fig preserves', 'tomato, grated on a box grater', 'garlic, grated', 'crumbled goat cheese', 'cooked bacon', 'fresh basil leaves', 'shredded mozzarella cheese']

On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to a baking sheet. Mix the grated tomato with the garlic, salt, and pepper. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil. Slice and enjoy!']

title: 30 Minute Saucy Ginger Sesame Noodles with Caramelized Mushrooms
ingredients: ['low sodium soy sauce or tamari', 'honey', 'balsamic vinegar', 'rice vinegar', 'creamy peanut butter or tahini', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'Chinese style egg noodles or rice noodles', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth', 'fresh baby spinach, roughly chopped', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced', 'shallots, chopped', 'black pepper', 'raw sesame seeds', 'green onions chopped, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'low sodium soy sauce or tamari': '1/2', 'honey': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'creamy peanut butter or tahini': '3', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'Chinese style egg noodles or rice noodles': '8', 'low sodium vegetable or chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'fresh baby spinach, roughly chopped': '2', 'sesame or extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, sliced': '3', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'raw sesame seeds': '2', 'green onions chopped, for serving': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. Combine 1/2 cup soy sauce, honey, balsamic vinegar, rice vinegar, peanut butter/tahini, molasses, 1 tablespoon ginger, 1 clove garlic, and 1/3 cup water in a bowl.', '2. Cook the noodles according to package directions.\xa0Drain. To the pot used to cook the noodles, add the broth and 1/2 of the soy sauce mixture. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stir in the spinach. Keep warm.', '3. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add the shallots, 1 tablespoon ginger, and 2 cloves garlic. Cook 4-5 minutes, until fragrant. Add 2 tablespoons soy sauce and a large pinch of pepper. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms are caramelized. Add the sesame seeds, cook 2 minutes. title: Skillet Chicken and Broccoli Pot Pie with Garlic Butter Phyllo Crust
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh sage, + 8 whole sage leaves', 'all-purpose flour', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced in half', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'celery,  chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, grated', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'sheets frozen phyllo dough thawed']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '8', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh sage, + 8 whole sage leaves': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '1/2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'boneless skinless chicken breast, sliced in half': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'celery,  chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'roughly chopped broccoli florets': '1 1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '2-4', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'sheets frozen phyllo dough thawed': '12-18'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 375 F.', '2. Melt together the olive oil and 4 tablespoons butter In a large oven safe skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot, 1 tablespoon thyme, and 1 tablespoon sage. Cook until the shallot is fragrant, about 5 minutes. Add the flour and cook until a paste forms and turns golden, 1-2 minutes. Gradually whisk in the wine and broth. Add the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil.', '3. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally for 10 minutes. Stir in the carrots, broccoli, celery, and cayenne, and cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 5 minutes more.', '4. Remove the skillet from the heat, then shred the chicken using 2 forks.', '5. In a small bowl, combine 4 tablespoons melted butter, 1 tablespoon thyme, the garlic, and rosemary.', '6. Place 2 pieces of phyllo on a clean counter, one on top of the other. Brush the melted garlic butter over the phyllo. Top with 2 more sheets of phyllo (one on top of the other), placing it slightly off-center. Butter the phyllo. Top with 2 more sheets of phyllo (one on top of the other), again, placing it slightly off-center to create a circle. Now, repeat this layer with the remaining sheets of phyllo.\xa0Carefully place the phyllo over the skillet. Make 2-3 slits in the top of the dough with a sharp knife. Lay the sage leaves on top of the crust.', '7. Bake until the phyllo is golden brown, 25-30 minutes. Let cool 10 minutes, then serve!']

title: Browned Sage Butter Chicken Piccata with Mushroom Pasta.

ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh sage leaves': '12', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'fresh lemon juice': '1/3', 'capers': '2', 'mixed mushrooms, roughly torn or sliced': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'Pappardelle egg pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1/3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'fresh grated manchego cheese': '1/2'}

Heat the olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. When the oil is shimmers, add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. title: Roasted Butternut Squash Prosciutto Pizza with Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['pizza dough, at room temperature', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash or pumpkin', 'honey', 'chopped fresh sage', 'cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cubed butternut squash or pumpkin': '4', 'honey': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'cinnamon': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2', 'apple cider': '3/4', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'thinly sliced prosciutto, torn': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 position. Preheat the oven to 425° F. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. Place the ball of pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Lightly drizzle olive oil on top of the dough ball. Cover with plastic wrap and let rest.', '3. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, honey, sage, cinnamon, cayenne, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Roast for 15-20 minutes, until the squash is just tender and remove from oven. Increase the heat to 500° F.', '4. Meanwhile, caramelize the onions. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onions and cook 3 minutes, until softened. Add half the apple cider, season with salt and pepper and continue cooking another 5 minutes, until the cider has mostly evaporated. Add the remaining cider and cook another 5 minutes or until the onions are golden and caramelized. Add a pinch of crushed red pepper, cook another minute.\xa0Remove from the heat.', '5. To assemble. Remove the plastic wrap. Gently press the dough until it covers the entire sheet pan. Drizzle the dough lightly with olive oil. Top with the onions, you may not need them all. Add the cheese, then the prosciutto. Arrange the butternut squash on top.', '6. Slide into the preheated 500° F oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza additional crushed red pepper flakes. ENJOY!']

title: Pumpkin Cheese Stuffed Pasta Shell Bolognese Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'lean ground chicken or beef', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'dried oregano', 'fennel seed', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'marinara sauce', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'jumbo shells', 'can pumpkin pureé', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'ground nutmeg', 'provolone cheese, cubed']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'lean ground chicken or beef': '3/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'fennel seed': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'jumbo shells': '1', 'can pumpkin pureé': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '2-3', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'provolone cheese, cubed': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish or a dish of similar size.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 3-5 minutes.\xa0Add the meat, garlic, oregano, fennel, paprika, red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until browned all over, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the marinara and wine. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the pumpkin, fontina, blue cheese (if using), sage, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '5. To assemble, spoon 3/4 of the Bolognese sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Working with one pasta shell at a time, spoon about 1 tablespoon of the pumpkin cheese mix into each shell, placing the filled shell into the baking dish as you go. Spoon the remaining Bolognese sauce over top of the shells. Add the provolone.', '6. Transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake 20-25 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Serve topped with fresh oregano.']

title: One Pot Broccoli Cheddar and Dumplings.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'sweet onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'fresh or frozen broccoli florets', 'bay leaves', 'whole milk', 'nutmeg', 'cayenne pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking powder', 'buttermilk', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'salted butter': '2', 'sweet onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '3', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '6-7', 'fresh or frozen broccoli florets': '3', 'bay leaves': '2', 'whole milk': '1/2', 'nutmeg': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'all-purpose flour': '1 1/2', 'baking powder': '2', 'buttermilk': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil and butter together in a large soup pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 3-5 minutes.\xa0Add the carrots and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes.', '3. Pour in the broth. Add the broccoli, bay leaves, nutmeg, and cayenne, and bring to a boil over high heat. Cover and cook for 10-15 minutes or until the broccoli is tender.', '4. Meanwhile, make the dumplings. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the buttermilk, parmesan cheese, and sage, mixing until just combined.', '5. Remove the bay leaves from the soup. Transfer 3/4 of the soup to a blender and blend until the broccoli is finely chopped. Return the soup to the pot and bring the soup to a boil over medium-high heat. Drop a heaping tablespoon of the dough into the soup, adding about 6 dumplings to the soup at a time. Cover, and cook for about 8-10\xa0minutes, until the dumplings are cooked through and puffy.', '6. Carefully move the dumplings aside, or if easier, remove dumpling from the soup, and stir in the milk and cheddar cheese, cooking until melted. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '7. Ladle the soup and dumplings into bowls and serve topped with pepper. Enjoy!']

title: Herbed Ricotta Stuffed Chicken In Cider Pan Sauce with Mashed Cauliflower
ingredients: ['whole milk ricotta cheese', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'chopped fresh thyme, plus more for serving', 'chopped fresh sage', 'ground nutmeg', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'skin-on, chicken breasts', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'small shallots, halved', 'garlic cloves, smashed', 'cremini mushrooms, halved, if large', 'salted butter', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'apple cider', 'cauliflower, cut into florets', 'garlic, smashed', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1/2', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1/4', 'chopped fresh thyme, plus more for serving': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'skin-on, chicken breasts': '4-6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small shallots, halved': '3', 'garlic cloves, smashed': '4', 'cremini mushrooms, halved, if large': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'apple cider': '1/2', 'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2-3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Grease an oven-safe skillet with olive oil.', '2. \xa0In a bowl, combine the ricotta, gouda, 1 tablespoon thyme, 1 tablespoon sage, nutmeg, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '3. Loosen the skin of the chicken breast with your fingertips. Stuff about 2 tablespoons of ricotta underneath the skin of each breast. Rub the chicken skin with olive oil, season with 1 tablespoon thyme, 1 tablespoon sage, salt, and pepper.\xa0Transfer the chicken to the prepared skillet. Arrange the shallots, garlic, and mushrooms around the chicken. Drizzle olive oil over the mushrooms, season with salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked.', '4. Remove from the oven and place the chicken and mushrooms on a plate.', '5. Place the skillet with the shallots and garlic over medium heat. Add the butter. Cook 1-2 minutes, until the butter is browned. Add the wine and cider. Bring to a boil over high heat. Boil 5 minutes, until reduced by half. Slide the chicken and mushrooms back into the skillet, simmer 1 minute. Remove from the heat.', '6. Meanwhile, make the mashed cauliflower. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add cauliflower florets and cook until tender, 10 minutes. Drain well.', '6. In a food processor, combine the cauliflower, garlic, cream cheese, and butter, season to taste with salt and pepper. Pulse until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute.', '7. To serve, spoon the mashed cauliflower onto plates. Add the chicken and mushrooms. Then spoon over the pan sauce. Top with fresh thyme. Enjoy!']

title: Butternut Squash Pasta Carbonara with Rosemary Bacon
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'cubed butternut squash', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic, smashed', 'thick-cut bacon', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey', 'dry linguine pasta', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'salted butter, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'cubed butternut squash': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'thick-cut bacon': '8', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2-1', 'honey': '2', 'dry linguine pasta': '1', 'large eggs, at room temperature, beaten': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of crushed red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 10 minutes, flip the bacon and bake another 5-8 minutes, until the bacon is crisp, watch closely. Remove the bacon. title: Cauliflower and Cheese with Spicy Breadcrumbs

title: Black Pepper Rub Chicken Fingers with Greek Yogurt Ranch.
