title: Pesto Chicken Saltimbocca with Burst Tomatoes and Burrata
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets', 'basil pesto', 'thin slices of prosciutto', 'Panko bread crumbs', 'grated parmesan', 'burrata cheese, torn into pieces', 'basil, for serving', 'cherry tomatoes', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'honey', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets': '4', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'thin slices of prosciutto': '8', 'Panko bread crumbs': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan': '2/3', 'burrata cheese, torn into pieces': '2', 'basil, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for cooking': '1/4', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'honey': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'balsamic vinegar': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, toss together the chicken and pesto, coating the chicken fully in pesto. Combine the Panko and parmesan in a separate shallow bowl.', '2. Working with 1 cutlet at a time, press 2 basil leaves on top of each cutlet. Wrap 2 pieces of prosciutto around each cutlet to secure the basil. The oils from the pesto should moisten the prosciutto, if not drizzle lightly with olive oil. Dredge through the Panko, pressing to adhere. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. To make the tomatoes. In a large skillet, over high heat, combine the olive oil, 2 cups tomatoes, shallots, garlic, thyme, lemon zest, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes burst about, 10 minutes. Turn the heat off. Halve the remaining tomatoes and stir them in with the vinegar and honey.', '4. Heat a few tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook until golden brown, 3-4 minutes. Cook until golden brown, 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and season with salt.', '5. Serve the chicken warm topped with torn burrata, tomatoes, and fresh basil.']

title: Detroit Style Tomato Herb Pepperoni Pizza
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'crushed fennel seed', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'pepperoncini, chopped', 'marinara sauce', 'cherry tomatoes', 'cubed brick cheese or whole milk mozzarella', 'cubed provolone cheese', 'cubed cheddar cheese', 'pepperoni, sliced', 'honey, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'crushed fennel seed': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'pepperoncini, chopped': '2', 'marinara sauce': '2', 'cherry tomatoes': '1', 'cubed brick cheese or whole milk mozzarella': '1 1/2', 'cubed provolone cheese': '1/2', 'cubed cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'pepperoni, sliced': '8', 'honey, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Position an oven rack in the bottom half of the oven. Preheat the oven to 500° F.', '2. Drizzle the olive oil in 9×13 metal cake pan (or a Detroit-style pizza pan). Put the pizza dough in the pan and gently stretch it out to fit so the dough almost reaches the corners. Cover with plastic wrap and let sit 30 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine the garlic, basil, oregano, fennel, and a pinch each of chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '5. To assemble. Gently press the dough until it covers the entire pan. Layer on half of the pepperoni slices, then the pepperoncini. Spoon on the tomato sauce. Sprinkle over half of the herbs. Top with cheese, then tomatoes, then the remaining herbs, and more pepperoni.', '6. Bake until bubbly and a crispy cheese crust has formed, 10 to 15 minutes. Using a spatula, loosen the edges and slide on to a cutting board. Slice into squares and serve with fresh basil and honey.']

title: Honey Mustard Chicken Avocado Sandwich with Tahini Ranch
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'dijon mustard', 'lemon juice', 'apple cider vinegar', 'mixed chopped herbs', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'loaf ciabatta bread halved lengthwise', 'sourdough sandwich bread', 'avocado, mashed', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced', 'chopped pepperoncini', 'baby arugula', 'shaved parmesan', 'tahini', 'lemon juice', 'dijon mustard', 'dried chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper, to taste']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'honey': '1', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'lemon juice': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'mixed chopped herbs': '1/2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '3/4', 'loaf ciabatta bread halved lengthwise': '1', 'sourdough sandwich bread': 'seasoning', 'avocado, mashed': '1', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced': '1/4', 'chopped pepperoncini': '2', 'baby arugula': '1', 'shaved parmesan': '1/2', 'tahini': '1/4', 'dried chives': '2', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried dill': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper, to taste': '1/4– 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. In a large bowl, toss the chicken with 1/2 of the dressing. Let sit 10 minutes. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Grill the chicken until lightly charred and cooked through, turning halfway through cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes.', '3. To make the tahini ranch, combine everything in a bowl, whisking in 1/4 to 1/2 cup water to thin the dressing. Taste and season with salt and pepper.', '4. Rub each half of the bread with olive oil. Grill the bread, cut side down, for 3-5 minutes or until light grill marks appear.', '5.\xa0Working with the bottom piece of bread, spread over some of the tahini ranch, then layer on the avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and pepperoncini. Add the chicken, then drizzle the remaining dressing over the chicken. Add the arugula and cheese. Drizzle with the tahini ranch. Add the top half of the ciabatta and gently push down on the sandwich. Cut into 4-6 sandwiches. Enjoy with the remaining tahini ranch on the side.']

title: Crispy Cheese Chicken Tacos with Avocado Cilantro Sauce

ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion chopped': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '3/4', 'kosher salt': '1', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'flour or corn tortillas': '12', 'jalapeños, sliced': '1-2', 'avocado': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'plain Greek yogurt or sour cream': '1/4', 'lime juice': '3', 'honey': '2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. Add the meat and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chipotle chili powder, cumin, garlic powder and salt. Add the enchilada sauce. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the meat, about 5 minutes. Serve warm with avocado sauce and any amount of desired toppings, whatever you love!']

title: Sheet Pan Greek Meatballs and Tzatzik

instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. Combine the lamb, shallots, parsley, oregano, paprika, dijon, salt, pepper, and chili flakes in a bowl. Coat your hands with a bit of olive oil, and roll the meat into 3 tablespoon size balls, placing them on the prepared baking sheet. Add the lemon wedges and garlic (for the dressing) to the baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the meatballs are crisp and cooked through on the inside.', '3. During the same time, toss together the sweet potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper on another baking sheet. Bake 25 minutes, until the potatoes are crispy.', '4. Meanwhile, make the dressing. Whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, herbs, olives, and pepperoncini. Grab the meatballs from the oven, remove the lemons and garlic. Juice the lemons into the dressing. Chop the garlic and mix into the dressing. Add the feta.', '5. To assemble, add Tzakiki and lettuce to a bowl. Top with meatballs and spoon the dressing over the meatballs. Add the potatoes and any other desired toppings. Serve with additional Tzakiki (of course!).']

title: Easy Skillet Chicken Tinga Enchiladas
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt', 'red enchilada sauce', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'corn or flour tortillas', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'avocado and Greek yogurt or sour cream, for serving', 'jalapeños, seeded if desired, and chopped', 'diced pineapple', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'juice of a lime', 'extra virgin olive oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'dried oregano': '1', 'ground cumin': '1', 'kosher salt': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '2 1/2', 'chopped chipotle in adobo': '1-2', 'corn or flour tortillas': '6', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1 1/2', 'avocado and Greek yogurt or sour cream, for serving': 'seasoning', 'jalapeños, seeded if desired, and chopped': '1-2', 'diced pineapple': '2', 'cilantro, roughly chopped': '1', 'juice of a lime': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. Add the chicken and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add oregano and cumin, cook 1 minute. Stir in 2 cups enchilada sauce and the chipotle. Season with salt. Simmer 5 minutes.  Remove from the heat.', '3. Arrange the tortillas on top of the chicken. Pour over 1/2 cup enchilada sauce, then top with cheese. Bake 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. To make the salsa. Combine everything in a bowl, season with salt.', '5. Serve the enchiladas warm, topped with avocado, Greek yogurt or sour cream, and plenty of salsa.']

title: Crispy Feta with Lemon Pepper Chicken and Rice
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken tenders', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'paprika', 'cumin seed', 'ground ginger', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'fresno peppers, seeded and sliced', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'feta cheese block, patted dry', 'cornstarch', 'mixed fresh herbs, cilantro, parsley, and dill', 'optional rice for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon juice', 'champagne vinegar', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken tenders': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'paprika': '2', 'cumin seed': '2', 'ground ginger': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'bell peppers, sliced': '4', 'fresno peppers, seeded and sliced': '1-2', 'shallots, sliced': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'feta cheese block, patted dry': '1', 'cornstarch': '1/4', 'mixed fresh herbs, cilantro, parsley, and dill': '3/4', 'optional rice for serving': 'seasoning', 'lemon juice': '2', 'champagne vinegar': '1', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss together the chicken, 3 tablespoons olive oil, paprika, cumin, ginger, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Add the bell peppers, fresno, shallots, and garlic and toss with the chicken. Bake 25 minutes, until cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the feta. Add the cornstarch to a shallow bowl. Add the block of feta and toss to coat all sides. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the feta and cook for 2 to 3 minutes per side, until golden and crisp. Transfer the feta to a plate.', '4. To make the vinaigrette, combine all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.', "5. Serve the chicken and peppers topped with fresh herbs. Break the crispy feta overtop. Pour over the vinaigrette. I'd add rice, then enjoy!"]

title: Cauliflower “Pepperoni” Cheese Pizza
ingredients: ['cauliflower, cut into florets', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'chili flakes', 'fennel seeds', 'mustard seeds', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'shallots, sliced', 'pizza dough, at room temperature', 'marinara sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili flakes': '1-2', 'fennel seeds': '1', 'mustard seeds': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'shallots, sliced': '2', 'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '3/4', 'shredded provolone cheese': '3/4', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, cauliflower, paprika, chili flakes, fennel seeds, mustard seeds, onion powder, garlic powder, and salt. Add the shallots. Toss well to evenly coat. Transfer to the oven and roast for 15-20 minutes, or until tender.', '2. Rub a large baking sheet with olive oil. Increase the oven temp to 450° F.', '3. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it\'s pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread on the marinara sauce, add the cheeses, then arrange the shallots and cauliflower "pepperoni" over the cheese.', '4. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cauliflower is crisp. Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil. Slice and enjoy!']

title: Cheesy Green Chile and Avocado Rice Quesadillas
ingredients: ['poblano peppers', 'serrano or jalapeño peppers', 'garlic, lightly smashed', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'lime juice', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'sea salt', 'large flour tortillas', 'avocados, mashed', 'rice, cooked', 'salsa verde', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'greek yogurt, or sour cream, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'poblano peppers': '2', 'serrano or jalapeño peppers': '1-2', 'garlic, lightly smashed': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'lime juice': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'sea salt': 'seasoning', 'large flour tortillas': '4-6', 'avocados, mashed': '2', 'rice, cooked': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1 1/2', 'greek yogurt, or sour cream, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler to high. Arrange the poblanos, serrano peppers, and garlic on a baking sheet. Broil 2 minutes, until charring. Flip and broil 2-4 more minutes, until the peppers are charred. Watch the garlic closely.', '2. To make the salsa. If desired, de-seed the serrano pepper, then slice, add to a small bowl. Finely chop or mash the garlic and add to the bowl with the peppers. Add the cilantro, green onion, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '3. Grab the poblanos, peel away any charred skin, de-seed, and thinly slice them.', '4. To assemble, layer cheese, rice, avocado, and poblanos on one half of a tortilla. Drizzle over the salsa verde, then sprinkle over more cheese. Fold the tortilla over to cover everything.', '5. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 quesadilla, and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with cilantro, chile salsa, and a dollop of Greek yogurt.']

title: Lemon Butter Chicken Piccata with Pesto Polenta
ingredients: ['chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'grated parmesan', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'fresh lemon juice', 'salted butter', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme', 'capers', 'dry instant polenta', 'salted butter', 'basil pesto', 'grated parmesan']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken cutlets, or 2 boneless chicken breasts, sliced in half horizontally': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'grated parmesan': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'fresh lemon juice': '1/3', 'salted butter': '3', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme': '1', 'capers': '3', 'dry instant polenta': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour and parmesan in a shallow bowl and dredge the chicken through the flour mix, pressing to adhere.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and sear on both sides until golden, about 3-5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3.\xa0To the same skillet, add the butter, asparagus, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook until just tender, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, capers, and thyme, cook another 2 minutes. Pour in the wine and lemon juice, cook 1 minute. Return the chicken to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes, until warmed through.', '4. Meanwhile, make the polenta. Bring 3 cups water to a boil over medium heat in a medium pot. Whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thickening, 5 minutes. Stir in the butter, parmesan, and 2 tablespoons pesto.', '5. Spoon the polenta onto plates. Add the chicken and asparagus. Then spoon over the pan sauce. Finish with basil.']

title: Peanut Chicken Spring Roll Bowl
ingredients: ['shredded romaine or cabbage', 'carrots, shredded', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped', 'diced mango', 'Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped', 'peanuts, chopped', 'vermicelli rice noodles, cooked', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'avocado, chopped', 'creamy peanut butter', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'toasted sesame oil', 'rice vinegar', 'chili sauce (sambal oelek)', 'honey', 'lime juice', 'fresh grated ginger']
ingredients with measurement: {'shredded romaine or cabbage': '4', 'carrots, shredded': '4', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped': '1/2', 'diced mango': '1/2', 'Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced': '2', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '1/3', 'peanuts, chopped': '1/3', 'vermicelli rice noodles, cooked': '4', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1-2', 'avocado, chopped': '1', 'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'rice vinegar': '1/4', 'chili sauce (sambal oelek)': '2-3', 'honey': '2', 'lime juice': '3', 'fresh grated ginger': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, carrots, green onions, cilantro, mango, cucumbers, jalapeños, and peanuts.', '2. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a food processor and blend until smooth. Add water, as needed to thin.', '3. Pour 1/2 the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Divide the salad between bowls. Top each with noodles, chicken, and avocado. Drizzle over more dressing. Tip: I take scissors and cut the noodles up, then toss everything together with the dressing. Then eat (:']

title: Greek Chicken Tzatziki Bowls
ingredients: ['full-fat plain Greek yogurt', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed', 'garlic cloves, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'avocado, diced', 'lemon juice', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'Tzakiki sauce', 'lettuce, peperoncini, onion, tomatoes, and pitas, for serving', 'tahini', 'grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'tamari', 'lemon juice', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'full-fat plain Greek yogurt': '1/3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cubed': '1 1/2', 'garlic cloves, chopped': '6', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chili flakes, Kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '2', 'avocado, diced': '1', 'lemon juice': '1', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/4', 'crumbled feta cheese': '6', 'Tzakiki sauce': '1-2', 'lettuce, peperoncini, onion, tomatoes, and pitas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/2', 'grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'tamari': '2', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the yogurt, olive oil, cubed chicken, garlic, shallots, paprika, oregano, chili flakes, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes at room temperature or up to overnight in the refrigerator.', '2. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Arrange the chicken on a baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes, toss and bake another 5-10 minutes, or until cooked through. Switch the oven to broil. Broil 1-2 minutes, until the chicken chars on the edges.', '3. Meanwhile, combine the cucumbers, avocado, lemon, dill, salt, and pepper.', '4. To make the tahini. Combine all ingredients and 1/4 cup water in a blender and blend until smooth. If needed, add water to thin the sauce as desired. Season to taste with salt.', '5. To assemble, add lettuce to a bowl. Top with chicken, cucumber/avocado, feta cheese, and any other desired toppings. Add a few dollops of Tzaziki sauce. Drizzle over the tahini.']

instructions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Once hot use a slotted spoon to scoop the shrimp out of the marinade, reserving the marinade, and into the hot skillet, season with salt and pepper. Cook the shrimp until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side. Add the reserved marinade, the butter and 1 teaspoon pepper (or more or less to your taste) to the skillet. Continue to cook the shrimp in the butter until the garlic begins to caramelize and turn LIGHT golden brown, about another minute or two. Be careful not to burn the garlic. Remove from the heat and stir in the coconut milk and basil.']

title: My Favorite Slow Roasted Pork Carnitas.
ingredients: ['pork shoulder', 'garlic powder', 'chipotle chili powder', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'Mexican beer or low sodium chicken broth', 'orange juice', 'bay', 'juice from 2 limes', 'cilantro']
ingredients with measurement: {'pork shoulder': '3', 'garlic powder': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'Mexican beer or low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'orange juice': '1/2', 'bay': '2', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'cilantro': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['Heat a large dutch oven over medium high heat. Sear the pork on all sides. If needed, sear the pork in batches if your dutch oven is not large enough. Reduce the heat low and pour in the beer, orange juice and 1/2 cup water (there should be just enough liquid to cover the sides of the meat). Add the bay leaves. Bring the mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours on LOW. After 1 1/2  hours the pork should be falling apart. Remove the lid and continue cooking another 30 minutes. The Coca-Cola will caramelize and the liquid will evaporate almost completely.']

title: Korean Pineapple Pork Lettuce Wraps.
ingredients: ['Smithfield Boneless Netted Fresh Pork Shoulder', 'salt', 'brown sugar', 'soy sauce', 'rice wine vinegar', 'fresh grated ginger', 'finely diced pineapple', 'sriracha', 'green onions', 'water', 'a pineapple', 'brown sugar', 'heads butter lettuce', 'shredded carrots + sliced cucumbers', 'greens onions + fresno chiles', 'sliced limes + sesame seeds', 'steamed [coconut rice | https://www.halfbakedharvest.com/hawaiian-hula-pork-fajitas-pineapple-slaw-coconut-rice/] or regular rice', 'sesame oil', 'gochujang or sriracha']
ingredients with measurement: {'Smithfield Boneless Netted Fresh Pork Shoulder': '3-4', 'salt': '2', 'brown sugar': '2', 'soy sauce': '1', 'rice wine vinegar': '1/4', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'finely diced pineapple': '1/4', 'sriracha': '2', 'green onions': '4', 'water': '2', 'a pineapple': '1/2', 'heads butter lettuce': '1-2', 'shredded carrots + sliced cucumbers': 'seasoning', 'greens onions + fresno chiles': 'seasoning', 'sliced limes + sesame seeds': 'seasoning', 'steamed [coconut rice | https://www.halfbakedharvest.com/hawaiian-hula-pork-fajitas-pineapple-slaw-coconut-rice/] or regular rice': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '1/4', 'gochujang or sriracha': '1'}
instructions: ['In a bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, ginger, diced pineapple, green onions, and sriracha. Remove a 1/3 cup of the marinade and set aside for later. Now add 2 cups of water to the marinade. Pour the marinade over the pork. Cover the pork tightly with foil or the dutch oven lid. Roast for 3-4 hours or until the pork shreds easily. Towards the end of cooking, check the pork and make sure the sauce is not getting too low. If the sauce is thickening too much, add water to keep the pork moist. You want the pork submerged in liquid at least 1/3 a way up the pot.']

title: Curried Thai Beef with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['creamy peanut butter', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'toasted sesame oil', 'flank steak, thinly sliced', 'black pepper', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder', 'Thai red curry paste', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'lemongrass paste', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'chopped mango', 'jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'sesame seeds', 'chopped peanuts', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'chopped pickled ginger': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'flank steak, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'black pepper': '1', 'cornstarch or arrowroot powder': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'lemongrass paste': '1', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '2', 'chopped mango': '1', 'jalapeño pepper, seeded and sliced': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'chopped peanuts': '2', 'lime juice': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the peanut sauce. Add all ingredients to a glass jar or blender and blend to combine, adding water as needed to thin the sauce.', '2. In a bowl, toss together the beef, a pinch of pepper, and the cornstarch (or arrowroot powder).', '3. Melt one tablespoon of butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and curry paste. Cook until the beef becomes crispy, about 5 minutes. Add two tablespoons of butter, the garlic, lemongrass, and ginger. Cook until the garlic is lightly crisping, 1 minute. Reduce the heat to low. Add the tamari/soy sauce and Thai chili sauce. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the meat is caramelized.', '4. In a bowl, mix the mango, jalapeño, cilantro, green onion, sesame seeds, peanuts, and lime juice.', '5. Spoon the mango salsa over the bowls of rice. Add the beef, then pour the peanut sauce on top. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken Chili
ingredients: ['medium yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'hot sauce', 'garlic powder', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'jalapeño pepper, chopped, and seeded if desired', 'chopped celery', 'bone or chicken broth', 'salted butter', 'salt and black pepper', 'plain Greek yogurt or cream cheese, melted', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and Greek yogurt, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chipotle chili powder, use to your taste': '1', 'fire roasted diced tomatoes': '1', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'jalapeño pepper, chopped, and seeded if desired': '1', 'chopped celery': '3/4', 'bone or chicken broth': '2-4', 'salted butter': '4', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or cream cheese, melted': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'avocado, cheddar cheese, and Greek yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the onion, chicken, hot sauce, garlic powder, paprika, chipotle chili powder, diced tomatoes, poblano peppers, jalapeños and celery. Stir in 2 cups broth. Add the butter slices. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or high for 3-4 hours.', '3. Shred the chicken using two forks. Stir in the cream cheese/yogurt, and cilantro.', '4. Ladle the chili into bowls. Top, as desired with Greek yogurt, cheese, avocado, cilantro, and green onions. We add extra buffalo sauce and tortilla chips too! Eat and enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Korean Gochujang Beef Bowls
ingredients: ['ground beef (or chicken or pork)', 'butter', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'shallots, sliced', 'garlic, chopped', 'pickled ginger', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'Gochujang', 'ginger juice', 'maple or honey', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chopped roasted peanuts', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped', 'Gochujang', 'chopped green onion/ Thai basil', 'ginger juice or rice vinegar']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground beef (or chicken or pork)': '1 1/2', 'butter': '2', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'shallots, sliced': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'pickled ginger': '1/4', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/2', 'Gochujang': '1', 'ginger juice': '2', 'maple or honey': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1/4', 'chopped roasted peanuts': '1/3', 'Persian cucumbers, chopped': '4', 'chopped green onion/ Thai basil': '1/4', 'ginger juice or rice vinegar': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the beef and a pinch of black pepper. Cook over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the butter, peppers, garlic, shallots, and ginger. Cook 2 minutes.', '2. Pour over the tamari, add the Gochujang, ginger juice, and 1/3 cup water. Cook until the sauce coats the beef, 2-3 minutes. Mix in the maple/honey and cook another 1-2 minutes until the beef is caramelized. Remove from the heat. Toss with sesame seeds.', '3. Meanwhile, In a bowl, mix the cucumbers with 1 teaspoon salt, the chile flakes, ginger juice, and green onions. Let sit 5 minutes.', '4. Serve the beef and peppers over bowls of rice. Serve with the cucumber salad and top with peanuts. Add spicy mayo if desired. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Chili Orange Chicken and Broccoli
ingredients: ['chicken breasts or thighs cut into cubes', 'orange zest', 'black pepper', 'flour or gluten-free flour', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'broccoli florets', 'green onions + sesame seeds, for serving', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili paste (gochjang)', 'toasted sesame oil', 'cornstarch or flour']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts or thighs cut into cubes': '2', 'orange zest': '2', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'flour or gluten-free flour': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'green onions + sesame seeds, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh orange juice + 2 tablespoons zest': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '3', 'garlic, grated': '4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili paste (gochjang)': '3-4', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'cornstarch or flour': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, mix the chicken, orange zest, and pepper. Add the flour and toss again. Add 2 tablespoons olive oil, tossing to coat. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Add the broccoli to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan, combine all ingredients, then set over medium heat. Bring to a boil for 3-4 minutes, until the sauce bubbles and begins to thicken. Remove from the heat.', '4. Remove the broccoli from the sheet pan. Then pour the orange sauce over the chicken and toss the chicken up in the sauce. Bake for another 5 minutes, until the sauce is baked onto the chicken.', "5. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and orange sauce with green onions and toasted sesame seeds. I love this over rice, but it's also great as an appetizer too!"]

title: Baked Crunchy Honey Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce', 'chicken breast or skinless thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving', 'sliced green onions, for serving', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'seasoned salt', 'chipotle chili powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'chicken breast or skinless thighs': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'blue cheese or ranch dressing, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sliced green onions, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '6', 'seasoned salt': '1-2', 'chipotle chili powder': '3/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'honey': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the cornflakes, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crush the crumbs in a ziplock bag by stepping on them. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the hot sauce and chicken, and toss well to coat.', '4. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a second time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '5. Meanwhile, make the sauce. In a saucepan set over medium heat, melt together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and cayenne. Stir until melted and combined. Remove from the heat and mix in the honey.', "6. Drizzle the buffalo sauce over the chicken. Top with green onions and blue cheese/ranch dressing. I love this over rice, but it's also great with french fries. Enjoy!"]

title: Chipotle Cheddar Chicken Burgers
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'panko bread crumbs', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder', 'sea salt and black pepper', 'cheddar cheese', 'buns, toasted', 'fresh cilantro chopped,', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'lime juice', 'sliced/mashed avocado', 'mayo', 'chopped chipotle in adobo', 'sweet Thai chili sauce']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'panko bread crumbs': '1/2', 'chopped chipotle in adobo': '1-2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chili powder': '1', 'sea salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cheddar cheese': '4', 'buns, toasted': '4', 'fresh cilantro chopped,': '1/2', 'ears grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob': '2', 'lime juice': '2', 'sliced/mashed avocado': 'seasoning', 'mayo': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the burgers. In a bowl mix the chicken, Panko, chipotle in adobo, paprika, 1 teaspoon chili powder, salt, and pepper. Form into 4 burgers. Rub the burger with olive oil.', '2. Heat your grill or grill pan. Grill the burgers for 8-10 minutes on each side until cooked through and crisp. Add a cheese slice to each, cook until melted, 1-2 minutes.', '3. In a bowl, mix the cilantro, corn, lime juice, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, and sea salt.', '4. For the mayo, combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. To assemble, layer your toasted buns with mayo, the cheesy burgers, avocado, and corn. Add the top bun and enjoy with lots of extra mayo.']

title: Chopped Honey Buffalo Chicken Skewer Salad
ingredients: ['buffalo sauce', 'honey', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken breasts, cut into cubes', 'seasoned salt', 'shredded lettuce', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced', 'grilled corn kernels', 'chopped, peperoncini', 'crumbled blue cheese or cubed cheddar', 'cooked bacon, crumbled', 'avocado, chopped', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'mayo', 'pickled jalapeños', 'fresh cilantro', 'fresh basil', 'chopped fresh dill', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'buffalo sauce': '2/3', 'honey': '1/4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chicken breasts, cut into cubes': '2', 'seasoned salt': '1', 'shredded lettuce': '6', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/3', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced': '1', 'grilled corn kernels': '1', 'chopped, peperoncini': '1/4', 'crumbled blue cheese or cubed cheddar': '1', 'cooked bacon, crumbled': '6', 'avocado, chopped': '1', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'mayo': '1/3', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro': '1/3', 'fresh basil': '3', 'chopped fresh dill': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, mix the buffalo sauce and honey.', '2. Toss together the olive oil, chicken, seasoned salt, and a pinch of pepper. Add 1/4 cup honey buffalo sauce, toss to coat. title: Picnic Style Pesto Turkey and Avocado Bacon Sandwich
ingredients: ['Caesar dressing', 'basil pesto', 'ciabatta bread, halved, lightly toasted', 'Gouda or Havarti cheese', 'avocado, sliced', 'thinly sliced turkey or roasted chicken', 'cooked bacon', 'shredded lettuce', 'sliced dill pickles and or peperoncini', 'mayo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon juice', 'Dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan']
ingredients with measurement: {'Caesar dressing': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/4', 'ciabatta bread, halved, lightly toasted': '1', 'Gouda or Havarti cheese': '6', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'thinly sliced turkey or roasted chicken': '12', 'cooked bacon': '6', 'shredded lettuce': '4', 'sliced dill pickles and or peperoncini': '1/3', 'mayo': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'lemon juice': '3', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a bowl or glass jar. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. To make the sandwich. Mix the Caesar dressing and pesto in a bowl.', '3. Lay the bread cut side up on a cutting board. Working with the top piece of ciabatta, pull out some of the insides to create a space for the filling. Spread the pesto Caesar dressing over both cut sides of the bread. Mash the avocado with a fork and season with salt. Layer on the cheese and mashed avocado. Now, layer on the turkey, bacon, greens, and pickles. Add the top half of the ciabatta and gently push down on the sandwich.', '4. At this point, you can slice the sandwich and serve, or wrap the sandwiches tightly and place in the fridge for a few hours. Before serving, cut 6-8 sandwiches.']

title: These Chipotle Pineapple Bang Bang Chicken Skewers:
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'tomato paste', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'honey', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'chipotle chiles in adobo', 'sweet or smoked paprika', 'fresh thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-size chunks', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'green onions and basil, for serving', 'mayo', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'small clove garlic grated', 'lime zest', 'chopped pickled ginger']

Serve warm or cold. The salad will develop more flavor as it sits.']

title: Creamy Broccoli Cheddar Casserole with Garlic Butter Pretzels
ingredients: ['warm water', 'instant yeast', 'salted butter, melted', 'all-purpose flour', 'baking soda', 'egg, beaten', 'pretzel salt (for sprinkling)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic, chopped, 1 clove, grated', 'paprika', 'cayenne, more or less to taste', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth', 'broccoli florets, chopped', 'kosher salt and black', 'whole milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'warm water': '3/4', 'instant yeast': '2 1/4', 'salted butter, melted': '4', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'baking soda': '1/4', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'pretzel salt (for sprinkling)': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'salted butter': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped, 1 clove, grated': '3', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne, more or less to taste': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'low sodium veggie or chicken broth': '3', 'broccoli florets, chopped': '4', 'kosher salt and black': 'seasoning', 'whole milk': '2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '2 1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Combine the flour and instant yeast in the bowl of a stand mixer. Add the water and 3 tablespoons butter. Mix on medium speed until the dough is smooth and begins to pull away from the sides of the bowl, about 3 to 4 minutes. If the dough is too wet, add additional flour, 1 tablespoon at a time. Cover the bowl and place in a warm spot 15-20 minutes.', '2. Meanwhile, make the casserole. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '3. Heat the olive oil, butter, and onion in a large, oven-safe skillet with sides. Cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Whisk in the flour, garlic, paprika, and cayenne and cook until golden, 2 minutes. Gradually whisk in the broth until smooth. Add the broccoli and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer, reduce the heat to medium and cook, uncovered, until the broccoli is tender, about 10 minutes.', '4. Stir in the milk and 2 cups of cheese until melted and creamy. Let cook 5-10 minutes, until slightly thickened. Remove from the heat. If needed transfer the mix to a casserole dish.\xa0Top with 1/2 cup cheese.', '5. Bring a large pot of water to a boil.', '6. Remove the pretzel dough from the bowl and place on a floured surface. Divide the dough into 8 equal balls. Add the baking soda to the boiling water. Boil the pretzels, 4 at a time, for 30 seconds. Remove with a large slotted spoon, then place on top of the broccoli. Brush each roll with a beaten egg, sprinkle with salt. Bake until the broccoli is bubbling and the pretzels are golden, 25 minutes.', '7. In a bowl mix 1 tablespoon melted butter with 1 clove grated garlic and  the thyme. Brush the rolls with garlic butter. Top enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Buffalo Ranch Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'fajita seasoning', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'poblano peppers, chopped', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'beer', 'buffalo sauce', 'salsa verde', 'chopped cilantro', 'cream cheese, room temp', 'plain greek yogurt', 'dried parsley', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'smoked paprika', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'tortillas, warmed', 'avocado, limes, and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken': '1', 'fajita seasoning': '1', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'poblano peppers, chopped': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'beer': '1', 'buffalo sauce': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/2', 'cream cheese, room temp': '4', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/4', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried chives': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'tortillas, warmed': '6', 'avocado, limes, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, onion, and peppers. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned, about 5 minutes.\xa0Add the fajita seasoning, then pour in the beer, the buffalo sauce, and the salsa. Simmer 5-8 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the cilantro.', '3. In a bowl, combine the cream cheese, yogurt, parsley, chives, dill, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.\xa0Stir in half of the shredded cheese.', '4. Spoon the cream cheese mix down the center of each tortilla, tuck, and roll. Place the tortillas, seam side down, into the skillet overtop of the chicken. Top with the remaining shredded cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '5. Serve warm, drizzled with yogurt mixed with lime and salt. Top with avocado, cilantro, and jalapeños. Add extra buffalo sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Cider Braised Chicken with Caramelized Onions
ingredients: ['chicken, thighs or breasts', 'all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'salted butter', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'apple cider', 'sliced mushrooms', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chicken broth or dry white wine']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken, thighs or breasts': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '3', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '1', 'yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'apple cider': '2', 'sliced mushrooms': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'chicken broth or dry white wine': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then rub with flour to coat. Heat a large oven-safe skillet with sides over high heat, and sear the chicken on 1 side. Remove the chicken to a plate.', '3. Add the butter and onions and cook 5 minutes, until softened. Add a 1/2 cup apple cider, season with salt and pepper, and continue cooking another 5-8 minutes, until the cider has evaporated and the onions are lightly golden. Add the mushrooms, garlic, thyme, and sage, then add the chicken back to the pot. Add the remaining 1 1/2 cups cider, and wine. Roast for 30 minutes or until the chicken is falling apart. Watch the sauce, if it begins to thicken too much, cover the dish.', '3. Serve the chicken with wild rice pilaf and bread. Drizzle with any remaining pan sauce and onions. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Orzo
ingredients: ['ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme', 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'dijon mustard', 'dry orzo pasta', 'small zucchini, shredded', 'fresh baby spinach', 'canned coconut milk or heavy cream', 'grated parmesan', 'fresh basil']

instructions: ['1. In a large skillet set over medium heat, brown the chicken sausage over medium heat, about 5 to 8 minutes. Add the shallots, garlic, oregano, and thyme, and cook until fragrant, 3 minutes. Mix in the sun-dried tomatoes and cook another 2 minutes.', '2. Pour in the broth. Add the dijon, then bring to a boil. Add the orzo and zucchini and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 6 minutes. Mix in the spinach, pour in the milk, and sprinkle over the parmesan.', '3. Stir until creamy, then remove from the heat. Serve topped with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Brown Butter Brussels Sprout and Bacon Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: ['fettuccine pasta', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced or halved, if small', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'grated Parmesan or Pecorino Romano', 'ground nutmeg']
ingredients with measurement: {'fettuccine pasta': '1', 'thick-cut slices bacon, chopped': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'Brussels sprouts, thinly sliced or halved, if small': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '3', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '2', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'grated Parmesan or Pecorino Romano': '1 1/2', 'ground nutmeg': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta according to package directions until al dente. Drain.', '2. Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain onto a paper towel. Add the Brussels sprouts, cut side down, and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the sprouts are crisping on the edges, 3 to 4 minutes.\xa0Toss the sprouts, add the olive oil and cook another 2-3 minutes, until crisp. Remove the Brussels sprouts from the skillet to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat, cooking until the butter begins to brown, about 3-4 minutes.\xa0Reduce the heat to low, add the garlic, oregano, sage, and a pinch of crushed red pepper. Cook 1 minute, then pour in the milk and cream. Add the cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5-8 minutes, until thickened slightly. Stir in the parmesan and nutmeg. Season with salt + pepper. Toss in the pasta and cook 3-5 minutes, then remove from the heat.', '4. Divide the fettuccine between plates and top with crispy Brussels sprouts, and bacon. Eat and enjoy immediately.']

title: Slow Cooker Chipotle Chicken Tortilla Soup with Salty Lime Chips
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless skinless, chicken breast', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'juice of 2 limes, plus lime zest for serving', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'sliced avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving', 'salty lime chips']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'poblano peppers, seeded and chopped': '2', 'chipotle peppers in adobo, finely chopped': '2-4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless skinless, chicken breast': '1', 'fire-roasted diced tomatoes': '2', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '4', 'juice of 2 limes, plus lime zest for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/2', 'sliced avocado, cheddar, and yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salty lime chips': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the olive oil, onion, garlic, poblano peppers, chipotle peppers, paprika, cumin, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Stir to combine. Add the chicken, then stir in the tomatoes and broth. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours or high for 4-5 hours.', '2. Shred the chicken using two forks. title: Ginger Coconut Sweet Potato and Rice Stew with Spiced Chili Oil
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', 'garam masala', 'turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'coconut milk', 'chopped kale', 'cooked basmati rice', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic lightly smashed', 'raw sesame seeds', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'ground cumin seed', 'paprika']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed': '2', 'garam masala': '2', 'turmeric': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4- 1/2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'coconut milk': '1', 'chopped kale': '3', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'garlic lightly smashed': '4', 'raw sesame seeds': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '2-3', 'ground cumin seed': '1', 'paprika': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the onion and cook 5 minutes until soft. Add the ginger, garlic, and sweet potatoes and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the garam masala, turmeric, and cayenne and cook another minute.', '2. Add 3 cups water. Season generously with salt. Bring the mix to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low. Cover and simmer 15-20 minutes, until the sweet potatoes are tender.', '3. Stir in the coconut milk and kale, cook 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, make the chili oil. Heat the olive oil and garlic in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until the garlic is fragrant, 5 minutes. Stir in the sesame seeds, chili flakes, and cumin seeds, cook 30 seconds. Remove from the heat and\xa0stir in the paprika. Season the oil with salt. Let cool.', '4. To serve, divide the rice among bowls and ladle the stew overtop. Spoon over the chili oil and top with cilantro. Serve with Naan on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Pomegranate Chicken and Honey Roasted Squash.
ingredients: ['acorn or kabocha squash seeded and sliced into half rounds', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'honey', 'egg, beaten', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'shredded unsweetened coconut', 'Panko breadcrumbs', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic cloves, grated', 'arils from 1 pomegranate', 'coconut rice, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'acorn or kabocha squash seeded and sliced into half rounds': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'shredded unsweetened coconut': '1 1/2', 'Panko breadcrumbs': '1/2', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/2', 'pomegranate juice': '1/2', 'low sodium soy sauce': '3', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic cloves, grated': '2', 'arils from 1 pomegranate': 'seasoning', 'coconut rice, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. On the prepared baking sheet, toss the squash with olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Bake 10 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the coconut, Panko, and a pinch of pepper to a medium-sized bowl. Stir to combine. Dredge the chicken in batches through the coconut mix, tossing to coat. Remove the squash from the oven and arrange to one side of the pan. On the other side, arrange the chicken. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil. Bake for 12 minutes. Toss the squash, flip the chicken, and return to the oven another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 425 degrees F.', '4. Meanwhile, combine the chili sauce, pomegranate juice, soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic, and ginger in a medium saucepan and set over medium-high heat. Bring the sauce to a boil for 5 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Remove from the heat.', '5. Pour 2/3 of sauce over the chicken, tossing to combine. Toss the squash with the honey and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken.', '6. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of coconut rice. Top the chicken pomegranate arils and cilantro. Serve the squash on the side.']

title: Sheet Pan Sticky Ginger Sesame Chicken and Crispy Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'egg, beaten', 'all-purpose', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'brussels sprouts, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'pomegranate juice', 'honey', 'balsamic vinegar', 'apple cider vinegar', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses', 'creamy peanut butter', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste', 'rice, sesame seeds, and green onions, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '1 1/2', 'egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'brussels sprouts, halved': '3/4', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '6', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2/3', 'pomegranate juice': '1/3', 'honey': '1/4', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'molasses or pomegranate molasses': '1', 'creamy peanut butter': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes, use more or less to taste': '1', 'rice, sesame seeds, and green onions, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease with oil.', '2. Add the chicken, egg, and a pinch of pepper to a bowl. Toss to combine. Add the flour to another bowl. Dredge the chicken in batches through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on one side of the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil. Add the brussels sprouts to the other side of the pan and toss with 2 tablespoon oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange cut side down. Bake for 12 minutes. Toss the sprouts, flip the chicken and return to the oven another 3-5 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. Reduce the oven temp to 400 degrees F.', '3. Meanwhile, combine the soy sauce, pomegranate juice, honey, balsamic vinegar, apple cider vinegar, molasses, peanut butter, garlic, ginger, and crushed red pepper flakes in a medium saucepan. Set over medium-high heat and bring the sauce to a boil. Boil 5-8 minutes, until the sauce thickens and reduces by about 1/3. Remove from the heat.', '4. Return everything to the oven for 3 minutes, until the sauce coats the chicken, watch close the sauce can burn.', '5. Serve the chicken and sauce over bowls of rice topped with additional green onions, pomegranate arils, and sesame seeds. Serve the brussels sprouts on the side.']

title: One Pot Lemon Rosemary Dijon Chicken and Butter Toasted Rice Pilaf
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'smoked paprika', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallots, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'mushrooms, chopped', 'salted butter', 'wild rice blend', 'dry orzo pasta', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving', 'small honeycrisp apple, chopped', 'apple cider (not vinegar)', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'Dijon mustard']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'mushrooms, chopped': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'wild rice blend': '1 1/2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1/2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving': '1', 'small honeycrisp apple, chopped': '1', 'apple cider (not vinegar)': '2', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Season the chicken with paprika, lemon zest, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet/braiser set over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken and cook on both sides until golden, about 5 minutes per side. Remove the chicken from the pan.', '3. To the skillet, add the shallots, carrots, and mushrooms. Cook 5 minutes, until just caramelized. Add the butter, wild rice, orzo, garlic, rosemary, thyme, and apple, if using. Cook 5 minutes, until lightly toasted and golden. Add the apple cider, wine, dijon, lemon juice, and 1/2 cup of water. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat.', '4. Slide the chicken back into the pan. Add the rosemary sprig. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes, until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is cooked. During the last 10-15 minutes of cooking remove the lid and allow the chicken to crisp, if needed, add in 1/4 cup additional water or chicken broth to keep the rice from getting dry.', '5. To serve, fluff the rice with a fork and serve the chicken, rice, and veggies together.\xa0Enjoy!']

title: One Skillet Cheesy Broccoli Cheddar Orzo Bake
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'roughly chopped mushrooms', 'salted butter', 'dry orzo pasta', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping', 'low sodium vegetable broth', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped', 'bay leaf', 'garlic powder', 'cayenne pepper', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'grated asiago or manchego cheese', 'fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'roughly chopped mushrooms': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'dry orzo pasta': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves, plus more for topping': '2', 'low sodium vegetable broth': '3', 'dry white wine such, as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/2', 'broccoli florets, roughly chopped': '3', 'bay leaf': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'zest of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'whole milk or canned coconut milk': '1/2', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated asiago or manchego cheese': '1/2', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
