title: Sheet Pan Korean Popcorn Chicken
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes', 'egg', 'finely crushed corn flakes', 'grated parmesan', 'salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing', 'broccoli florets', 'spicy mayo, for serving', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'honey', 'Gochujang', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'toasted sesame oil', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'chopped green onions', 'chili flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts, cut into 2 inch cubes': '2', 'egg': '1', 'finely crushed corn flakes': '3', 'grated parmesan': '2', 'salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil, for brushing': 'seasoning', 'broccoli florets': '3', 'spicy mayo, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/2', 'honey': '2', 'Gochujang': '1-2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, grated': '3', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'toasted sesame seeds': '3', 'chopped green onions': '3', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. Dump the cornflake crumbs, parmesan, and pepper into a shallow bowl. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs, then add the chicken and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Arrange the chicken to one side of the baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Add the broccoli to the other side. Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake 15-20 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. In a small saucepan, combine the tamari/soy sauce, honey,\xa0Gochujang (Korean chili paste), rice vinegar, ginger, 2 cloves garlic, sesame oil, and 1/4 cup water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has thickened into a glaze.', '5. Remove the broccoli from the sheet pan. Pour the sauce over the chicken and toss the chicken up in the sauce. Bake another 5 minutes, until the sauce is baked onto the chicken.', "6. In a bowl, mix the sesame seeds, green onions, 1 clove of garlic, chili flakes, and a tiny pinch of salt. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and sauce with the sesame crunch mix. I love this over rice, but it's also great with french fries!"]

title: Creamy Pierogi Chicken Soup with Rosemary Bacon Bits
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'celery stalks, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'chicken or bone broth', 'chicken thighs or breasts', 'chopped kale', 'heavy cream or whole milk', 'grated cheddar cheese', 'fresh or frozen mini potato pierogies']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '6', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'carrots, chopped': '6', 'celery stalks, chopped': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'chicken or bone broth': '6', 'chicken thighs or breasts': '2', 'chopped kale': '3', 'heavy cream or whole milk': '1 1/2', 'grated cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'fresh or frozen mini potato pierogies': '28'}
instructions: ["1. Cook the bacon in a large pot over medium heat until crisp, about 5 minutes. During the last minute of cooking, add the rosemary. Remove the bacon from the pot. If there's excess bacon grease, drain off all but 1 tablespoon.", '2. To the pot, add the olive oil, onion, carrots, celery, garlic, and thyme. Season with cayenne, salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, until fragrant.', '3. Stir in the butter and flour, cook for 1 minute. Add the broth. Stir in the chicken. Simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through. At this point, the soup can simmer on low for up to 4-6 hours.', '4. Shred the chicken using 2 forks. Stir in the kale, cream/milk, and the cheddar. Bring to a gentle boil and stir in the pierogies. Cook for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the pierogies float. If the soup is too thick, add additional broth.', '5. Serve the soup topped with the rosemary bacon and parmesan cheese. Enjoy warm…preferably with a crusty piece of bread.']

title: Quick Tortellini Bolognese
ingredients: ['pepperoni, chopped', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'ground beef', 'ground spicy Italian sausage', 'chopped celery', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'tomato paste', 'marinara sauce', 'cream cheese, melted', 'basil pesto', 'cheese tortellini', 'grated parmesan cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'pepperoni, chopped': '4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'ground beef': '1', 'ground spicy Italian sausage': '3/4', 'chopped celery': '1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'dried oregano': '1', 'tomato paste': '3', 'marinara sauce': '2', 'cream cheese, melted': '3', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'cheese tortellini': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot, cook the pepperoni over medium heat until crispy, 5 minutes. Add the onion, beef, sausage, celery, garlic, and oregano. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until browned all over, 10 minutes. Add the tomato paste and cook for 5 minutes, then mix in the marinara sauce. Add 1/2 cup water or use milk. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Simmer over low heat for 10-15 minutes to thicken the sauce. Stir in the cream cheese and pesto.', '3. Meanwhile, boil the tortellini until al dente. Drain and add back to the pot. Ladle the sauce over the tortellini. Add parmesan and toss to coat.', '4.  Divide the pasta among bowls. Serve topped with parmesan and fresh herbs. Enjoy!']

title: Smothered Chicken in Mushroom Wine Pan Sauce
ingredients: ['thin-cut chicken breasts', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'all-purpose flour', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'paprika', 'cayenne', 'prosciutto', 'salted butter', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'shallots, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh chopped sage', 'dry white wine wine', 'chicken bone broth', 'heavy cream', 'shredded Gruyère cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'thin-cut chicken breasts': '1 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'all-purpose flour': '1/3', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'paprika': '1/2', 'cayenne': '1', 'prosciutto': '3', 'salted butter': '3', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'fresh chopped sage': '1', 'dry white wine wine': '1', 'chicken bone broth': '1', 'heavy cream': '1/2-1', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Place the flour, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and cayenne in a shallow bowl. Dredge the chicken through the flour and toss to coat.', '2. Arrange the prosciutto in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Cook until crispy all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet.', '3. In the same skillet, add 1 tablespoon butter and the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes per side. Add 1 tablespoon butter and allow the butter to brown around the chicken, about 2 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet.', '3. Add the mushrooms. Cook undisturbed for 5 minutes or until golden.\xa0Add 2 tablespoons butter, the shallots, thyme, sage, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, until the mushrooms have caramelized.', '4. Add the wine, then the broth. Simmer for 5 minutes, pour in the cream. Add the chicken to the skillet. If the sauce is too soupy, add 1-2 additional tablespoons flour. Sprinkle over the Gruyère. Cook for 5-10 minutes, until the cheese is melted. Remove from the heat. Top with crispy prosciutto and fresh herbs.', '5. Serve the chicken with crusty bread for mopping up all that delicious creamy sauce. YUM!']

title: Crockpot Buffalo Chicken and Broccoli
ingredients: ['yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'smoked paprika', 'dried parsley', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'chipotle chili powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'hot sauce', 'salted butter', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'chopped broccoli', 'green onions, chopped', 'buffalo sauce, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'salted butter': '4', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '6', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '2', 'chopped broccoli': '3-4', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'buffalo sauce, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your slow cooker,\xa0layer the onion and then the chicken. Sprinkle the chicken with paprika, parsley, garlic powder, onion powder, chili powder, and season with salt and pepper. Pour over the hot sauce and 1/4 cup water. Add the butter and jalapeño. title: Crockpot Chipotle Queso Chicken Chili
ingredients: ['yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs', 'chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'chipotle chili powder', 'cumin', 'kosher salt', 'red bell peppers, chopped', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped', 'can diced green chilies', 'andouille sausage, links\xa0quartered', 'red salsa', 'pumpkin beer', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'black beans, drained', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'chopped green onion', 'avocado, and Greek yogurt, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'chili powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'red bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped': '1/4', 'can diced green chilies': '1', 'andouille sausage, links\xa0quartered': '2', 'red salsa': '2', 'pumpkin beer': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '6', 'black beans, drained': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped green onion': '1/4', 'avocado, and Greek yogurt, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Twice Baked Crispy Cheesy Taco Rice Casserole
ingredients: ['ground beef, chicken, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'taco seasoning', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'salted butter', 'dry long grain rice', 'poblano pepper, chopped', 'salsa verde', 'fresh chopped cilantro/green onions', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'lime juice', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground beef, chicken, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'taco seasoning': '2', 'hard shell tacos': '8', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '1-2', 'salted butter': '1', 'dry long grain rice': '1', 'poblano pepper, chopped': '1', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'fresh chopped cilantro/green onions': '1/2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '3/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine': '1/4', 'lime juice': '2', 'kosher salt': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large oven-safe skillet, cook the meat and onion, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the meat is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the taco seasoning and 3/4 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the meat, 5 minutes. Then remove 3/4 of the meat from the skillet to a plate and set aside.', '3. To the skillet, add the butter, rice, and poblano. Cook until the rice is toasted, then mix in 1 3/4 cups water and the salsa verde. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 15 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, line the taco shells up in a baking dish. Divide the meat among each shell and top with half the cheese. Bake for 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '5. Wiggly the baked tacos into the rice in the skillet. Top with the remaining cheese. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes.', '6. Meanwhile, make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or stir until creamy.', '7. Serve the hot casserole topped with cilantro, avocado, and ranch. Enjoy!']

title: Baked Crunchy Maple Dijon Chicken
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce', 'chicken breast tenderloins', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'fresh thyme or parsley, for serving', 'maple syrup', 'Dijon mustard', 'hot sauce', 'chipotle chili powder', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'fresh thyme', 'sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce': '2-3', 'chicken breast tenderloins': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme or parsley, for serving': 'seasoning', 'maple syrup': '1/3', 'Dijon mustard': '1/4', 'chipotle chili powder': '3/4', 'fresh thyme': '1', 'sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the cornflakes, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crush the crumbs in a ziplock bag by stepping on them. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the chicken, and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a second time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '4. To make the sauce. In a sauce pot, warm together the maple syrup, Dijon, hot sauce, chili powder, onion powder, and garlic powder, plus a pinch of salt. Stir in the thyme.', '5. Drizzle the warm sauce over the chicken. Top with herbs. If the sauce thickens, warm for 5 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!']

title: Garlic Butter Chicken Meatballs Stuffed In Spaghetti Squash:
ingredients: ['whole milk or heavy cream', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed/squeezed dry', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes', 'shredded mozzarella or gouda', 'spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed', 'grated parmesan', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey', 'Italian seasoning', 'dijon mustard', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh herbs, basil, thyme, oregano/ sage']
ingredients with measurement: {'whole milk or heavy cream': '1 1/4', 'frozen chopped spinach, thawed/squeezed dry': '6', 'chopped sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'shredded mozzarella or gouda': '1/2', 'spaghetti squash, halved and seeds removed': '2', 'grated parmesan': '1 1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic': '8', 'ground chicken, pork, or turkey': '1 1/2', 'Italian seasoning': '3', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'chopped fresh herbs, basil, thyme, oregano/ sage': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a bowl, mix together the milk, spinach, tomatoes, and mozzarella. Season with chili flakes, salt, and pepper.', '3. Place the squash on a baking sheet and season the cut sides with salt and pepper. Sprinkle 1/4 cup parmesan cheese into the bottom of each squash. Then evenly divide the milk/cheese mix among the squash cavities. Cover with foil, bake 15 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, mix the chicken, Italian seasoning, dijon, and 1/2 cup parmesan in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (makes 15-16 meatballs).', '5. Remove the squash from the oven, remove the foil. Arrange the meatballs around the squash. Bake another 15 minutes, until the meatballs are cooked.', '6. Grab the squash. Remove the garlic from the pan. Sprinkle the provolone cheese over each squash half. Put the meatballs on top of the cheese. Bake for 10-15 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '7. Chop the garlic and mix with the butter and herbs in a bowl. Spread the butter over the meatballs, then use a fork to scrape the squash into strands, mixing the cheese with the squash. Enjoy!']

title: Thai Chicken Zucchini Meatballs in Coconut Curry
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'shredded zucchini', 'green onions, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'grated, ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'cayenne pepper', 'black pepper', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'red bell pepper, sliced', 'salted butter', 'Thai red curry paste', 'coconut milk', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'basil and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'shredded zucchini': '1/2', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'grated, ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'tamari/soy sauce': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'red bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'salted butter': '2', 'Thai red curry paste': '1-3', 'coconut milk': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/4', 'basil and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, zucchini, green onions, 1 shallot, 2 teaspoons ginger, 1 clove garlic, cayenne, a pinch of pepper, and 2 teaspoons tamari/soy sauce to a bowl. Mix to combine. Coat your hands with oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs).', '2. Heat a large skillet with sides over medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil and the meatballs. Sear until crisp, 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Move to a plate.', '3. To the same skillet, add the remaining 1 tablespoon of oil, 1 shallot, 1 garlic clove, 1 tablespoon of ginger, the bell peppers, butter, and curry paste. Cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk and 3 tablespoons of tamari or soy sauce. Slide the meatballs into the curry sauce. Simmer over medium heat until the meatballs are cooked through, 5 minutes. Stir in the cilantro', '4. Serve the meatballs and sauce over rice with a squeeze of fresh lime, some fresh basil, and/or green onions.']

title: Skillet Caprese Prosciutto Chicken
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'prosciutto', 'boneless skinless chicken cutlets or thighs', 'lemon pepper seasoning', 'fresh sage, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar', 'honey', 'shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh thyme, chopped', 'chili flakes', 'cherry tomatoes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'mini mozzarella balls', 'grilled bread, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'prosciutto': '4', 'boneless skinless chicken cutlets or thighs': '6', 'lemon pepper seasoning': '2', 'fresh sage, chopped': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'champagne or apple cider vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '4-6', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1', 'fresh thyme, chopped': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'mini mozzarella balls': '8', 'grilled bread, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet set over medium-high heat. Add the prosciutto and cook until crispy all over, about 5 minutes. title: 20 Minute Garlic Butter Cashew Chicken

title: Pesto Chicken Avocado Orzo Salad

title: Quick Poblano Pineapple Shrimp Tacos with Cilantro Jalapeño Ranch
ingredients: ['large shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'poblano pepper, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'salsa verde', 'sea salt', 'fresh pineapple chunks', 'jalapeños, seeded, if desired and chopped', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'lime juice', 'warm tortillas and smashed avocado, for serving', 'plain Greek Yogurt or sour cream', 'mayo', 'fresh lime juice', 'fresh cilantro', 'fresh chopped chives', 'jalapeño, seeded, if desired', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'shredded cabbage, for serving']

title: Sheet Pan Honey Garlic Chicken and Feta Potatoes
ingredients: ['baby potatoes, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'skinless chicken thighs or breasts', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'dried thyme', 'smoked or regular paprika', 'chili flakes', 'garlic cloves, chopped', 'sesame seeds', 'asparagus, ends trimmed', 'mixed fresh parsley, basil, or thyme, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'feta cheese, cubed', 'lemon juice', 'pepperoncini, chopped', 'green olives, torn']

instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a large baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for 15 minutes, or until tender.', '3. In a bowl, toss together 2 tablespoons olive oil, the chicken, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, honey, thyme, paprika, garlic, sesame seeds, salt, pepper, and chili flakes.', '4. Remove the potatoes from the oven. Nestle the chicken around the potatoes.Add the asparagus, season with salt and pepper.\xa0Return the pan to the oven for 20-25 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through, keep an eye on the asparagus.', '5. To make the dressing. Combine the remaining 1/3 cup olive oil, 1-2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, herbs, pepperoncini, and olives.', '6. Remove the chicken from the oven. title: Hot Italian Stromboli
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'basil pesto', 'marinara sauce', 'Italian seasoning', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'thinly sliced pepperoni', 'thinly sliced deli chorizo', 'baby arugula', 'sesame seeds', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/2', 'marinara sauce': '2/3', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'crushed Calabrian chili paste, or chili flakes, to taste': '1-3', 'roasted red peppers, drained and sliced': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'thinly sliced pepperoni': '6', 'thinly sliced deli chorizo': '2-4', 'baby arugula': '1', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Divide the pizza dough into 2 balls. On a floured surface, roll the dough into a large rectangle, around 9×13 inches. Transfer to the baking sheet.', '3. Spread each piece of dough with pesto, marinara, and then sprinkle on the chilies and Italian seasoning. Arrange the peppers over the sauce. Top with equal amounts of mozzarella and provolone. Pepperoni, then chorizo. Finish with arugula, if desired.', '4. Tuck in two sides of the dough, then roll up into a log (like a cinnamon roll), pinch to seal. Place seam side down.', '5. Brush the tops of the stromboli with the beaten egg, then sprinkle with sesame seeds. Take a sharp knife and cut 2 small slits on the top of the dough.', '6. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Slice, serve, and enjoy!']

title: Hot Honey Crispy Salmon Bowls

title: Sheet Pan Spicy Shrimp Tacos with Jalapeño Lime Crema
ingredients: ['large shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cajun seasoning', 'fresh thyme', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'warm tortillas, hard shells, shredded lettuce. and avocado, for serving', 'cream cheese, or 1/2 cup sour cream', 'candied or pickled jalapeños', 'lime juice', 'chopped cilantro', 'chopped mango', 'chopped cilantro', 'zest from 1 lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'large shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cajun seasoning': '1-2', 'fresh thyme': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'warm tortillas, hard shells, shredded lettuce. and avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'cream cheese, or 1/2 cup sour cream': '6', 'candied or pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'lime juice': '2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/4', 'chopped mango': '1/2', 'zest from 1 lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the shrimp with olive oil, cajun seasoning, thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange in a single layer. Roast 6-8 minutes or until the shrimp is cooked. During the last minute, pull the shrimp out, and add the butter and garlic. title: Sesame Ginger Orange Chicken Salad…with crispy fried wontons
ingredients: ['sesame oil', 'toasted sesame oil', 'honey', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'orange zest', 'sesame seeds', 'avocado oil, for frying', 'wonton wrappers, sliced into strips', 'shredded cabbage', 'shredded lettuce', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'slivered almonds or peanuts', 'fresh orange slices', 'avocados sliced', 'chopped green onions', 'chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'sesame oil': '1/3', 'toasted sesame oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1/3', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'rice vinegar': '3', 'fresh grated ginger': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'orange zest': '1', 'sesame seeds': '2', 'avocado oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'wonton wrappers, sliced into strips': '1', 'shredded cabbage': '3', 'shredded lettuce': '3', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1-2', 'slivered almonds or peanuts': '1/3', 'fresh orange slices': '1', 'avocados sliced': '2', 'chopped green onions': '1/3', 'chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar or bowl.', '2. To make the wontons. Heat the oil in a skillet. Add the strips of wontons and let cook, 1-2 minutes, until deeply golden and crisp. Drain on paper towels, then sprinkle with flaky salt.', '3. To make the salad. In a salad bowl, combine the cabbage, lettuce, chicken, almonds, and orange slices. Pour over half the dressing, then toss to coat the greens. Add the avocados, fried wontons, green onions, and chili oil. ENJOY the yumminess.']

title: 30 Minute Coconut Curry Noodle Soup with Chili Crisp Chickpeas
ingredients: ['extra-virgin olive oil', 'fresh chopped ginger', 'shallot, chopped', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'low-sodium broth', 'fish sauce', 'creamy peanut butter', 'broccolini (or 3 cups spinach)', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped', 'egg or rice noodles', 'limes and peanuts, for serving', 'chickpeas, drained, plus patted dry', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'pure maple syrup', 'flaked unsweetened coconut', 'sesame seeds', 'chili oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh chopped ginger': '1', 'shallot, chopped': '1', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'low-sodium broth': '2-3', 'fish sauce': '3', 'creamy peanut butter': '3', 'broccolini (or 3 cups spinach)': '1', 'fresh cilantro or Thai basil, chopped': '1/4', 'egg or rice noodles': '8', 'limes and peanuts, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chickpeas, drained, plus patted dry': '1', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/4', 'pure maple syrup': '1', 'flaked unsweetened coconut': '1/2', 'sesame seeds': '3', 'chili oil': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. To make the chickpeas. Preheat oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the chickpeas with olive oil, tamari, maple syrup, and pepper. Bake for 15 minutes. Add the coconut and sesame seeds, toss and bake 5-10 minutes, until extra crisp. Remove and toss with chili oil.', '3. To make the soup. In a large pot, set over medium heat, cook the olive oil with the shallots, ginger, and red curry paste. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk, broth, fish sauce, peanut butter, and a pinch of black pepper. Simmer over medium heat, 5-8 minutes. Stir in the broccoli or spinach, and the cilantro.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the noodles according to package directions.', '5. Divide the noodles between bowls and ladle the soup over. Top each bowl with chickpeas, limes, and herbs.']

title: Crispy Rice Spicy Tuna Stack
ingredients: ['sushi rice', 'rice vinegar', 'granulated sugar', 'avocado oil, for frying', 'sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'sesame chili oil or regular sesame oil', 'grated ginger', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'chopped green onions', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'cubed Persian cucumbers', 'cubed avocado', 'nori and pickled candied jalapeños, for serving', 'olive oil mayo', 'Gochujang chili paste', 'soy sauce or tamari', 'honey']
ingredients with measurement: {'sushi rice': '2', 'rice vinegar': '1/4', 'granulated sugar': '2', 'avocado oil, for frying': 'seasoning', 'sushi grade tuna steaks, cubed': '2', 'soy sauce or tamari': '2', 'sesame chili oil or regular sesame oil': '1', 'grated ginger': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1 to 2', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'toasted sesame seeds': '1', 'cubed Persian cucumbers': '1', 'cubed avocado': '1', 'nori and pickled candied jalapeños, for serving': 'seasoning', 'olive oil mayo': '1/3', 'Gochujang chili paste': '1 to 2', 'honey': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the Rice. Bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add the rice and a pinch salt. Stir to combine, cover, then turn the heat down to the lowest setting possible. Allow the rice to cook 10 minutes on low, then turn the heat off completely and let the rice sit, covered, for another 15 minutes. Fluff the rice with a fork.', '2. Mix the rice vinegar and granulated sugar. Microwave for 30 seconds to dissolve the sugar. Pour over the fluffed rice and mix until the rice becomes super sticky. Line a square pan with parchment paper, then pat the rice into the pan, packing it in tightly. Cover abd freeze 30 minutes, until cold, and can easily be sliced. After the rice is chilled, cut into squares or use a biscuit cookie cutter to make 4 circles.', '3. To make the Tuna: In a bowl, combine the tuna, soy sauce (or tamari), sesame chili oil, ginger, red pepper flakes, green onion, and sesame seeds. Toss to mix.', '4. To make the Spicy Mayo. In a bowl, stir together the mayo, sriracha, honey, and soy sauce (or tamari).', '5. To assemble: Heat the avocado oil in a large skillet. Add the rice cakes and fry until golden, about 5 minutes, then flip, and cook until golden all over, about 3-5 minutes. Drain. Season with salt.', '6. In a dry 1-cup measure, layer 1/4 cup of the tuna, the cucumber, then the avocado. Run a knife around the edge of the cup to loosen, then invert the cup onto the fried rice, carefully remove the cup. Repeat with the remaining ingredients to create 4 stacks total.', '7. Place each stack on a nori sheet. Top each with microgreens, wonton crisps (if desired), candied jalapeños, and sesame seeds. Serve with the spicy mayo.']

title: Baked Crunchy Hot Honey Chicken
ingredients: ['cornflakes', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'smoked paprika', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'large eggs, beaten', 'hot sauce', 'chicken breast tenderloins', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling', 'honey', 'hot sauce', 'cayenne pepper', 'chipotle chili powder', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'sea salt', 'fresh thyme, cilantro, or parsley, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'cornflakes': '6', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'large eggs, beaten': '2', 'hot sauce': '2-3', 'chicken breast tenderloins': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1/2', 'cayenne pepper': '1-3', 'chipotle chili powder': '3/4', 'sea salt': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme, cilantro, or parsley, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. In a food processor, combine the cornflakes, parmesan, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Pulse until you have fine crumbs. Alternatively, you can crush the crumbs in a ziplock bag by stepping on them. Dump the crumbs into a shallow bowl.', '3. Beat the eggs in a bowl, add the hot sauce and chicken, and toss well to coat.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. For a thicker coating, dip the chicken back through the eggs, then through the crumbs a 2nd time. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 20-25 minutes, until crisp all around.', '4. Just before the chicken is done cooking, make the sauce. In a sauce pot, warm together the honey, hot sauce, cayenne, chili powder, onion powder, and garlic powder, plus a pinch of salt.', '5. Drizzle the warm sauce over the chicken. Top with herbs. If the sauce thickens, warm for 5 seconds in the microwave. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Crispy Pork Ramen
ingredients: ['medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'pork butt or 6 chicken thighs/breast', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'white miso paste', 'chili paste', 'Chinese 5 spice', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'honey or brown sugar', 'canned coconut milk', 'toasted sesame oil', 'ramen noodles', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving', 'toasted nori sheets, candied jalapeños, green onions, and chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'pork butt or 6 chicken thighs/breast': '2-3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '6-8', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/4', 'white miso paste': '2', 'chili paste': '2-4', 'Chinese 5 spice': '1', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '2', 'honey or brown sugar': '2-3', 'canned coconut milk': '1', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'ramen noodles': '4', 'soft or hard boiled eggs, for serving': 'seasoning', 'toasted nori sheets, candied jalapeños, green onions, and chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. \xa0Layer the onions on the bottom of your crockpot. Add the pork butt/chicken, broth, tamari, miso paste, chili paste, Chinese 5 spice, ginger, and mushrooms. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4-6 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the pork and place it onto a baking sheet. Break into a few chunks. Drizzle each chunk with honey. Broil until caramelized on top, about 5-8 minutes, but watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Stir in the coconut milk and toasted sesame oil. Add the noodles and let cook, uncovered, for about 5 minutes.', '4. Ladle the broth, mushrooms, and noodles into bowls. Top with crispy pork. Top as desired with eggs, green onions, jalapeños, and chili oil. Serve immediately.']

title: Spicy Buffalo White Chicken Chili Tacos
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped', 'dried parsley', 'dried chives', 'dried dill', 'dried garlic', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'buffalo sauce', 'salsa verde', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine', 'lime juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'ground chicken': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'poblano pepper, seeded and chopped': '1', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried chives': '2', 'dried dill': '1', 'dried garlic': '1', 'smoked paprika': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'salsa verde': '1/2', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '3/4', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, chopped + 2 tablespoons brine': '1/4', 'lime juice': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil, chicken, and onion over medium heat. Cook the meat, breaking it up as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the poblano pepper, parsley, chives, dill, garlic powder, paprika, and a pinch of salt. Add 1/3 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, 5 minutes. Stir in the buffalo sauce and salsa verde. Cook until most of the sauce coats the chicken, 5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Line the taco shells up on a sheet pan or in a 9×13 inch baking dish. Transfer to the oven and bake 5 minutes. Evenly divide the meat among each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.', '4. Meanwhile, make the "ranch". Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir until creamy.', '5. Serve the tacos topped with the ranch, avocado, candied jalapeños, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Sweet Potato Cheddar Pierogi with Bacon Bits
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter, melted', 'plain full fat greek yogurt', 'large egg', 'sweet potatoes', 'salted butter', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'thick cut bacon, finely chopped', 'salted butter', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'chili flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'salted butter, melted': '2', 'plain full fat greek yogurt': '1', 'large egg': '1', 'sweet potatoes': '2', 'salted butter': '6', 'shredded sharp cheddar cheese': '1 1/2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'thick cut bacon, finely chopped': '6', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dough. In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, butter, yogurt, and egg, and mix until combined. Knead the dough for 2-3 minutes. Cover and let sit 30 minutes.', '2. To make the filling. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Prick the sweet potatoes all over with a fork. Bake directly on the rack until tender, 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool.', '3. Once cool use your hands to peel away the sweet potato skins. They should just easily slip off. Place the potatoes in a bowl and mash well. Stir in the cheddar cheese, garlic powder, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '4. Roll the dough out onto a floured surface to 1/8 inch thickness. Using a biscuit cutter, cut out 3-inch circles.\xa0Spoon 2 teaspoons of filling into the center of each round. Brush the edges with water and fold half of the dough over the filling to enclose it. Press down the edges to seal, pressing out all the air. Keep the dough covered as you work to prevent it from drying out. At this point, the\xa0pierogi can be flash-frozen on a baking sheet for 30 minutes, then transferred to a freezer bag and frozen for up to 3 months.', '5. When ready to cook, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pierogi in batches for 2-3 minutes, or until they float. Drain.', '6. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Pull it out, and drain the excess fat. Add the butter and rosemary. Cook 2-3 minutes, until the butter is brown and the rosemary is crisp.\xa0Remove from the heat and add the chili flakes.', '7. Drop the pierogi into the sauce, gently tossing to combine. Serve in the sauce, and top with cheddar cheese and bacon bits. EAT!']

title: Crockpot Coq au Vin Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground turkey or chicken', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh sage', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'tomato paste', 'carrots, chopped', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'thick-cut bacon, halved', 'onion, quartered', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves', 'bay leaves', 'thyme', 'salted butter', 'fresh parsley, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground turkey or chicken': '1 1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'chopped fresh thyme': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'dry red wine, such as Cabernet Sauvignon': '3/4', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3/4', 'tomato paste': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '1', 'thick-cut bacon, halved': '2', 'onion, quartered': '1', 'garlic, top trimmed off to reveal the cloves': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'thyme': '4', 'salted butter': '6', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Add the chicken, 3/4 cup parmesan, sage, thyme, onion powder, garlic powder, chili flakes, salt, and pepper to a bowl. Mix to combine. Roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 16-18 meatballs).', '2. Pour over the wine and broth. Add the tomato paste, carrots, mushrooms, and bacon. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange the onion, garlic, bay leaves, and thyme around the meatballs. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or on high for 1-2 hours.', '3. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meatballs and garlic from the slow cooker and place onto a baking sheet. Remove and discard the bacon and bay leaves. Crank the heat on the slow cooker to high. Let cook, uncovered, 10-30 minutes.', '4. Sprinkle the meatballs with 1/4 cup parmesan. Arrange the butter around the meatballs and garlic, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop the garlic and mix with the butter on the sheet pan. Toss the meatballs in the butter.', '5. Serve the meatballs in the sauce with parsley and parmesan.']

title: Skillet Roasted herb Butter Chicken and Orzo
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'yellow curry powder', 'salted butter', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'white wine or apple cider', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'lemon juice', 'shallots, halved', 'celery, chopped', 'carrots, chopped', 'garlic', 'dry orzo', 'parmesan rind']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'white wine or apple cider': '1/3', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4-5', 'lemon juice': '2', 'shallots, halved': '2', 'celery, chopped': '2', 'carrots, chopped': '4', 'garlic': '1', 'dry orzo': '3/4', 'parmesan rind': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Cook the olive oil and onion in a large oven-safe skillet with sides, over medium heat, until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Push the onions to the side. Add the chicken and sprinkle with the curry powder. Season with salt and pepper. Add the butter, shallots, celery, carrots, thyme, and sage. Season again with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes.', '2. Pour in the apple cider, 2-3 cups broth, and lemon juice. Add the garlic and parmesan rind. Transfer to the oven and cook uncovered for 15 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.', '3. Pull the skillet out, add 1/2 cup of broth and the orzo. Return to the oven and cook 10-12 minutes, until the orzo is al dente. If you want more broth, add the remaining 1-2 1/2 cups.', '4. Serve the chicken over the orzo and broth. Top with parmesan (if desired), plus thyme or parsley.']

title: Coconut Curry Chicken Meatballs Soup with Rice
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'small shallots, chopped', 'chopped fresh ginger', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'black pepper + kosher salt', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'garlic, chopped', 'red curry paste', 'yellow curry powder', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'cubed sweet potatoes', 'cans coconut milk', 'baby spinach', 'cooked basmati rice', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'toasted chili sesame oil']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'small shallots, chopped': '2', 'chopped fresh ginger': '1', 'tamari or soy sauce': '2', 'black pepper + kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'red curry paste': '2', 'yellow curry powder': '1', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '2', 'cubed sweet potatoes': '1', 'cans coconut milk': '2', 'baby spinach': '2', 'cooked basmati rice': '2', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/3', 'toasted chili sesame oil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, 1 shallot, 1 tablespoon ginger, tamari, and a pinch of pepper, Coat your hands with a bit of oil, and roll the meat into tablespoon-size balls (will make 15-16 meatballs).', '2. Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a medium pot. Add the meatballs and sear until crisp, about 4-5 minutes, turning them 2-3 times. Transfer to a plate.', '3. To the same pot, add the curry paste, curry powder, 1 shallot, 1 tablespoon ginger, and the garlic. Cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Stir in the chicken broth and sweet potatoes. Cover and cook over medium heat until the potato is tender about 10 minutes. Add the coconut milk and spinach. Simmer, uncovered another 5-10 minutes, until thickened slightly. Slide the meatballs back into the soup. Stir in the cilantro. Season with salt.', '5. Divide the rice among bowls and ladle the soup and meatballs overtop. Drizzle with chili oil. Serve with Naan on the side. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Herb Butter Chicken and Wild Rice
ingredients: ['wild rice blend', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'dried parsley', 'carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces', 'sliced cremini mushrooms', 'chopped celery', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'dried thyme', 'dried rosemary', 'paprika', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, smashed', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage', 'parmesan rind (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'wild rice blend': '1 1/2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces': '2', 'sliced cremini mushrooms': '1', 'chopped celery': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3 1/2', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'dried thyme': '2', 'dried rosemary': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'garlic, smashed': '6', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh sage': '8', 'parmesan rind (optional)': '1'}
instructions: ['1. In the bowl of your crockpot, combine the wild rice, onion, carrots, mushrooms, celery, and dried parsley. Season well with salt and pepper. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and toss. Pour over the chicken broth.', '2. In a bowl, toss the chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil, thyme, rosemary, paprika, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the crockpot. Add the garlic cloves. If you have one, add a parmesan rind. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or on high for 2-3 hours.', '3. Before serving, preheat the broiler to high. Remove the chicken and garlic from the crockpot and place on a baking sheet. Arrange the butter and sage around the chicken and garlic, then broil 1-3 minutes, until crisp. Peel away the garlic skin, then chop, and mix with the butter on the sheet pan. Toss the chicken in the butter.', '4. To serve, fluff the rice with a fork and serve the chicken, rice, and veggies together.\xa0If there is any butter left on the pan, drizzle it over the chicken.']

title: Crockpot Sunday Sauce
ingredients: ['bone in beef short ribs', 'kosher salt', 'black pepper', 'crushed san Marzano tomatoes', 'tomato paste', 'chopped oil packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'red wine', 'carrots, cut into large pieces', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'pickled jalapeños', 'Italian seasoning', 'chili flakes', 'parmesan rind, plus grated parmesan, for serving', 'garlic, top portion trimmed off', 'salted butter', 'pasta, plus fresh basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'bone in beef short ribs': '5', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed san Marzano tomatoes': '2', 'tomato paste': '1', 'chopped oil packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'red wine': '1 1/2', 'carrots, cut into large pieces': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/3', 'Italian seasoning': '2', 'chili flakes': '1/2 -1', 'parmesan rind, plus grated parmesan, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic, top portion trimmed off': '1', 'salted butter': '6', 'pasta, plus fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Season the short ribs with salt and pepper. Heat a large skillet over high heat, sear the ribs on both sides. Place the ribs in the slow cooker.', '2. To the slow cooker, add the tomatoes, tomato paste, sun-dried tomatoes, wine, carrots, onion, pickled jalapeños, Italian seasoning, and season generously with salt, pepper, and chili flakes. Stir the sauce to combine.', '3. Place the parmesan rind in the sauce. Add the garlic head. Cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours or on high for 5-6 hours. During the last hour of cooking, remove the garlic.', '4. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of their skins. Add both the butter and cloves to a skillet set over medium heat. Mash the garlic into the butter, allowing the butter to brown and some of the garlic to get crispy. Remove from the heat.', '5. Remove the parmesan rind. Shred the ribs and add them to the sauce. Stir the garlic butter into the sauce. Serve over pasta. Top with parmesan and basil. Enjoy!']

title: Zucchini Carbonara with Crispy Prosciutto and Burrata
ingredients: ['prosciutto, torn', 'garlic, smashed', 'olive oil, for drizzling', 'zucchini, or yellow summer squash, grated or cut into thin strands', 'large eggs, at room temperature', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'lemon zest', 'chili flakes', 'spaghetti', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'burrata or ricotta, at room temperature']
ingredients with measurement: {'prosciutto, torn': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'olive oil, for drizzling': 'seasoning', 'zucchini, or yellow summer squash, grated or cut into thin strands': '2', 'large eggs, at room temperature': '2', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'grated pecorino cheese': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'lemon zest': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'spaghetti': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'burrata or ricotta, at room temperature': '8'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the prosciutto in an even layer. Add the garlic and toss with olive oil. Bake 8-10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crisp and the garlic roasted.', '2. Meanwhile, place the zucchini in a colander. Toss with a tiny pinch of salt.', '3. whisk together the eggs, parmesan, pecorino, garlic, basil, thyme, chili flakes, lemon zest, salt, and pepper in a large serving bowl.', '3. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before draining, scoop out about 1 cup of the pasta water, then drain directly over the zucchini. This will heat the zucchini.', '4. Immediately\xa0add the hot pasta to\xa0the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble) until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Thin the sauce with a bit of the reserved pasta water, until it reaches your desired consistency.\xa0Be careful when adding the water, the zucchini will naturally release some water into the sauce. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve topped with freshly torn burrata, prosciutto, and herbs. Enjoy!']

title: White Corn Pizza
ingredients: ['pizza dough, at room temperature', 'basil pesto', 'garlic, grated', 'small shallot, thinly sliced', 'chili flakes', 'ricotta cheese', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'fresh sweet yellow corn', 'candied or pickled jalapeños', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'small shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'ricotta cheese': '1/2', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone cheese': '1', 'fresh sweet yellow corn': '1', 'candied or pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Rub a large baking sheet with olive oil.', "2. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's pretty thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread on the pesto, and add the garlic, shallot, and chili flakes. Then add dollops of ricotta, the mozzarella, and provolone. Spoon over the corn and jalapeños (if using).", '3. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven and top with fresh basil. Slice and enjoy!']

title: Buffalo Ranch Pretzel Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: ['egg, beaten', 'boneless chicken tenders', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists', 'dried chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'buffalo sauce', 'torn ciabatta bread', 'mixed greens', 'chopped celery', 'shaved parmesan', 'avocados, diced', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'cooked thick cut bacon, crumbled', 'mayo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'lemon juice', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan']
ingredients with measurement: {'egg, beaten': '1', 'boneless chicken tenders': '1', 'finely crushed salted pretzel twists': '1', 'dried chives': '1', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'torn ciabatta bread': '1', 'mixed greens': '6', 'chopped celery': '1', 'shaved parmesan': '1/2', 'avocados, diced': '1-2', 'crumbled blue cheese': '4', 'cooked thick cut bacon, crumbled': '4', 'mayo': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '3', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment.', '2. In a bowl, whisk the eggs. Add the chicken and toss to coat. Combine the pretzels, chives, parsley, dill, garlic powder, onion powder, and a pinch of pepper in a bowl.', '3. Dredge the chicken through the crumbs, pressing to adhere. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Drizzle the chicken with olive oil. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Toss the hot chicken in buffalo sauce.', '5. To make the salad. Combine the greens, breadcrumbs, blue cheese (or use cheddar or parmesan), avocados, and bacon in a salad bowl.', '6. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper. Toss the salad with the dressing, saving some for serving.', '7. Toss the chicken in with the salad. Add a little more of the dressing and extra buffalo sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Chicken Fajita Tortilla Bowls
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced', 'smoked paprika', 'chili powder or Tajin', 'cumin', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'garlic, chopped', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'cooked rice', 'grilled corn kernels', 'crumbled cotija cheese', 'shredded lettuce, mashed/whipped avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro, for serving', 'tortillas, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salsa verde', 'lime juice', 'spicy honey', 'cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs, thinly sliced': '1 1/2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'chili powder or Tajin': '2', 'cumin': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'bell peppers, sliced': '3', 'cooked rice': '3-4', 'grilled corn kernels': '3', 'crumbled cotija cheese': '1/2', 'shredded lettuce, mashed/whipped avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'tortillas, for serving': 'seasoning', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'spicy honey': '2', 'cilantro, chopped': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, combine the olive oil, chicken, paprika, chili powder (or Tajin), cumin, salt, and pepper. Toss to coat. Set the skillet over high heat. Cook until seared all over and cooked through, 8-10 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the garlic. Cook 1 minute, then remove everything from the skillet.', '2. In the same skillet, add the onions and cook until fragrant, about 5 minutes. Toss in the bell peppers. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until the peppers are tender, another 5 minutes.', '3. Add the chicken to the peppers and toss to combine.', '4. To make the vinaigrette, combine all ingredients in a glass jar. Season with salt.', '5. Spoon the chicken and peppers over the bowls of rice. Top with lettuce and grilled corn. Sprinkle the corn with chili powder or Tajin, then pour over the vinaigrette. Crumble the cheese over each bowl. Top with avocado, jalapeños, and cilantro. Serve with tortillas. Enjoy!']

title: Summer Chicken Salad with Hot Bacon Dressing
ingredients: ['thick-cut slices of bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, thinly sliced', 'garlic, grated', 'apple cider vinegar', 'fig preserves', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chili flakes', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'torn ciabatta bread', 'clove garlic, grated', 'mixed salad greens', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded', 'roasted/grilled bell peppers, sliced', 'grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'avocado, sliced', 'crumbled blue cheese or feta cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick-cut slices of bacon, chopped': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'apple cider vinegar': '3', 'fig preserves': '1', 'fresh thyme leaves': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'torn ciabatta bread': '1', 'clove garlic, grated': '1', 'mixed salad greens': '6', 'grilled chicken, cubed or shredded': '2', 'roasted/grilled bell peppers, sliced': '1-2', 'grilled corn, kernels removed from the cob': '3', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese or feta cheese': '1/2'}

title: Quick Wontons in Chile Oil with Asparagus
ingredients: ['ground chicken or pork', 'shredded cabbage', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'green onions, chopped', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'pinch of black pepper', 'square wonton wrappers', 'sesame oil', 'fresh grated ginger', 'garlic, grated', 'chile sauce', 'chili flakes, to taste', 'paprika', 'sesame seeds', 'honey', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'asparagus, ends trimmed']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken or pork': '3/4', 'shredded cabbage': '1 1/2', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'tamari or soy sauce': '3', 'pinch of black pepper': 'seasoning', 'square wonton wrappers': '24-26', 'sesame oil': '3/4', 'chile sauce': '1', 'chili flakes, to taste': '1-3', 'paprika': '1', 'sesame seeds': '3', 'honey': '1', 'asparagus, ends trimmed': '1'}
instructions: ['1. To make the wontons, combine all ingredients in a bowl except the wrappers.', '2. To assemble, spoon 2 teaspoons of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper.\xa0Fold the edges of the wrapper up and around the filling and pinch to seal.\xa0Repeat with the remaining filling.', '3. To make the chili oil.\xa0Combine the ginger, garlic, chile sauce, chili flakes, paprika, 2 tablespoons sesame seeds, and honey in a heat proof bowl. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat until it sizzles, 5 minutes. Pour the oil over the spices, stir to combine, then add 2 tablespoons tamari/soy sauce.', '4. In the same skillet, cook the asparagus over medium heat until tender, 3-5 minutes.\xa0Turn the heat off and add 1 tablespoon tamari/soy sauce and 1 tablespoon sesame seeds. Toss to combine.', '5. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the wontons until they float, 3-4 minutes. Toss the warm wontons in the chili oil. If desired, spoon over some of the hot wonton cooking water to create a spicy broth. Serve the asparagus on the side.']

title: Sheet Pan Chipotle Salmon Tacos with Pineapple Jalapeño Salsa

title: Simple Thai Yellow Chicken Curry with Spicy Garlic Butter

ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'baby potatoes, cubed': '3/4', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'boneless chicken breasts, cubed': '1 1/2', 'Thai red curry paste': '2', 'yellow curry powder': '2', 'lemongrass paste': '1', 'canned full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'fish sauce or tamari': '2', 'chopped fresh cilantro': '1/3', 'juice and zest of 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'honey': '2'}

title: Folded Crispy Chicken and Cheese Wraps
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'yellow onion chopped', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'garlic, chopped', 'dried oregano', 'ground cumin', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to taste', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'whole wheat, or gluten-free, tortillas', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'chopped pickles', 'chopped cilantro', 'mustard', 'very thin slices deli ham', 'shredded swiss cheese', 'shredded pepper jack cheese', 'avocado, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'pickled jalapeños, use to your taste', 'lime juice', 'cumin', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'mayo']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'yellow onion chopped': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'dried oregano': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'cayenne pepper, using more or less to taste': '1/2', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole wheat, or gluten-free, tortillas': '4', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '2', 'chopped pickles': '1/2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/2', 'mustard': '4', 'very thin slices deli ham': '4', 'shredded swiss cheese': '1/2', 'shredded pepper jack cheese': '1/2', 'avocado, halved': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1', 'pickled jalapeños, use to your taste': '1/4- 1/2', 'lime juice': '2', 'cumin': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'mayo': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. Add the onion and chicken and cook 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, oregano, cumin, cayenne, and season with salt and pepper. Cook another 5 minutes until the chicken is browned.', '2. To assemble, cut down from the center of the tortilla to the edge (see above photo). Spread the chicken in the bottom left corner, then add a handful of the lettuce, pickles, and cilantro on the top left corner. Spread the mustard on the top right corner, add the cheese, and ham (see photos for visuals). Fold the chicken over the lettuce. Then, working clockwise, fold that quarter over the ham. And finally, fold that quarter over the bottom corner with cheese.', '3. To make the jalapeño sauce, combine all ingredients except the mayo in a blender. Blend until smooth. Now add the mayo and season with salt. Pulse to combine.', '4. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 wrap and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with jalapeño sauce.']

title: Coconut Curry Salmon with Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['salmon filets', 'spicy curry powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'salted butter', 'Thai red curry paste', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chopped broccoli', 'canned full-fat coconut milk', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'fish sauce', 'garlic, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'salmon filets': '4', 'spicy curry powder': '2-3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'honey': '2', 'salted butter': '6', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chopped broccoli': '1 1/2', 'canned full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '2', 'fish sauce': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '3-4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler.', '2. Place the salmon on a baking sheet and rub with olive oil, curry powder, and season with salt and pepper. Drizzle the honey over the salmon. Broil until crisping on top, 3-5 minutes, watch closely.', '3. In a large skillet over medium heat, melt together 1 tablespoon butter, the curry paste, and ginger. Cook, 2-3 minutes until very fragrant. Add the broccoli, coconut milk, tamari or soy sauce, and fish sauce. Slide the salmon into the sauce and simmer for 3-5 minutes, or until cooked to your liking.', '4. Meanwhile, melt together 5 tablespoons butter, the garlic, and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the butter is browning and the garlic crisps.', '5. Serve the salmon and sauce over bowls of rice. Drizzle the butter over the salmon and top with basil or cilantro.']

title: One Skillet Lemon Butter Dijon Chicken and Orzo with Feta Sauce
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'Dijon mustard', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallots, chopped', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'smoked paprika', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'salted butter', 'lemon, sliced', 'orzo pasta', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'chopped kale', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving', 'feta cheese', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic, grated', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'shallots, chopped': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'salted butter': '3', 'lemon, sliced': '1', 'orzo pasta': '1 1/2', 'low sodium chicken broth': '3', 'chopped kale': '2', 'chopped fresh dill, for serving': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese': '4-6', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic, grated': '1', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 400° F.', '2. In a bowl, mix 2 tablespoons olive oil, Dijon mustard, 3 cloves garlic, 1 shallot, rosemary, paprika, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the chicken and toss well to combine.', '3. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken. Sear on both sides until golden, 3-5 minutes. During the last 2 minutes of cooking, add the butter and lemon slices. Remove everything from the skillet.', '4. Add the orzo, 1 shallot, and 1 clove of garlic. Cook until the orzo is toasted, about 2 minutes. Add the broth, kale, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice.\xa0Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil over high heat. Slide the chicken, lemon slices, and any juices left on the pan back into the skillet.\xa0Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.', '5. Meanwhile, make the\xa0feta sauce.\xa0Combine the feta, yogurt, garlic, and lemon juice in a blender and blend until creamy. Stir in the paprika, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. If desired, thin with additional lemon juice.', '6. Serve the chicken and orzo topped with the feta sauce and dill.']

title: Buffalo Cauliflower with Spicy Tahini Ranch
ingredients: ['head cauliflower, cut into florets', 'eggs', 'finely crushed corn flake crumbs', 'smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'hot sauce', 'melted butter or extra virgin olive oil', 'seasoned salt', 'tahini', 'lemon juice', 'dijon mustard', 'dried chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste', 'kosher salt and pepper']
ingredients with measurement: {'head cauliflower, cut into florets': '1', 'eggs': '3', 'finely crushed corn flake crumbs': '1 1/4', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, use to your taste': '1/4 – 1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'hot sauce': '1/2', 'melted butter or extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'seasoned salt': '1/2', 'tahini': '1/4', 'lemon juice': '2', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'dried chives': '2', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried dill': '1', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, add the cauliflower and toss well to coat. In a separate bowl combine the corn flake crumbs, paprika, cayenne, and a pinch each of salt and pepper.', '3. Dredge the cauliflower through the crumbs, covering fully. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining cauliflower. Bake for 20-25 minutes, turning the cauliflower halfway through cooking.', '4. Meanwhile, whisk together the hot sauce, butter, seasoned salt, and a pinch of black pepper until smooth. Pour the sauce over the cauliflower, gently tossing to coat. Return to the oven for 5 minutes.', '5. To make the tahini ranch, combine everything in a bowl, whisking in 1/4 to 1/2 cup water to thin the dressing. Taste and season with salt and pepper.', '6. Serve the cauliflower with extra buffalo sauce and tahini ranch on the side for dipping. Enjoy!']

title: Crockpot Korean Inspired Tacos with Yum Yum Yummm Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless short ribs or 2 pounds flank steak', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'honey', 'Gochujang', 'fresh ginger peeled', 'garlic', 'small pear, cored and quartered', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed', 'sesame salsa verde, for serving', 'avocado, sesame seeds, queso, for serving', 'shredded green cabbage', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresno peppers, seeded, if desired, and sliced', 'lime juice', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'rice vinegar', 'olive oil  mayo', 'Gochujang', 'low sodium soy sauce', 'juice from 1/2 a lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless short ribs or 2 pounds flank steak': '3', 'low sodium soy sauce': '2', 'rice vinegar': '2', 'honey': '1/4', 'Gochujang': '1-2', 'fresh ginger peeled': '1', 'garlic': '4', 'small pear, cored and quartered': '1', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed': '8-10', 'sesame salsa verde, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, sesame seeds, queso, for serving': 'seasoning', 'shredded green cabbage': '3', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1', 'green onions, chopped': '6', 'fresno peppers, seeded, if desired, and sliced': '1-2', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'olive oil  mayo': '1/2', 'juice from 1/2 a lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a blender, combine the soy sauce, vinegar, honey, Gochujang, ginger, garlic, and pear. Blend until mostly smooth, then pour the sauce into the bowl of your crockpot. Stir in 1/2 cup water. Add the meat, then cover and cook on LOW for 6-8 hours or on HIGH for 3-4 hours.', '2. Preheat the broiler to high. Remove the meat from the sauce to a baking sheet and lightly shred. Add 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid. Broil for 2-5 minutes, until the meat caramelizes. Watch closely! Toss with additional cooking liquid, if desired.', '3. To make the slaw. In a bowl, mix the cabbage, cilantro, green onions, peppers, lime juice, soy sauce, and rice vinegar.', '4. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.', '5. Stuff the meat, slaw, and avocado, into the warmed tortillas. Top with sauces, sesame seeds, and cheese.']

title: Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed', 'Italian seasoning', 'paprika or smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'salted butter', 'medium shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'short cut pasta', 'heavy cream', 'Dijon mustard', 'fresh baby spinach', 'juice of 1 lemon']
ingredients with measurement: {'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '4', 'paprika or smoked paprika': '1', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan cheese': '3/4', 'salted butter': '2', 'medium shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'heavy cream': '1', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'fresh baby spinach': '2', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside.', '2. Set the pot over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, 3 teaspoons Italian seasoning, the paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup parmesan, cook another minute, then remove the chicken from the pot.', '3. To the same pot, add the butter, shallot, garlic, and 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning. Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, 8 minutes. Stir in the cream, mustard, parmesan, spinach, and chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate.', '4. Serve the pasta topped with lemon juice and fresh parmesan.']

title: Simple Baked Cheesy Italian Chicken Meatballs
ingredients: ['ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'ground chicken', 'soft whole grain bread', 'eggs', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'small shallots, grated', 'garlic, grated', 'chopped pepperoncinis', 'marinara sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone', 'fresh oregano']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '1', 'ground chicken': '1', 'soft whole grain bread': '2', 'eggs': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/3', 'small shallots, grated': '2', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'chopped pepperoncinis': '1-2', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded provolone': '1', 'fresh oregano': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Grease a 9×13 inch baking dish with olive oil.', '2. Take the bread and run it under water until dampened but not soaked. Gently squeeze the excess water out of the bread and then crumble the dampened bread into pieces.', '3. In a bowl, combine the sausage, chicken, bread crumble, eggs, parmesan, shallots, garlic, pepperoncinis, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Coat your hands with olive oil, then roll the meat into 2 tablespoon size balls, and place them into the prepared baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until the meatballs are crisp on the outside, but not yet cooked through on the inside.', '4. Remove from the oven and pour the marinara over top the meatballs. Cover the pan with foil and bake for 15 minutes longer, or until the meatballs are cooked through. Remove the foil and add the cheeses and oregano. Bake until the cheese is melted and golden, about 10 minutes. Serve topped with fresh oregano and your favorite pasta!']

title: Rosemary Roasted Butternut Squash Pizza
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium butternut squash, seeded, skin removed, and sliced', 'Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix', 'honey', 'red pepper flakes', 'basil pesto', 'crispy bacon, crumbled', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'medium butternut squash, seeded, skin removed, and sliced': '½', 'Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix': '1 1/2', 'honey': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'crispy bacon, crumbled': '3', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 portion of your oven. Preheat the oven to 425° F. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. Place the pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Gently press the dough until it covers most of the sheet pan. Cover and let sit while you prep the pizza.', '3. On another baking sheet, toss together the olive oil, butternut squash, Rosemary Herb Seasoning Mix, honey, and a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes (if desired). Roast for 15-20 minutes, until the squash is just tender, then remove from oven. Increase the heat to 500° F.', '4. To assemble. Take the sheet pan with the dough and spread on the pesto. Next, layer on the butternut squash and bacon. Then top with the cheeses.', '5. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top with basil. Enjoy!']

title: Healthier Homemade One Pot Hamburger Helper

instructions: ['1. In a large pot set over medium hight heat,\xa0add the olive oil, onion and beef. Season with salt and pepper. Cook until brown all over, breaking up the meat as you go, about 10 minutes. Stir in the chili powder, paprika, and garlic powder, cook another minute.', '2. Add the pasta and zucchini and toss to coat, then pour in the broth and milk. Add the ketchup and stir to combine. Season with salt.', '3. Bring to a gentle boil over medium high heat.
