Enjoy!']

title: Easy Baked Cheesy Cauliflower Pizzas
ingredients: ['medium heads of cauliflower, sliced into 1 1/2 inch slices', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'marinara sauce', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'sliced pepperoni', 'basil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'medium heads of cauliflower, sliced into 1 1/2 inch slices': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'marinara sauce': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'sliced pepperoni': '3', 'basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. Stand the\xa0cauliflower on its stem, cut them in to 1½ inch slices. Place on a baking sheet and rub with olive oil.', '3. In a bowl, combine the thyme, oregano, paprika, garlic, and onion powder. Sprinkle over the cauliflower, then season with salt and pepper. Bake 15 minutes.', '4. Remove from the oven and spoon over the marinara sauce. Top with equal amounts of the cheeses and then the pepperoni. Bake 5 minutes, then switch the oven to broil and broil 1-2 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '5. Top with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Cheesy Buffalo Chicken Strombolis
ingredients: ['pizza dough', 'cooked shredded chicken', 'buffalo sauce', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'ranch dressing', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'sesame seeds', 'Italian seasoning', 'egg, beaten']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough': '1', 'cooked shredded chicken': '1', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'fresh cilantro or parsley, chopped': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped': '1', 'ranch dressing': '1/2', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/2', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2', 'sesame seeds': '1', 'Italian seasoning': '1', 'egg, beaten': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', '2.In a bowl, combine the chicken, buffalo sauce, cilantro, chives, and jalapeño.', '3. Divide the pizza dough into 4 balls. On a floured surface, roll the dough into about an 8-inch circle/oval. Spread each piece of dough with ranch, then add buffalo chicken on top in an even layer. Top with equal amounts of mozzarella and cheddar. Drizzle with additional buffalo sauce, if desired. Tuck in two sides of the dough, then roll up into a log (like a cinnamon roll), pinch to seal. Place seam side down on the prepared baking sheet.', '4. In a bowl, combine the parmesan, sesame seeds, and Italian seasoning. Brush the tops of the stromboli with the beaten egg, then sprinkle with the parmesan. Take a sharp knife and cut 2 small slits in the top of the dough.', '5. Bake for 10 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375° and bake another 20 to 30 minutes or until golden brown on top. Serve with additional buffalo sauce and/or ranch. ENJOY!']

title: Peach Burrata Crostini with Burst Cherry Tomato Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'small cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme', 'red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'champagne or white balsamic vinegar', 'sourdough or french baguette, sliced', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'peaches, sliced', 'fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'small cherry tomatoes': '2', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'champagne or white balsamic vinegar': '2', 'sourdough or french baguette, sliced': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'peaches, sliced': '2', 'fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, tomatoes, garlic, thyme, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes just begin to burst about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool slightly, then stir in the vinegar.', '2. Preheat your grill to high heat or preheat your oven to 400° F.', '3. Place the bread on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil on both sides of each slice, season with salt. Place the bread on the grill and grill both sides for about 2-3 minutes per side or until lightly toasted. Remove from the grill.', "4. Break the burrata over the bread. Top with a layer of peaches, then spoon over the tomato vinaigrette. Top with fresh basil and enjoy! We love these warm, but they're great at room temp too."]

title: Creamy Corn, Zucchini, and Bacon Chowder
ingredients: ['thick cut bacon, chopped', 'salted butter', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'zucchini or yellow squash, chopped', 'yellow corn kernels', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh thyme', 'smoked paprika', 'red pepper flakes, to your taste', 'russet potatoes, peeled and chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'whole milk or heavy cream', 'honey', 'shredded gouda cheese', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'chopped chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'thick cut bacon, chopped': '5', 'salted butter': '2', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'zucchini or yellow squash, chopped': '1-2', 'yellow corn kernels': '5', 'garlic, chopped': '3', 'fresh thyme': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes, to your taste': 'seasoning', 'russet potatoes, peeled and chopped': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '4', 'whole milk or heavy cream': '1', 'honey': '1', 'shredded gouda cheese': '1', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'chopped chives': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a large pot over medium heat, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove the bacon and reserve for topping. If there is an excess amount of bacon grease, remove all but 1 tablespoon of grease.', '2. To the pot, add the butter, onion, and zucchini and cook another 5 minutes or until fragrant. Add the corn, garlic, thyme, paprika, and a big pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook another 2 minutes. Add the potatoes and broth. Cover, and bring the soup to a boil, simmer 10-15 minutes, until the potato is soft.', '3. Transfer 1/2 of the chowder to a blender and blend until mostly smooth. Return to the pot. Stir in the cream, honey, and both cheeses, and cook 5 minutes or until the cheese has melted and the chowder thickens slightly. Stir in the chives and remove from the heat.', '4. Ladle the chowder into bowls and top with bacon, additional cheese, and any fresh herbs you love most. I use basil, thyme and oregano. Enjoy!']

title: One Pot Melty Burrata Lemon Pesto Pasta
ingredients: ['pasta', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'basil pesto', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh basil, torn', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon']

instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the pasta to al dente, according to package directions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta cooking water. Drain.', '2. In the same pot set over medium-high heat, add the olive oil, shallot, garlic, thyme, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook another minute. title: Picnic Style Brie and Prosciutto Sandwich.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fig preserves', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh basil', 'chopped fresh thyme', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'pitted mixed olives, chopped', 'roasted bell peppers, sliced', 'assorted deli meat', 'Brie, sliced', 'baby arugula']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/3', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'fig preserves': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh basil': '2', 'chopped fresh thyme': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'pitted mixed olives, chopped': '1/2', 'roasted bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'assorted deli meat': '9-12', 'Brie, sliced': '1', 'baby arugula': '2'}
instructions: ['1. To make the vinaigrette. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '2. Lay the bread cut side up on a cutting board. title: Pesto Peach Chicken in White Wine with Burrata
ingredients: ['large egg, beaten', 'all-purpose flour or use gluten free', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cold salted butter, cubed', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'fresh lemon juice', 'peaches, sliced', 'honey', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'basil pesto', 'fresh basil, torn']
ingredients with measurement: {'large egg, beaten': '1', 'all-purpose flour or use gluten free': '1/4', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '1', 'boneless skinless chicken breast cutlets': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'cold salted butter, cubed': '6', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '3/4', 'fresh lemon juice': '3', 'peaches, sliced': '2-3', 'honey': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'fresh basil, torn': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler. Place the egg and flour in separate shallow bowls. Toss the rosemary with the flour.', '2. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Dredge both sides of the chicken through the egg, and then through the flour, tossing to coat. Place the chicken on a plate.', '3. In an oven  safe skillet, melt together 3 tablespoons butter and 2 tablespoons olive oil. Add the chicken and cook until the bottom side is golden brown, about 3-4 minutes. Flip the chicken and add 3 tablespoons butter, swirling the butter around the chicken. Cook, basting the chicken in butter until the chicken is cooked and golden brown, about 4 to 5 minutes.', '3. Reduce the heat to medium low and pour in the wine and lemon juice. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from the heat, arrange the peaches around the chicken. Drizzle the peaches with honey, salt and chili flakes (if desired). Broil 1 minute, until the peaches are softened.', '4. Break the burrata over the peaches and chicken. Spoon the pesto over the entire skillet. Let sit 5 minutes to warm the cheese. Serve topped with lots of fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Lighter Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta
ingredients: ['short-cut pasta', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chicken tenders, cut into bite size pieces', 'cajun seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'medium yellow onion, chopped', 'bell peppers, chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'milk', 'cream cheese, at room temperature', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'chopped fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'short-cut pasta': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'chicken tenders, cut into bite size pieces': '1', 'cajun seasoning': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'medium yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'bell peppers, chopped': '2', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '3', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'low sodium chicken broth': '1', 'milk': '1', 'cream cheese, at room temperature': '2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/2', 'chopped fresh basil': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the pasta al dente, according to package directions. Drain.', '2. In the same pot set over medium-high heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil, the onion, chicken, and 1 tablespoon cajun seasoning. Cook until browned all over, about 5 minutes. Spoon the chicken onto a plate.', '3. To the pot, add 2 tablespoons olive oil, the bell peppers, and garlic. Cook another 5 minutes until the peppers are soft. Stir in 1-2 teaspoons cajun seasoning. Add a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook another minute, until the spices are fragrant, then pour in the broth and milk. Add the cream cheese. Whisk until smooth. Bring the sauce to a gentle simmer and cook 5 minutes, until thickened slightly.', '4. Stir in the parmesan. Then toss in the pasta and chicken and cook 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the basil. Serve immediately topped with additional basil. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Jalapeño Pineapple Shrimp Tacos with Cilantro Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['large shrimp, peeled and deveined', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'all-spice', 'ground ginger', 'dried thyme', 'cinnamon', 'cayenne pepper', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'warm tortillas and smashed avocado, for serving', 'garlic, smashed', 'plain Greek Yogurt or sour cream', 'fresh lime juice', 'chopped green onions', 'fresh cilantro', 'shredded green cabbage', 'jalapeños', 'diced pineapple', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'juice from half an orange', 'juice of 1 lime']
ingredients with measurement: {'large shrimp, peeled and deveined': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'all-spice': '1', 'ground ginger': '1/2', 'dried thyme': '1/2', 'cinnamon': '1/4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'warm tortillas and smashed avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'plain Greek Yogurt or sour cream': '1/2', 'fresh lime juice': '2-3', 'chopped green onions': '1/4', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'shredded green cabbage': '2-3', 'jalapeños': '1-2', 'diced pineapple': '1', 'cilantro, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'juice from half an orange': 'seasoning', 'juice of 1 lime': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the shrimp with olive oil, chili powder, all-spice, ginger, thyme, cinnamon, cayenne, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Arrange in a single layer. Add the garlic (for the garlic sauce) and the\xa0jalapeños (for the salsa). Roast 6-8 minutes or until the shrimp is cooked. During the last minute, switch the oven to broil and broil until lightly charred.\xa0Set the shrimp aside.', '3. To make the sauce. Squeeze the garlic cloves out of their skin and add to a blender with the yogurt and lime juice. Blend until smooth. Add the cilantro, green onions, and a pinch of salt. Pulse to combine.', '4. Add the cabbage to a large bowl and toss with 1/3 cup of the garlic sauce.', '5. To make the salsa. De-seed the jalapeño (if desired), then chop and add to a bowl with the pineapple, cilantro, orange juice, lime juice, and a pinch of salt.', '6. Stuff the avocado, slaw, salsa, and shrimp into the warmed tortillas. Top with garlic sauce and additional salsa.']

title: Lemon Garlic Butter Shrimp Special
ingredients: ['large shrimp, shell on or off, and deveined', 'all purpose flour', 'sweet or smoked paprika', 'cayenne pepper, to your taste', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'cold salted butter, cubed', 'large cloves garlic, finely chopped', 'juice from 1-2 lemons', 'chili sauce, for serving', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado oil mayo', 'honey', 'dijon mustard', 'cayenne and or cajun seasoning', 'lemon juice']
ingredients with measurement: {'large shrimp, shell on or off, and deveined': '1 1/2', 'all purpose flour': '1', 'sweet or smoked paprika': '1', 'cayenne pepper, to your taste': '1/2-1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'cold salted butter, cubed': '6', 'large cloves garlic, finely chopped': '8-12', 'juice from 1-2 lemons': 'seasoning', 'chili sauce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado oil mayo': '1/4', 'honey': '2', 'dijon mustard': '1', 'cayenne and or cajun seasoning': '1/2', 'lemon juice': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Pat the shrimp dry. In a bowl, toss the shrimp with the flour, paprika, cayenne, 1 teaspoon pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shrimp and cook until pink, about 2 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet to a plate. Set aside.', '3. If needed, let the skillet cool slightly. Melt 2 tablespoons butter and the garlic together over medium heat. Cook until the garlic begins to turn golden, 2-3 minutes. Melt in 4 more tablespoons butter. Add the shrimp and toss. Cook 2-3 minutes, until the shrimp is warmed and the garlic is dark golden and crisp. Squeeze over the lemon juice, remove from the heat.', '4. To make the lemon pepper sauce, whisk together all ingredients in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.', '5. Serve the shrimp with the garlic butter spooned over top. Add rice, lemon wedges, lemon pepper sauce, and chili sauce on the side.']

title: Party Size Spanakopita Melt
ingredients: ['fresh baby spinach', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'fresh dill, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'provolone cheese', 'shredded mozzarella', 'salted butter', 'raw sesame seeds']
ingredients with measurement: {'fresh baby spinach': '12-16', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'small shallot, chopped': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped or grated': '2', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/3', 'fresh dill, chopped': '1/3', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crumbled feta cheese': '3/4', 'loaf ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'provolone cheese': '6', 'shredded mozzarella': '1/2', 'salted butter': '2', 'raw sesame seeds': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400° F.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot and garlic and cook for 3-4 minutes, until the shallot is softened and fragrant. Stir in the spinach, basil, dill, oregano, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook another 5-8 minutes, until the spinach is wilted. Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon zest and feta cheese.', '3. Lay the bottom piece of ciabatta bread cut side facing up on a baking sheet. Layer the spinach on top. Add the provolone and mozzarella. Grab the top piece of bread and pull out some of the insides to create a little more space. Place the bread over all the cheese. Rub the top of the bread with butter, then sprinkle on the sesame seeds.', '4. Wrap the sandwich in foil. Bake 20 minutes, until the cheese melts. Remove the foil and return to the oven and bake another 10-15 minutes more, until the bread is toasted.', '5. Remove from the oven and let sit for 3-4 minutes. Slice into 4-6 larger or 8 smaller sandwiches. Serve with a drizzle of honey and chili flakes. Enjoy!']

title: Roasted Broccoli Pasta Carbonara with Crispy Prosciutto and Whipped Ricotta
ingredients: ['broccoli florets roughly chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'red pepper flakes', 'prosciutto torn', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'large eggs, at room temperature and beaten', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'pasta', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired']
ingredients with measurement: {'broccoli florets roughly chopped': '2-3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'red pepper flakes': '1', 'prosciutto torn': '3', 'zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'large eggs, at room temperature and beaten': '3', 'freshly grated parmesan cheese': '1', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'pasta': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '2', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F. On a baking sheet, toss together the broccoli, olive oil, garlic, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Bake 10 minutes, remove from the oven. Arrange the prosciutto around the broccoli. Bake another 8-10 minutes, until the prosciutto is crispy. One the baking sheet, toss the hot broccoli with the lemon zest.', '2. Meanwhile, whisk together the eggs and parmesan.', '3. Boil the pasta until al dente. Before draining, scoop out 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta and add the pasta back to the hot pot. Immediately\xa0add the egg/cheese mixture, tossing quickly (to ensure the eggs do not scramble). Toss until the eggs thicken and create a sauce. Add basil, thyme, and butter, tossing more to combine. Thin the sauce with the reserved pasta water until it reaches your desired consistency.', '4. Spread the ricotta into the bottom of each individual serving bowl. Spoon the pasta over the cheese.\xa0Top with broccoli and prosciutto. Twirl the pasta up with the ricotta...EAT and ENJOY.']

title: Pesto Pasta Alla Vodka
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'shallot, finely chopped', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'dried oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'vodka', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk', 'short cut pasta', 'salted butter', 'grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving', 'fresh basil roughly chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'garlic, finely chopped': '4', 'dried oregano': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1-2', 'tomato paste': '1/2', 'vodka': '1/4', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '3/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'heavy cream or canned coconut milk': '1', 'short cut pasta': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'grated Parmesan cheese, plus more for serving': '1/3', 'fresh basil roughly chopped': '1/4'}
instructions: ['1. Heat a large skillet over medium-low heat. When the oil shimmers, add the shallot, garlic, and oregano. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the tomato paste and red pepper flakes, cook 4-5 minutes, until thickened. Stir in the vodka, cook another 2 minutes. Stir in the pesto and cream. Season with salt and pepper. Keep warm over low heat.', '2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 1/2 cups of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '3. To the vodka sauce, add the pasta, 1/2 cup pasta cooking water, and the butter, tossing until the butter has melted. Add the parmesan and basil. If needed, thin the sauce with additional pasta cooking water.', '4. Divide the pasta among plates and top with basil and cheese. Enjoy!']

title: Creamy French Onion and Mushroom Soup.
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'garlic minced or grated', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'honey', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'heavy cream', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'medium yellow onions, thinly sliced': '4', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1 1/4', 'garlic minced or grated': '3', 'cremini or wild mushrooms, sliced': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '2', 'honey': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '6-8', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'bay leaves': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'heavy cream': '1/2', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '2'}
instructions: ["1. Melt together the butter, onions, and honey in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring occasionally until softened, about 10 minutes. At this point, you want to slowly add 3/4 cup of the wine, 1/4 cup at a time, until the wine cooks into the onions. Continue to cook another 10-15 minutes until you've used the 3/4 cup of wine and the onions are deeply caramelized.", '2. Add the garlic, mushrooms, thyme, and sage. Season with salt and pepper, cook another 3-4 minutes. Add the remaining 1/2 cup wine, the broth, Worcestershire sauce, bay leaves, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer 10 minutes, then stir in the cream and cook another 5-10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves and discard. Season to taste with salt and pepper.', '3. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Arrange the bread on a baking sheet and toast for 10-15 minutes, until very dry. Switch the oven to broil.', '4. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each, and top evenly with cheese. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Top with fresh thyme. Eat!']

title: Baked Buffalo Chicken Egg Rolls with Cilantro Lime Ranch
ingredients: ['cooked shredded chicken', 'plain greek yogurt', 'buffalo sauce', 'chopped fresh chives', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'onion powder', 'garlic powder', 'kosher salt', 'shredded cheddar cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese', 'square egg roll wrappers', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'juice from 2 limes']
ingredients with measurement: {'cooked shredded chicken': '1 1/2', 'plain greek yogurt': '1/3', 'buffalo sauce': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '1', 'dried parsley': '2', 'dried dill': '2', 'onion powder': '1', 'garlic powder': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'shredded cheddar cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/4', 'square egg roll wrappers': '20-22', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1', 'fresh cilantro, finely chopped': '3/4', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets.', '2. In a bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt, buffalo sauce, chives, parsley, dill, onion powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of salt. Stir in the cheeses.', '3. \xa0To assemble, spoon 2 tablespoons of filling onto each wrapper. Brush water around the edges of the wrapper, then roll up and place on the baking sheet. Brush each roll lightly with olive oil. Transfer to the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, then flip and cook another 8-10 minutes more, or until the rolls are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the ranch. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or stir until creamy.', '5. Serve the egg rolls with fresh herbs and plenty of ranch for dipping.']

title: Cherry Tomato Pesto Polenta with Fried Halloumi
ingredients: ['dry quick-cooking polenta', 'salted butter', 'fresh grated parmesan cheese', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, smashed', 'shallot, thinly sliced', 'mixed fresh herbs, such as oregano, thyme, and dill', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'fresh chopped chives, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'dry quick-cooking polenta': '1 1/2', 'salted butter': '3', 'fresh grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '4', 'halloumi cheese, sliced into 1/4 inch pieces': '8', 'cherry tomatoes': '4', 'garlic, smashed': '4', 'shallot, thinly sliced': '1', 'mixed fresh herbs, such as oregano, thyme, and dill': '1/2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '3', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1/4', 'fresh chopped chives, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the polenta. In a medium saucepan, bring 4 cups water to a boil. Slowly whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta is soft and thick, about 3-5 minutes. Stir in the butter, parmesan, the pesto, and season with salt and pepper. Turn the heat off, cover the pot, and let the polenta sit 5 minutes.', '4. Meanwhile, cook the halloumi. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the halloumi and cook until golden, about 3 minutes per side. Remove from skillet.', '3. To the same skillet, add the remaining 3 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers, add the tomatoes, garlic, shallot, herbs, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Cook until the tomatoes begin to pop, about 4-5 minutes. Remove from the heat and add the balsamic vinegar and basil.', '4. Divide the polenta between bowls. Spoon the tomatoes over top, then add the Halloumi. Drizzle with additional pesto and top with fresh basil and chives. Enjoy!']

title: Easy sheet pan Tomato Herb Pizza
ingredients: ['pizza dough, homemade or store-bought', 'cherry tomatoes', 'garlic, 2 whole smashed, 2 grated', 'fig preserves', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'fresh basil, chopped, plus more for serving', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'fennel seeds', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella', 'shredded fontina cheese', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese', 'pepperoni, sliced']
ingredients with measurement: {'pizza dough, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'cherry tomatoes': '3', 'garlic, 2 whole smashed, 2 grated': '4', 'fig preserves': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': '1', 'fresh basil, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'fennel seeds': '1-2', 'shredded whole milk mozzarella': '1', 'shredded fontina cheese': '1', 'grated parmesan or asiago cheese': '1/2', 'pepperoni, sliced': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Position the oven rack in the upper 1/3 position. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F. at least 30 minutes before baking, preferably 1-2 hours ahead. If you have a baking stone, start preheating it.', '2. Place the ball of pizza dough on a lightly oiled quarter sheet pan. Lightly drizzle olive oil on top of the dough ball. Cover with plastic wrap and let rest for at least 30 minutes, preferably 2-5 hours, if time allows.', '3. To make the sauce. In a roasting pan, combine the tomatoes, olive oil, 2 cloves smashed garlic, fig preserves, thyme, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Roast in the middle of the oven at 500 degrees F. for 10-15 minutes, until the tomatoes burst. Using a fork, smash the tomatoes down until a chunky sauce forms. Is using canned tomatoes, just simmer on the stove until thickened. Alternately, you can use your favorite marinara sauce too.', '4. To make the herb seasoning. In a bowl, combine the basil, oregano, 1-2 cloves grated garlic, fennel, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.', '5. To assemble. Remove the plastic wrap. Gently press the dough until it covers the entire sheet pan. Drizzle the dough lightly with olive oil. Spread on the sauce, you may not need it all. Top with cheese, then pepperoni. Sprinkle the herb seasoning over top.', '6. Slide into the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes, rotate the pizza, and bake another 3-5 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese has melted. Top the pizza with fresh basil and addition crushed red pepper flakes. ENJOY!']

title: Grilled Chicken Shawarma with Golden Butter Fries and Garlic Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite size chunks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'smoked paprika', 'ground cumin', 'ground turmeric', 'garlic, grated', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'shallots, halved', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado mayo', 'mixed herbs, such as mint and dill, chopped', 'russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ground turmeric', 'cayenne pepper', 'garlic, skin on and smashed', 'kosher salt', 'salted butter']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite size chunks': '2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'ground cumin': '2', 'ground turmeric': '1', 'garlic, grated': '6', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shallots, halved': '4', 'plain Greek yogurt or avocado mayo': '1', 'mixed herbs, such as mint and dill, chopped': '1/2', 'russet potatoes, cut into ¼-inch-thick matchsticks': '4', 'cayenne pepper': '1/4-1/2', 'garlic, skin on and smashed': '4', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '2'}
instructions: ['1. In a bowl, combine the chicken, 1/4 cup olive oil, the paprika, cumin, turmeric, 4 cloves garlic, lemon juice, lemon zest, crushed red pepper, and a large pinch of salt. Toss to coat. Marinate for 15 minutes or up to overnight in the fridge.', '2. Meanwhile, make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with olive oil, turmeric, cayenne, smashed garlic cloves and a large pinch of salt. Spread the fries in an even layer. Do not overcrowd the pan, if needed, divide the fries between 2 baking sheets. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15 minutes more. Add the butter, toss, and return to the oven for another 5 minutes. You want the potatoes to be tender, yet crispy.', '3. To make the garlic sauce, combine the yogurt, 2 cloves grated garlic (see note), and 2-3 tablespoons lemon juice. Season with salt. Taste, adding more of the lemon as desired.', '4. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.\xa0During the same time, grill the shallots for 2-3 minutes per side. Alternately, you can roast the chicken at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes.', '5. In a bowl, combine the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil, the mixed herbs, and a pinch of salt. Add the shallots, tossing to coat.', '6. Serve the chicken topped with garlic sauce and herb oil. Add the fries on the side with naan. Enjoy!']

title: Sweet Potato Fry Steak Salad with Blue Cheese Butter
ingredients: ['sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chipotle chili powder', 'kosher salt and fresh black pepper', 'ribeye steak or 1 1/2 pound flank steak', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'avocado, sliced', 'salted butter, at room temperature', 'gorgonzola or blue cheese, crumbled', 'chopped fresh basil', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'honey', 'Dijon mustard', 'small shallot, finely diced', 'fresh chopped thyme', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'sweet potatoes, cut into matchsticks': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'kosher salt and fresh black pepper': 'seasoning', 'ribeye steak or 1 1/2 pound flank steak': '1', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '6', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'salted butter, at room temperature': '4', 'gorgonzola or blue cheese, crumbled': '3-4', 'chopped fresh basil': '2', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'honey': '2', 'Dijon mustard': '1', 'small shallot, finely diced': '1', 'fresh chopped thyme': '2', 'kosher salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the fries. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Place the sweet potatoes on a large baking sheet and toss with 3 tablespoons olive oil, the chipotle chili powder, and a large pinch each of salt and pepper. Spread the fries in an even layer. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, then flip and bake for 15-20 minutes more. You want the sweet potatoes to be tender, yet crisp.', '2. To make the vinaigrette. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and shake or whisk until combined. Taste and adjust the salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.', '3. To make the steak.\xa0Remove the steaks from the fridge 30 minutes prior to grilling. Preheat the grill or a grill pan to high heat. Rub with 1 tablespoon olive oil and season generously with salt and pepper. Sear until your desired doneness is reached, about 5-8 minutes for medium-rare, per side. Remove the steaks and allow to rest for 5-10 minutes.', '4. Combine the butter, blue cheese, and basil in a bowl. Spread the butter over the steak, then slice against the grain.', '5. Assemble the salad. Add the romaine, tomatoes, avocado, and dressing. Toss to combine. Once the salad has been tossed, top with fries and steak. Serve immediately.']

title: Pesto Chicken Caesar Salad with Tomatoes and Burrata
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling', 'torn ciabatta bread', 'garlic, smashed', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper', 'shredded romaine lettuce', 'cherry tomatoes, halved', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh herbs, for serving, such as chives, thyme, and basil', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of 2 lemons', 'tahini', 'dijon mustard', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'garlic, grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'grated parmesan']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for drizzling': '2', 'torn ciabatta bread': '2', 'garlic, smashed': '2', 'boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite size chunks': '1', 'basil pesto, homemade or store-bought': '1/2', 'red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shredded romaine lettuce': '6', 'cherry tomatoes, halved': '2', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh herbs, for serving, such as chives, thyme, and basil': 'seasoning', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'juice of 2 lemons': 'seasoning', 'tahini': '1/4', 'dijon mustard': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '2', 'garlic, grated': '1-2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'grated parmesan': '1/3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the croutons. Heat the olive oil in a small skillet over medium heat. When the oil shimmers, add the bread and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally until golden and toasted all over, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and season with salt. Slide bread crumbs onto a plate, discard the garlic.', '2.To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.', '3. To make the chicken. In a bowl, combine the chicken, pesto, crushed red pepper flakes, and a large pinch of salt. Set your grill, grill pan or skillet to medium-high heat. Take skewers and thread the chicken pieces on.\xa0Alternately, you can cook the chicken in a skillet until browned all over.', '4. Grill the skewers until lightly charred and cooked through, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 10 to 12 minutes total.', '6. Assemble the salad. Add the romaine, tomatoes, croutons, chicken, croutons, and dressing. Toss to combine. Once the salad has been tossed, top with burrata, drizzle with oil, season with salt, pepper, and fresh herbs. Serve immediately.']

title: Crispy Chicken Tinga Taquitos with Lime Avocado Crema
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey', 'yellow onion, chopped', 'chipotle peppers in adobo', 'dried oregano', 'kosher salt', 'red enchilada sauce', 'corn tortillas', 'shredded Mexican cheese', 'pineapple salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onion, for serving', 'avocado, halved', 'fresh cilantro', 'garlic powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'juice from 2 limes', 'kosher or flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'ground chicken, beef, or turkey': '1', 'yellow onion, chopped': '1', 'chipotle peppers in adobo': '2-3', 'dried oregano': '1/2', 'kosher salt': '1', 'red enchilada sauce': '1/2', 'corn tortillas': '16-20', 'shredded Mexican cheese': '2', 'pineapple salsa, shredded lettuce, and pickled onion, for serving': 'seasoning', 'avocado, halved': '1', 'fresh cilantro': '1/2', 'garlic powder': '1/2', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4', 'juice from 2 limes': 'seasoning', 'kosher or flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the ground chicken and onion. Cook, breaking up the meat as it cooks, until the chicken is browned, about 5 minutes. Add the chipotle peppers, oregano, and salt. Add the enchilada sauce and 1/4 cup water. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer until the sauce has thickened slightly around the chicken, about 10 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '3. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds to 1 minute in the microwave, until pliable. On a baking sheet, rub the tortillas with olive oil. Spoon 2 tablespoons of the chicken down the middle of the tortilla. Add a sprinkle of cheese, then roll up and place seam-side down on the baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, then flip and cook another 5 minutes more, or until the cheese has melted and the tortillas are crisp.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Lime Avocado Crema. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Season with salt.', '5. Serve the taquitos topped with avocado, pineapple salsa, and any other desired toppings.']

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Rosemary Dijon Chicken with Feta Goddess Sauce
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil, plus more for serving', 'Dijon mustard', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'medium shallot, finely chopped', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'smoked paprika', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'russet potatoes, cut into 2 inch pieces', 'raw sesame seeds', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'small bunch asparagus, ends trimmed', 'feta cheese', 'plain Greek yogurt', 'garlic grated', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'chopped fresh tender herbs, such as dill, basil, or parsley', 'smoked paprika', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil, plus more for serving': '6', 'Dijon mustard': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4', 'medium shallot, finely chopped': '1', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'smoked paprika': '1/4', 'juice and zest of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '2', 'russet potatoes, cut into 2 inch pieces': '3-4', 'raw sesame seeds': '1', 'small bunch asparagus, ends trimmed': '1', 'feta cheese': '4-6', 'plain Greek yogurt': '1/4', 'garlic grated': '1', 'juice from 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'chopped fresh tender herbs, such as dill, basil, or parsley': '1/4', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. In a medium bowl, combine the remaining 4 tablespoons olive oil, the mustard, garlic, shallot, rosemary, paprika, lemon zest, lemon juice, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add the chicken and toss well to combine. Let sit 15-20 minutes.', '2.\xa0On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with 2 tablespoons olive oil and the sesame seeds. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for 20 minutes, or until tender.', '3. Remove the potatoes from the oven and push them to one side of the pan. Put the chicken on the other side.\xa0Arrange asparagus around the chicken. Drizzle over 1 tablespoon olive oil, season with salt and pepper. Return the pan to oven and roast for 20-25 minutes more, until the chicken is cooked through.', '4. Meanwhile, make the\xa0feta.\xa0Combine the feta, yogurt, garlic, and lemon juice in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. Stir in the herbs, paprika, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. If desired, thin with additional lemon juice.', '5. To serve, divide the chicken, potatoes, and asparagus between plates. Spoon the feta sauce over the chicken. Eat and enjoy!']

title: Unstuffed Spicy Tomato Basil Shells with Whipped Ricotta.
ingredients: ['jumbo pasta shells', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage', 'shallots, thinly sliced', 'garlic, finely chopped', 'dried oregano', 'dried thyme leaves', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'tomato paste', 'San Marzano tomatoes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'chopped greens, such as kale, spinach, or chard', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired']
ingredients with measurement: {'jumbo pasta shells': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'ground spicy Italian chicken sausage': '1/2', 'shallots, thinly sliced': '3', 'garlic, finely chopped': '3', 'dried oregano': '2', 'dried thyme leaves': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'tomato paste': '1', 'San Marzano tomatoes': '1', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'chopped greens, such as kale, spinach, or chard': '2', 'fresh basil, roughly chopped': '1', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'whole milk ricotta cheese, whipped in the food processor, if desired': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package directions until al dente. Just before draining, remove 1 1/2 cups of the pasta cooking water. Drain.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken sausage and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the shallots, garlic, oregano, thyme and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook until the shallots begin to caramelize, about 5 minutes. Stir in the tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Stir in the crushed tomatoes, 1 cup pasta cooking water, and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Add the greens, stirring until wilted. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '3. Add the pasta shells and 1/2 cup basil, tossing to combine. If needed, thin the sauce with additional pasta cooking water.', '4. In a small bowl, mix the remaining 1/4 cup olive oil with the remaining 1/2 cup basil, lemon zest, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt.', '5. Spread the ricotta cheese into the bottom of each pasta bowl.\xa0Spoon the shells and sauce over the ricotta. Drizzle the basil lemon sauce overtop. Serve and enjoy!']

title: Potato and Wild Mushroom Burrata Pizza.
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn', 'fresh thyme', 'garlic, smashed', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'pizza dough, at room temperature', 'basil pesto', 'medium potato, very thinly sliced', 'fresh chopped rosemary', 'fresh lemon zest', 'shredded fontina or Havarti cheese', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature', 'fresh lemon micro basil or basil leaves']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'wild mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'fresh thyme': '3', 'garlic, smashed': '3', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning', 'pizza dough, at room temperature': '1/2', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'medium potato, very thinly sliced': '1', 'fresh chopped rosemary': '2', 'fresh lemon zest': '2', 'shredded fontina or Havarti cheese': '1', 'burrata cheese, at room temperature': '8', 'fresh lemon micro basil or basil leaves': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the olive oil, mushrooms, thyme, garlic, and a pinch each of salt and crushed red pepper flakes. Transfer to the oven and bake for 15 minutes, until the edges begin to crisp. Watch closely.', '2. Meanwhile, grease a large baking sheet with olive oil. On a lightly floured surface, push/roll the pizza dough out until it is pretty thin (about a\xa010-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to the prepared baking sheet. Spread the dough\xa0with pesto and top evenly with sliced potatoes, rosemary, and lemon zest. Drizzle lightly with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.', '3. Transfer the pizza to the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and top with the fontina cheese and the roasted mushrooms. Return the pizza to the oven and bake another 5-8 minutes, until the cheese is melted.', '4. Remove the pizza from the oven and top with burrata. title: Sheet Pan Chipotle Salmon with Cilantro Lime Special Sauce
ingredients: ['small sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch rounds', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'red or orange bell pepper, sliced', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salmon fillets (5-6 ounces)', 'chipotle chili powder', 'smoked paprika', 'garlic, minced or grated, to your taste', 'the zest + juice from 1 lime', 'kale, spinach or arugula, roughly torn', 'cooked quinoa or brown rice', 'avocado, tortilla chips, feta cheese, for serving', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired', 'plain greek yogurt, olive oil mayo, or sour cream', 'juice of 1-2 limes, to your taste', 'honey', 'cilantro, roughly chopped', 'kosher salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'small sweet potatoes, cut into 1/4 inch rounds': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'red or orange bell pepper, sliced': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '6', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salmon fillets (5-6 ounces)': '4', 'chipotle chili powder': '2', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'garlic, minced or grated, to your taste': '2-4', 'the zest + juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'kale, spinach or arugula, roughly torn': '2-3', 'cooked quinoa or brown rice': '2-3', 'avocado, tortilla chips, feta cheese, for serving': 'seasoning', 'jalapeño, seeded if desired': '1', 'plain greek yogurt, olive oil mayo, or sour cream': '1/2', 'juice of 1-2 limes, to your taste': 'seasoning', 'honey': '2', 'cilantro, roughly chopped': '1', 'kosher salt': '1'}

title: No-Knead Rosemary Garlic Parmesan Bread.
ingredients: ['all-purpose flour', 'instant yeast', 'chopped fresh rosemary', 'garlic, grated, using to your taste', 'kosher salt', 'beer', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'fresh grated parmesan', 'salted butter, melted', 'fresh basil, finely chopped', 'chopped fresh chives', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'all-purpose flour': '3', 'instant yeast': '2', 'chopped fresh rosemary': '2', 'garlic, grated, using to your taste': '1-2', 'kosher salt': '2', 'beer': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'fresh grated parmesan': '1/3', 'salted butter, melted': '4', 'fresh basil, finely chopped': '1/2', 'chopped fresh chives': '2', 'chopped fresh oregano': '2', 'crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, yeast, rosemary, garlic, and salt. Add the beer, 1 tablespoon olive oil, and mix with a wooden spoon until combined. Cover the bowl and let sit at room temperature until it doubles in size, 1 to 2 hours.', '2. When ready to bake, place a pizza stone or heavy sheet pan in the oven. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F. Once it reaches temperature, let the stone/pan warm for 30 minutes.', '3. Turn the dough out onto a floured work surface and divide it into two equal pieces. Place each dough ball on a large piece of lightly floured parchment paper. Push each ball of dough into (roughly) a 10 inch circle. Lightly drizzle with olive oil. Carefully remove the stone/pan from the oven and place the dough with the parchment paper in the center of it. Bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the bread is golden. Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle with half of the parmesan. Repeat with the remaining round of dough.', '4. Meanwhile make the herb butter. Melt together the remaining olive oil and butter until warmed. Remove from the heat. Stir in the basil, chives, oregano, and crushed red pepper flakes. Brush the herb butter over the warm bread. Eat and ENJOY. The bread keeps well for up to 3-4 days. Add the herb butter before serving.']

title: Herbed Garlic Butter Scallops with Lemony Feta Dressing.
ingredients: ['large scallops (about 16 scallops)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'fresh parsley, chopped', 'fresh oregano, chopped', 'fresh basil, chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'green olives, roughly chopped', 'red wine vinegar', 'feta cheese, broken into chunks', 'toasted bread, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'large scallops (about 16 scallops)': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'salted butter': '4', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'garlic, minced or grated': '4-6', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1', 'fresh parsley, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh oregano, chopped': '1/4', 'fresh basil, chopped': '1/4', 'green onions, chopped': '2', 'green olives, roughly chopped': '1/2', 'red wine vinegar': '2', 'feta cheese, broken into chunks': '4', 'toasted bread, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Pat the scallops dry. Season with salt and pepper.', '2. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. title: Better Than Takeout Sesame Ginger Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: ['low sodium soy sauce', 'toasted sesame oil', 'hoisin sauce', 'chili flakes', 'eggs, beaten', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, roughly torn', 'bok choy or 2 cups spinach, roughly chopped', 'green onions, chopped', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated', 'chicken breasts, cubed', 'cooked, day-old rice', 'fresh basil or cilantro, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'low sodium soy sauce': '1/4', 'toasted sesame oil': '2', 'hoisin sauce': '2', 'chili flakes': '1-2', 'eggs, beaten': '3', 'extra virgin olive oil or sesame oil': '5', 'Kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'shiitake or cremini mushrooms, roughly torn': '2', 'bok choy or 2 cups spinach, roughly chopped': '4', 'green onions, chopped': '4', 'fresh ginger, grated': '2', 'garlic cloves, minced or grated': '4', 'chicken breasts, cubed': '1/2', 'cooked, day-old rice': '4', 'fresh basil or cilantro, chopped': '½'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, hoisin sauce, and chili flakes.', '2. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the eggs (if using), season with salt and pepper, and let cook until the edges start to set, 1-2 minutes. Roughly scramble the eggs. Remove from the heat and transfer to a plate.', '3. Return the skillet to medium-high heat. Add 2 tablespoons oil. When the oil shimmers add the mushrooms and cook, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms are crisping on the edges, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and large pinch of pepper. Stir in the green onions, ginger, garlic, and bok choy. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until the mushrooms are caramelized. Remove from the heat and transfer the mushrooms and greens to the plate with the eggs.', '4. Return the skillet to medium-high heat and add the remaining 2 tablespoons oil. Add the chicken and cook until browned, 5 minutes. Stir in 2 tablespoons of the sauce, cook another 1-2 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring occasionally, until toasted, 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in the remaining sauce, toss, cook another 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the mushroom, bok choy, and eggs. Remove from the heat. Add the basil or cilantro.', '5. title: Skillet Baked Creamy Pesto Spinach and Artichoke Gnocchi.

ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'sweet onion, chopped': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'dried oregano': '1', 'fennel seed': '1', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1/4-1/2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'uncooked potato gnocchi': '1', 'fresh baby spinach or roughly torn kale': '3', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1/3', 'canned full fat coconut milk, heavy cream, or whole milk': '3/4', 'basil pesto': '1/3', 'marinated, quartered artichokes, drained': '1', 'shredded provolone or fontina cheese': '1/2', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'fresh basil, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. Heat olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet set over medium-high heat. title: Buffalo Ranch Chicken Pull Apart Bread.

title: Weeknight Thai Chicken Meatball Khao Soi.
ingredients: ['ground chicken', 'green onions, finely, chopped, plus more for serving', 'fresh ginger, grated', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'black pepper', 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped', 'Thai red curry paste', 'full-fat coconut milk', 'low-sodium chicken broth', 'fish sauce', 'honey', 'fresh cilantro and Thai or regular basil, chopped, plus more for serving', 'egg or rice noodles', 'sliced limes and thinly sliced shallots, for serving', 'chili oil, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'ground chicken': '1', 'green onions, finely, chopped, plus more for serving': '2', 'fresh ginger, grated': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '1', 'black pepper': 'seasoning', 'extra-virgin olive oil': '2', 'baby bok choy or 1 bunch kale, chopped': '4', 'Thai red curry paste': '1/4', 'full-fat coconut milk': '2', 'low-sodium chicken broth': '3', 'fish sauce': '3', 'honey': '1', 'fresh cilantro and Thai or regular basil, chopped, plus more for serving': '1/4', 'egg or rice noodles': '8', 'sliced limes and thinly sliced shallots, for serving': 'seasoning', 'chili oil, for serving': 'seasoning'}

title: Pesto Polenta with Thyme-Roasted Mushrooms and Chickpeas

On a rimmed baking sheet, combine the olive oil, mushrooms, chickpeas, thyme,garlic, and a pinch each of salt, pepper, and crushed red pepper flakes.Transfer to the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes. Increase the heat to 475degrees F. Toss the mushrooms and chickpeas, then return to the oven andcontinue baking another 5-10 minutes until crisp on the edges. Watch closely.', '3. Meanwhile, make the polenta. In a medium saucepan, bring 4 cups water to a boilover medium heat. Slowly whisk in the polenta, stirring until the polenta issoft and thick, about 5 minutes. Stir in the butter with olive oil, kale, and 2tablespoons pesto, stirring until the kale has wilted, about 3 minutes. If the polenta thickens too much, thin with additional water.', '4. Divide the polenta between bowls and break the burrata over the polenta. Spoon the mushrooms and chickpeas over tip. Drizzle with addition pesto. Enjoy!']

title: Better Than Takeout Thai Drunken Noodles

title: Greek Lemon Chicken Bowls with Sizzled Mint Goddess Sauce
ingredients: ['boneless skinless chicken breasts cut into bite size chunks', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'smoked paprika', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'small shallot, chopped', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'cooked orzo or couscous, for serving', 'roasted red pepper, sliced', 'feta cheese, cubed or crumbled', 'sliced avocado, Persian cucumbers, olives, and basil, for serving', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'chopped fresh mint', 'plain Greek Yogurt', 'fresh basil or parsley, chopped', 'juice from 1 lemon', 'jalapeño, halved and seeded', 'cumin', 'kosher salt']

title: Sheet Pan Chicken Shawarma with Sesame Sweet Potatoes and Hummus

title: One Skillet, Geek Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken and Farro
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts, or small thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'balsamic vinegar', 'chopped fresh dill', 'chopped fresh oregano', 'paprika', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'uncooked farro or quinoa', 'low sodium chicken broth', 'baby spinach', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'kalamata olives, pitted', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'feta cheese, cubed', 'chopped fresh dill', 'toasted pine nuts (optional)']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'boneless, skinless chicken breasts, or small thighs': '1', 'balsamic vinegar': '2', 'chopped fresh dill': '1', 'chopped fresh oregano': '1', 'paprika': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'kosher salt and black pepper': 'seasoning', 'uncooked farro or quinoa': '1', 'low sodium chicken broth': '2 1/2', 'baby spinach': '2', 'oil packed sun-dried tomatoes': '1/2', 'kalamata olives, pitted': '1/3', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'feta cheese, cubed': '8', 'toasted pine nuts (optional)': '3'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.', '2. In a medium bowl, combine 2 tablespoons olive oil, the chicken, balsamic vinegar, dill, oregano, paprika, garlic, and a large pinch of both salt and pepper. Toss well to evenly coat the chicken.', '3. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in a large dutch oven or cast iron skillet, set over medium high heat. title: Baked Brie Mac and Cheese
ingredients: ['unsalted butter', 'all-purpose flour', 'whole milk', 'elbow macaroni', 'garlic clove, minced or grated', 'sourdough bread, roughly torn', 'sharp white cheddar, shredded', 'Havarti cheese, shredded', 'Brie cheese, rind removed and cubed', 'cayenne', 'kosher salt and freshly ground pepper', 'fresh thyme, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'unsalted butter': '7', 'all-purpose flour': '1/4', 'whole milk': '3', 'elbow macaroni': '1', 'garlic clove, minced or grated': '1', 'sourdough bread, roughly torn': '2', 'sharp white cheddar, shredded': '2', 'Havarti cheese, shredded': '1', 'Brie cheese, rind removed and cubed': '8', 'cayenne': '1/4', 'kosher salt and freshly ground pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh thyme, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350°F. Spray a 9 x 13-inch Pyrex baking dish with cooking spray.', '2. In a large saucepan, melt 4 tablespoons of butter over medium heat. Whisk in the flour. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 1 minute, stirring once to avoid burning—it will bubble. Gradually whisk in the milk and 2 cups of water, then stir in the macaroni. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring the mixture to a boil. Stir frequently until the macaroni is just al dente, 8 to 10 minutes.', '3. Meanwhile, in a medium skillet, melt the remaining 3 tablespoons of butter over medium-low heat. Add the garlic and sourdough and toss to coat. Toast the crumbs until browned, stirring frequently to avoid burning, about 3 to 5 minutes. Remove the pan from the heat and let the bread cool slightly. Transfer to a food processor and pulse into crumbs.', '4. When the macaroni is al dente, remove the pan from the heat and stir in the cheddar, Havarti, Brie and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper. Stir until the cheeses have fully melted. Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish.', '5. Evenly sprinkle the toasted bread crumbs over the mac and cheese and place the baking dish on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the crumbs are golden brown and the sauce is bubbling. Remove from the oven and garnish with fresh thyme. Enjoy!']

title: Skillet Roasted French Onion Chicken and Potatoes
ingredients: ['skin on, bone in, chicken breasts', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'salted butter', 'large yellow onions, thinly sliced', 'chopped fresh sage', 'crushed red pepper flakes, more or less to taste', 'mixed baby potatoes, halved if large', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'worchestire sauce']

title: Shredded Brussels Sprout Bacon Salad and Warm Cider Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['shredded brussels sprouts', 'grated manchego or parmesan cheese', 'toasted hazelnuts or pecans, roughly chopped', 'pomegranate arils', 'thick cut slices bacon, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'medium shallot, thinly sliced', 'apple cider vinegar', 'apple butter or fig preserves', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'fresh orange zest', 'kosher salt and black pepper', 'pinch of crushed red pepper flakes']

title: Herby French Shallot Soup
ingredients: ['salted butter', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced', 'yellow onion, thinly sliced', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'chopped fresh sage', 'honey or brown sugar', 'all-purpose flour', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth', 'Worcestershire sauce', 'bay leaves', 'black pepper', 'french bread', 'shredded Gruyère cheese', 'crumbled blue cheese']
ingredients with measurement: {'salted butter': '6', 'medium shallots, thinly sliced': '6', 'yellow onion, thinly sliced': '1', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'chopped fresh sage': '1', 'honey or brown sugar': '1', 'all-purpose flour': '2', 'dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc': '1', 'low sodium chicken or vegetable broth': '2', 'Worcestershire sauce': '1', 'bay leaves': '2', 'black pepper': '1', 'french bread': '6', 'shredded Gruyère cheese': '1', 'crumbled blue cheese': '1/2'}
instructions: ['1. Melt the butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the shallots, onions, garlic and honey. Cook about 10-15 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened, deep golden in color and caramelized. Add the thyme and sage and continue cooking another 3-5 minutes.', '2. Reduce the heat to low and sprinkle the flour over the shallots, stirring for 1-2 minutes, until the raw flour taste is eliminated. Add the wine, broth, Worcestershire sauce, and bay leaves. Increase the heat to medium-high and return the soup to a simmer, simmer for 10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves and discard. Season, to taste with salt and pepper.', '4. Preheat the broiler to high.', '5. Ladle the soup into oven safe bowls. Add a slice of bread to each and top evenly with each cheese. Place each soup bowl on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven, broil until bubbly and golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Eat!']

instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease a 9×13 inch baking dish or dish of similar size.', '2. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over high heat. When the oil shimmers, add the chicken sausage and brown all over, about 5 to 8 minutes. Reduce the heat to low, add the bell pepper, pumpkin, vodka, milk, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Simmer for 15 minutes or until the sauce thickens slightly. Taste and adjust seasonings as needed.', '3. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat and boil the pasta until al dente according to package directions.', '4. In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta, fontina, and 1/2 cup pesto.', '5. To assemble, spoon 3/4 of the pumpkin sauce into the bottom of the prepared baking dish. Working with one pasta shell at a time, spoon about 1 tablespoon of the cheese mixture into each shell, placing the filled shell into the baking dish as you go. Spoon the remaining pumpkin sauce over top of the shells and then drizzle the remaining 1/4 cup pesto evenly over everything. Add the mozzarella.', '6. Transfer the baking dish to the oven and bake 20-25 minutes or until the cheese has melted and is lightly browned on top. Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with fresh basil. Enjoy!']

title: Butternut Squash Cheese Ravioli with Browned Butter Sage Pesto
ingredients: ['cubed butternut squash (about 1 medium squash)', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'whole milk ricotta cheese', 'crumbled gorgonzola cheese (may also use goat cheese)', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'honey', 'fresh pasta dough', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Tuscan kale, finely chopped', 'toasted pumpkin seeds, finely chopped', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'cubed butternut squash (about 1 medium squash)': '4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'whole milk ricotta cheese': '1', 'crumbled gorgonzola cheese (may also use goat cheese)': '1/2', 'grated parmesan cheese': '2', 'honey': '1', 'fresh pasta dough': '1', 'salted butter': '4', 'fresh sage leaves, chopped': '1/2', 'Tuscan kale, finely chopped': '1', 'toasted pumpkin seeds, finely chopped': '1/4', 'kosher salt and crushed red pepper flakes': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the ravioli. Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. On a baking sheet, toss together the butternut squash, olive oil, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Transfer to the oven and roast for 25-30 minutes or until the squash is tender.', '2. Transfer the squash to a food processor and add the ricotta, gorgonzola, parmesan, and honey. Puree until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Roll your pasta dough into lasagna sheets. Place 1 tablespoon of filling one inch apart over half the pasta sheet. Brush around the filling with water to moisten and then fold the sheet over the fillings, pressing down to seal. Cut into squares. Be sure to keep the ravioli covered as you work to prevent them from drying out. Repeat with remaining dough and filling. Alternately, you can make the ravioli in a ravioli press, or use this wonton wrapper method.', '4. To make the pesto.\xa0In a large skillet, brown the butter over medium heat, stirring often until the butter is golden and toasted. Add the sage and cook another minute. Remove from heat, add the olive oil, kale, pumpkin seeds, parmesan, and season to taste with salt and crushed red pepper flakes.', 'In a large skillet, brown the butter over medium heat, stirring often until the butter is golden and toasted. Add the sage and cook another minute. Remove from heat, add the olive oil, kale, pumpkin seeds, parmesan, and season to taste with salt and crushed red pepper flakes.', '5. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the ravioli in batches about 1-2 minutes or until they float. Drain.', '5. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Boil the ravioli in batches about 1-2 minutes or until they float. Drain.', '7. Divide the ravioli among bowls and spoon the pesto over top. EAT and ENJOY!']

title: Apple Butter and Sage Pork Chops
ingredients: ['bone-in pork chops, about 1 inch thick', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'Kosher salt and black pepper', 'salted butter', 'fresh sage leaves', 'garlic cloves, smashed', 'apple butter', 'honeycrisp apples, cut into wedges', 'balsamic vinegar', 'chopped fresh thyme']

Add the olive oil to the skillet, when the oil shimmers, add the pork and sear on both sides for 2-3 minutes. Reduce the heat to medium and continue cooking for about 5 minutes, or until the pork chops are cooked through.', '3. Remove the pork from the pan to a plate. Spread each pork chop with a layer of apple butter.', '4. To the skillet, add the butter, garlic, apples, and sage. Cook 1-2 minutes then remove from the heat. Slide the pork back into the the skillet. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the pork. Transfer the skillet to the oven and broil for 2-3 minutes or until the apples are lightly charred.', '4. title: Parchment Baked Lemon Salmon and Potatoes with Dill Yogurt
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'lemons', 'chopped fresh dill', 'smoked paprika', 'small potatoes, very thinly sliced using a mandolin', 'salmon fillets, skinned', 'kosher salt and pepper', 'fresh arugula and basil, for serving', 'plain greek yogurt', 'chopped fresh dill', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'crushed red pepper flakes']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'garlic, minced or grated': '2', 'lemons': '2', 'chopped fresh dill': '1', 'smoked paprika': '2', 'small potatoes, very thinly sliced using a mandolin': '2', 'salmon fillets, skinned': '4', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'fresh arugula and basil, for serving': 'seasoning', 'plain greek yogurt': '1', 'juice of 1 lemon': 'seasoning', 'crushed red pepper flakes': '1'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.\xa0 Fold 4 large pieces of parchment paper (about 15x16 inches) in half. Open, and lay on half flat.', '2. In a small bowl, stir together the olive oil, garlic, juice of 1 lemon, dill, smoked paprika and a pinch of salt and pepper.', '3. Working on one side of the creased parchment, layer the potatoes, and season with salt and pepper. Place the salmon over the potatoes and drizzle with the olive oil sauce, and top with 2 lemons slices. Repeat with the remaining ingredients to make 4 packets.', '4. To close, fold the parchment over salmon, pinching to seal the open sides and create a half-moon-shaped packet. Place on a rimmed baking sheet. Transfer to the oven and bake until the potatoes are tender, about 18-20 minutes.', '5. Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, stir together the yogurt, lemon juice, dill, and a pinch of crushed red pepper.', '6. Serve the salmon topped with dill yogurt, arugula, and basil. Enjoy!']

ingredients: ['portobello mushroom caps, halved', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'orange juice', 'garlic, minced or grated', 'chipotle pepper in adobo, chopped', 'smoked paprika', 'juice of 2 limes', 'fresh cilantro, roughly chopped', 'corn or flour tortillas, warmed', 'avocados, mashed', 'juice and zest of 1 lime', 'Maldon sea salt', 'of a small pineapple, cubed', 'jalapeño, seeded and chopped', 'juice of 1 lime', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'crumbled feta or cotija cheese, for serving']

Preheat your grill or grill pan to high.\xa0Remove the mushrooms from the marinade and sear for 5 minutes, flip and sear another 5 minutes or until lightly charred on both sides. Slice into strips.', 'Remove the mushrooms from the marinade and sear for 5 minutes, flip and sear another 5 minutes or until lightly charred on both sides. Slice into strips.', '5. Spread the avocado onto the warmed taco shells, and top with the mushrooms, salsa, and cheese. Enjoy!']

title: Zucchini, Bacon, and Pecorino Tart
ingredients: ['frozen puff pastry, thawed', 'medium zucchini, chopped', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'kosher salt', 'cubed bacon or pancetta', 'large eggs', 'heavy cream', 'grated pecorino cheese', 'zucchini blossoms, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'frozen puff pastry, thawed': '1', 'medium zucchini, chopped': '3-4', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'kosher salt': 'seasoning', 'cubed bacon or pancetta': '1/2', 'large eggs': '3', 'heavy cream': '1/2', 'grated pecorino cheese': '1/2', 'zucchini blossoms, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Grease a 9-inch tart pan with a little butter or oil, then dust it with flour until well coated.', '2. Roll out the puff pastry into a large circle and drape it over the tart pan. Press the pastry into the nooks and crannies, then roll a rolling-pin over the top to cut away the excess pastry. Cover the pastry with a sheet of parchment paper and fill it with baking beans or weights. Set the pan in the oven and bake for 15 minutes, until dry to the touch. Remove from the oven, discard the parchment paper and baking beans, and bake for 3 to 5 minutes more to crisp up the base.', '3. Meanwhile, roughly slice the zucchini into 1 inch thick rounds. Drizzle the olive oil into a large saucepan, set on medium heat, and add the zucchini and salt. Cook, stirring until the zucchini begin to color very lightly, 3 to 5 minutes. Toss in the pancetta and cook, stirring until the pancetta is crisp, 3 to 5 minutes more.', '4. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs and cream with a fork, then whisk in the cheese. Season with a little salt. Allow the pancetta and zucchini mixture to cool a little (so that  it doesn’t cook the eggs), then add it to the eggs and cheese, and toss well.', '5. Pour the filling into the prepared pastry shell. If using, open the zucchini blossoms very gently and pull out and discard the stamens. Then arrange the flowers on the top of the pie, gently pressing them into the filling. Bake the pie for 20 to 25 minutes, until golden on top. It’s delicious eaten warm from the oven, or at room temperature.']

title: No-Guilt Broccoli Fettuccine Alfredo

instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler to high.', '2. Rub the salmon all over with sesame  oil. Heat a cast iron skillet over medium high heat.', '3. In a small bowl, combine honey, sambal oelek, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, lime zest and juice. Pour the sauce into the skillet and allow it to boil for 2-3 minutes. Remove from the heat and add salmon, skin side up. Transfer the skillet to the oven and broil for 2-3minutes, watching closely until the salmon skin is crisp.', '4. title: Jalapeño Cheddar Guacamole Turkey Burgers with Crispy Onions

ingredients with measurement: {'jalapeños': '2', 'ground turkey or chicken': '1', 'grated cheddar cheese': '1/2', 'panko bread crumbs': '1/3', 'egg': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'smoked gouda or cheddar': '4', 'burger buns, toasted': '4', 'avocados lightly mashed': '2', 'juice from 1 lime': 'seasoning', 'chipotle mayo and fresh cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning', 'white onions, halved and then sliced very thin': '2', 'buttermilk': '2', 'flour': '2', 'Kosher salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'oil, for frying': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the broiler to high. Place the\xa0jalapeños on a baking sheet and place under the broiler. Broil until charred all over, about 5 minutes. Remove and let cool and then seed and chop the\xa0jalapeños.', '2. In a medium bowl, combine the\xa0jalapeños, turkey, cheddar, panko, egg, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix until just combined and then shape the mix into 4 even size burger patties.', '3. Preheat the outdoor grill or grill pan to high. Grill the burger for 5 minute per side or until cooked through. Add the crispy onions (recipe follows) and cilantro. EAT']

title: Grilled Corn and Feta Egg in a Hole Avocado Toast
ingredients: ['crusty whole grain bread', 'olive oil or butter, plus more oil for drizzling', 'eggs', 'flaky sea salt and pepper', 'avocado, lightly mashed', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon', 'nectarine, thinly sliced', 'charred or grilled corn, kernels removed', 'crumbled feta cheese', 'crushed red pepper flakes, for topping', 'fresh torn basil, for topping']
ingredients with measurement: {'crusty whole grain bread': '2', 'olive oil or butter, plus more oil for drizzling': '2', 'eggs': '2', 'flaky sea salt and pepper': 'seasoning', 'avocado, lightly mashed': '1', 'juice of 1/2 a lemon': 'seasoning', 'nectarine, thinly sliced': '1', 'charred or grilled corn, kernels removed': '1', 'crumbled feta cheese': '1/3', 'crushed red pepper flakes, for topping': 'seasoning', 'fresh torn basil, for topping': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Using a 2-inch cookie cutter, cut 1 round circle out of each piece of bread.', '2. Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the olive oil. When the oil shimmers, add both the bread and the centers and cook 2-3 minutes or until the toast is golden. Flip the toast and crack an egg into the center hole of each piece of bread. Season with salt and pepper. Cook 2-3 minutes and then flip once more and cook 30 seconds to one minutes or until the egg is cooked to your liking. Remove from the skillet.', '3. In a small bowl, mash together the avocado and lemon juice. Season with salt. Spread the avocado evenly over each piece of toast. Top with nectarines, corn, feta, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt. EAT.']

title: Easiest Lemon Ricotta Asparagus Ravioli
